original: Guṇālaṅkārasaṃyuttā, api dosalavaṅkitā;

original: Pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi, sā kaññā viya tādisī.

original: Ettha padānaṃ aṭṭhānapayogato byākiṇṇattaṃ padatthānusāreneva gamyate.

original: Visiṭṭhavacanā’petaṃ, gāmmaṃ’tya’bhimataṃ yathā;

original: Kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ, na kāmayasi kiṃ nvi’daṃ.

original: Padasandhānato kiñci, duppatītikaraṃ bhave;

original: Tampi gāmmaṃtya’bhimataṃ, yathā yābhavato piyā.

analyzed: yathā ati udāharati bhavataḥ yā kācid vanitā piyā iti eka utthaḥ methune yabhanam

bhave asabbhabhūtaduṭṭhatthassa pakāsako hoti, tampi gāmmanti yathāvuttagāmmadosena

original: Yati sabbattha pādante, vuttaḍḍhe ca visesato;
analyzed: yati sabbattha pāda ante vutta ḍḍhe ca visesato

original: padamajjhe yati na hotevāti ceti āha “pubba”iccādi. Katthaci kismiñci ṭhāne, na sabbattha.

original: Pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhepi yatīti sambandho. Pubbe ca apare ca pubbāpare. Aneke
analyzed: pubba apara aneka vaṇṇa pada majjhe pi yati iti sambandhaḥ pubbe ca apare ca pubba apare aneke

analyzed: pāda dvaya saṅkhāte aḍḍhe ca tad avasāne ca ati adhippāyaḥ katthaci kismiñci ṭhāne pubba apara aneka vaṇṇa pada majjhe pi

original: Tatthodāharaṇapaccudāharaṇāni yathā –
analyzed: tattha udāharaṇa paccudāharaṇāni yathā

original: Taṃ name sirasā cāmī-karavaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ;

original: Sakalāpi disā siñca-tīva soṇṇarasehiyo.

analyzed: yati cāmīkara saddo ca ittha catur akkharaḥ tattha cāmī iti pubba bhāgaḥ kara eti paraḥ

analyzed: siñca eti atra idam paccudāharaṇam

analyzed: tattha yatiyā pākaṭa ttā tasmin pada majjhe yatiyā udāharaṇa paccudāharaṇāni

original: paccudāharaṇaṃ. Ettha anekavaṇṇattaṃ padavaseneva ñātabbaṃ. Cāmīkarassa vaṇṇo viya

analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ yassa saḥ ti viggahaḥ

analyzed: sarā ucca ādi vibhattiyāḥ lope sati sandhimhi saṃhitā ayam katā ayam saraḥ para pada ādi bhūto

original: tato vihitayatiyā nevatthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo. Aññathā tu vibhattiyā alope tu sati

original: viya hotīti attho. Taṃ vibhattiyā saddhiṃ vihāya katayatiyā natthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo.

analyzed: tattha tassam yatiyam ya ādesa ādi i va ṇ ādīnam kātabbaḥ yakāra ādesa ādi parāt iva para padassa

analyzed: idāni heṭṭhā vuttassa yati bhaṅga abhāvam dassentaḥ āha sara ucca ādi

original: Vibhattiyā lope sandhimhi sati saro sandhisaro pubbanto viya pubbapadassa anto viya

original: saro parapadassa ādisaro viya hoti. Tattha yatiyaṃ yādesādi ivaṇṇādīnaṃ kattabbayakārādesādi

original: parādiva parapadassa ādisaro viya hoti, pubbantasadisasaramatikkamitvāpi parapadādisarasadisavaṇṇamāgamma
analyzed: parāt iva para padassa ādi saraḥ viya hoti pubbanta sadisa saram atikkamitvā api para pada ādi sara sadisa vaṇṇam āgamma

original: taṃ anatikkamitvāpi parapadādisarasadisayādesādimatikkamitvāpi yatiyā payuttāya sati
analyzed: tam an atikkamitvā api yatiyā payuttāya sati

original: anekavaṇṇattābhāvepi yatibhaṅgo na hotīti adhippāyo. Pubbassa antoti ca, yo ca so
analyzed: aneka vaṇṇa ttā abhāve pi yati bhaṅgaḥ na hoti iti adhippāyaḥ pubbassa antaḥ ti ca yaḥ ca so

original: ādeso ca, so ādi yassa makārādinoti ca, parassa ādīti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: ādesaḥ ca saḥ ādi yassa ca parassa ādi iti ca vākyam

original: Cādī pubbapadantāva, niccaṃ pubbapadassitā;
analyzed: ca ādī pubba pada antā ava niccam pubba pada ssitā

original: Pādayo niccasambandhā, parādīva parena tu.
analyzed: pa ādayaḥ nicca sambandhā para ādi iva parena tu

analyzed: niccam anavaratam pubba padam sitā nissitā ca ādī cakāra ādayaḥ nipātā pubbassa padassa

original: antā avayavā viya honti, te anto katvā yati kātabbāti adhippāyo. Parena parapadena

original: Bhogasaggādinibbāna-sādhanāni na saṃsayo.

original: 60. “Bhāvanā”iccādi. Sammā alobhādihetusampattiyā sakkaccaṃ sampāditāni nipphāditāni. Ettha bhogasaggādinibbānānaṃ hetavo yathākkamaṃ dānasīlabhāvanāyo, na tu bhāvanādānasīlāni.
analyzed: bhāvanā iccādi sammā alobha ādi hetu sampattiyā sakkaccam sampāditāni nipphāditāni ettha bhoga sagga ādi nibbānānam hetavaḥ yathākkamam dāna sīla bhāvanāyaḥ na tu bhāvanā dāna sīlāni

original: 60. Tattha tesu apakkamādīsu apakkamaṃ yathā apakkamassodāharaṇamevaṃ. Ocityahīnaṃ
analyzed: tattha tesu apakkama ādīsu apakkamam yathā apakkamassa udāharaṇam evam ocitya hīnam

original: yathātyādīsupi evamattho veditabbo. “Bhāvani”ccādi. Iha imasmiṃ attabhāve sammā sampāditāni
analyzed: yathā iti ādīsu pi evamatthaḥ veditabbaḥ bhāva nicca ādi iha imasmin atta bhāve sammā sampāditāni

original: alobhādihetusampattiyā sakkaccaṃ sampāditāni rāsikatāni bhāvanādānasīlāni bhogasaggādinibbānasādhanāni
analyzed: alobha ādi hetu sampattiyā sakkaccam sampāditāni rāsikatāni bhāvanā dāna sīlāni bhoga sagga ādi nibbāna sādhanāni

original: upabhogaparibhogāni, sagguppattiāyuārogyādīni, nibbānañceti etesaṃ sādhakāni. Na
analyzed: upabhoga paribhogāni sagga uppatti āyu ārogya ādīni nibbānam ca iti etesam sādhakāni na

original: saṃsayo sadisavisadisavipākadāne saṃsayo nāma natthi. Ettha bhogasagganibbānānaṃ
analyzed: saṃsayaḥ sadisa visadisa vipāka dāne saṃsayaḥ nāma natthi ettha bhoga sagga nibbānānam

original: hetubhūtā pana kamato dānasīlabhāvanāyo bhavantīti phalakkamassa hetukkamaṃ viruddhamiti
analyzed: hetu bhūtā pana kamataḥ dāna sīla bhāvanāyaḥ bhavanti iti phala kkamassa hetu kkamam viruddham iti

original: kamāpetaṃ nāma hoti.
analyzed: kamāpetam nāma ha uti

original: Ocityahīnaṃ yathā
analyzed: ocitya hīnam yathā

original: 61. Pūjanīyataro loke, aha’meko nirantaraṃ.
analyzed: pūjanīyataraḥ loke aham ekaḥ nirantaram

original: Mayekasmiṃ guṇā sabbe, yato samuditā ahuṃ.
analyzed: mayā ekasmin guṇā sabbe yatas samuditāḥ ahum

original: 61. “Pūjanīyi”ccādi. Yato yasmā kāraṇā sabbe guṇā sīlādayo ekasmiṃ kevale mayi eva
analyzed: yatas yasmā kāraṇā sabbe guṇā sīla ādayaḥ ekasmin kevale mayi eva

original: samuditā rāsibhūtā ahuṃ ahesuṃ, tasmā kāraṇā imasmiṃ sattaloke eko kevalo ahameva
analyzed: samuditāḥ rāsi bhūtāḥ tasmā kāraṇā imasmin satta loke ekaḥ kevalaḥ aham eva

original: nirantaraṃ satataṃ pūjanīyataro atisayena pujjoti. Evamattapasaṃsanamarucitaṃ sappurisassa.
analyzed: nirantaram satatam pūjanīyataraḥ atisayena evam atta pasaṃsanam arucitam sappurisassa

original: 61. “Pūjanīyatare”ccādi. Yato yasmā sabbe guṇā sīlādayo ekasmiṃ mayi adutiye mayi
analyzed: yatas yasmā sabbe guṇā sīla ādayaḥ ekasmin mayi adutiye mayi

original: eva samuditā rāsibhūtā ahuṃ ahesuṃ, tasmā loke sattaloke eko adutiyo ahameva nirantaraṃ
analyzed: eva samuditāḥ rāsi bhūtāḥ tasmā loke satta loke ekaḥ adutiyaḥ aham eva nirantaram

original: satataṃ pūjanīyataro atisayena pūjanīyo. Evaṃ attappasaṃsanato ucitatāya parihānīti ocityahīnaṃ nāma.
analyzed: satatam pūjanīyataraḥ atisayena pūjanīyaḥ evam atta pasaṃsanataḥ ucitatāya ocitya hīnam nāma

original: Yathā ca
analyzed: yathā ca

original: Yācitohaṃ kathaṃ nāma, na dajjāmyapi jīvitaṃ;
analyzed: yācitaḥ uham katham nāma na dajjāmi api jīvitam

original: Tathāpi puttadānena, vedhate hadayaṃ mama.
analyzed: tathā api putta dānena vedhate hadayam mama

original: 62. “Yācito”iccādi. Ettha “yadi yāciṃsu, jīvitampi yācakānaṃ dajjāmī”ti dassitodāratāyānucitaṃ puttadāne hadayapavedhanakathanaṃ vessantarassa yajjevamavoca.
analyzed: ettha yadi yāciṃsu jīvitam pi yācakānam dajjāmi iti dassita udāra tāya anucitam putta dāne hadaya pavedhana kathanam vessantarassa yat jevam avoca

original: 62. Yathā ca, evampi ocityahīnassa udāharaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “yācito”ccādi. Yācito yācakehi
analyzed: yathā ca evam pi ocitya hīnassa udāharaṇam daṭṭhabbam yācita ucca ādi yācitaḥ yācakehi

original: yācito ahaṃ jīvitamapi kathaṃ nāma na dajjāmi, tathāpi evaṃ dānajjhāsaye satipi puttadānena
analyzed: yācitaḥ aham jīvitam api katham nāma na dajjāmi tathā api evam putta dānena

original: mama hadayaṃ vedhate kampate. Ettha vessantarassa “yadi yāceyyuṃ, jīvitamapi yācakānaṃ
analyzed: mama hadayam vedhate kampate ettha vessantarassa yadi yāceyyum jīvitam api yācakānam

original: dajjāmī”ti katapaṭiññāya puttadānena hadayakampanassa kathanaṃ cāgātisayayogasaṅkhātaudāraguṇassa
analyzed: dajjāmi iti kata paṭiññāya putta dānena hadaya kampanassa kathanam ca āgāti saya yoga saṅkhāta audāra guṇassa

original: ananucchavikanti ocityahīnaṃ.
analyzed: ocitya hīnam

original: Bhaggarīti yathā
analyzed: bhaggarī iti yathā

original: Itthīnaṃ dujjanānañca, vissāso nopapajjate;
analyzed: itthīnam dujjanānam ca vissāsaḥ na upapajjate

original: Vise siṅgimhi nadiyaṃ, roge rājakulamhī ca.
analyzed: vise siṅgimhi nadiyam roge rājakulamhī ca

original: 63. “Itthīna”miccādi. Nopapajjate na yujjati. Ettha sambandhe chaṭṭhiyā pariccāgena
analyzed: itthīnam iccādi na upapajjate na yujjati ettha sambandhe chaṭṭhiyā pariccāgena

original: viseiccādinā ādhāre sattamīniddeso attharītiyā bhaṅgo. Ādo majjhe ca cakārapariccāgā
analyzed: ādhāre sattamī niddesaḥ attha rītiyā bhaṅgaḥ ādaḥ majjhe ca cakāra pariccāgā

original: saddarītiyā bhaṅgo, rītīnaṃ anantattā bhaṅgāpyanantā. Udāharaṇaṃ tu disāmattaṃ.
analyzed: bhaṅgaḥ udāharaṇam tu

original: 63. “Itthīna”miccādi. Itthīnañca dujjanānañca vissāso sahavāsādīhi vissāso nopapajjate
analyzed: itthīnam iccādi itthīnam ca dujjanānam ca vissāsaḥ sahavāsa ādīhi vissāsaḥ na upapajjate

original: anatthasaṃsayānivattikāraṇattā na yujjati. Vise garaḷe ca siṅgimhi siṅgavati mahiṃ
analyzed: na yujjati vise garaḷe ca siṅgimhi siṅgavati mahiṃ

original: sādo ca nadiyañca roge vaḍḍhamānake roge ca rājakulamhi ca vadhabandhanādikārake
analyzed: ca roge vaḍḍhamānake roge ca rājakulamhi ca vadha bandhana ādi kārake

original: rājakule ca vissāso nopapajjate. Ettha ādo sambandhe chaṭṭhiyā ārabhitvā taṃ pahāya
analyzed: rāja kule ca vissāsaḥ na upapajjate ettha sambandhe chaṭṭhiyā ārabhitvā tam pahāya

original: sattamiyā vuttattā attharīti ca, ādimajjhesu casaddapariccāgato saddarīti ca bhinnā.
analyzed: sattamiyāḥ vutta ttā attharī iti ca ādi majjhesu ca sadda pariccāgataḥ saddarī iti ca bhinnā

original: Casaddaṃ payuñjantena ādo eva vā ante eva vā paccekaṃ vā yojetabbaṃ hoti. Īdiso payogo
analyzed: ca saddam payuñjantena ādaḥ eva vā ante eva vā paccekam vā yojetabbam hoti īdiso payogo

original: rītibhaṅgo nāma hoti. Rītīnaṃ bahuttā rītibhaṅgadosāpi bahuvidhā. Idaṃ pana mukhamattanidassanaṃ.
analyzed: rīti bhaṅgaḥ nāma hoti rītīnam bahuttā rīti bhaṅga dosāḥ api bahuvidhāḥ idam pana mukha matta nidassanam

original: Sasaṃsayaṃ yathā
analyzed: sa saṃsayam yathā

original: Munindacandimāloka-rasalolavilocano;
Jano’vakkantapantho’va, gopadassanapīṇito.
analyzed: janaḥ uvakkanta panthāḥ iva gopa dassana pīṇitaḥ

original: 64. “Munindi”ccādi. Candimā viya candimā, munindoyeva candimā, tassa ālokanaṃ dassanaṃ,
analyzed: munindicca ādi candimā viya candimā candimā tassa ālokanam dassanam

original: āloko pakāso vā, tasmiṃ raso anurāgo, tena lolāni capalāni locanāni akkhīni yassa
analyzed: ālokaḥ pakāsaḥ vā tasmin rasaḥ anurāgaḥ tena lolāni capalāni locanāni akkhīni yassa

original: so jano avakkanto okkanto paviṭṭho pantho maggo yena avakkantapantho eva gunnaṃ raṃsīnaṃ,
analyzed: saḥ janaḥ avakkantaḥ okkantaḥ paviṭṭhaḥ panthaḥ maggaḥ yena avakkanta panthaḥ eva gunnam raṃsīnam

original: iṭṭhatthanipphattisūcakabhāvena gopadatthassa vā padassanena pīṇito muditoti ettha
analyzed: iṭṭha attha nipphatti sūcaka bhāvena go pada atthassa vā pada ssanena pīṇitaḥ muditaḥ ti ettha

original: gorūpassa padassanenātipi viññāyatīti sandeho.
analyzed: go rūpassa viññāyati iti sandeho

original: 64. “Munindi”ccādi. Munindacandimālokarasalolavilocano munindasaṅkhātassa candimassa
analyzed: muninda iccādi muninda candi māloka rasa lola vilocanaḥ muninda saṅkhātassa candimassa

original: āloke dassane pātubhāve vā rasena ālayena cañcalanetto jano avakkantapanthova otiṇṇamaggova
analyzed: āloke dassane pātubhāve vā rasena ālayena cañcala nettaḥ janaḥ avakkanta panthova otiṇṇa maggaḥ uva

original: buddhassa dassanatthāya maggamotiṇṇoti adhippāyo. Gopadassanapīṇito gosaṅkhātaraṃsipadassanena,
analyzed: buddhassa dassana tthāya magga motiṇṇaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ gopa dassana pīṇitaḥ go saṅkhāta raṃsi padassanena

original: abhimaṅgalasammatagopadassanena vā santuṭṭho hoti. Ettha gopadassanenāti ca atthassa
analyzed: abhimaṅgala sammata gopa dassanena vā santuṭṭhaḥ hoti ettha gopa dassanena ati ca atthassa

original: gamyamānattā viññātuṃ saṃsayo uppajjatīti sasaṃsayaṃ nāma. Avakkanto pantho yenāti
analyzed: gamyamāna ttā viññātum saṃsayaḥ uppajjati iti sa saṃsayam nāma avakkantaḥ panthaḥ yena ati

original: ca, gunnaṃ raṃsīnaṃ, gāvassa vā padassananti ca, gopadassanena pīṇitoti ca viggaho.
analyzed: ca gunnam raṃsīnam gāvassa vā padassananti ca go padassanena pīṇitaḥ iti ca viggahaḥ

original: Vākyatthato duppatīti-karaṃ gāmmaṃ mataṃ yathā;
analyzed: vākyatthataḥ duppatīti karam gāmmam matam yathā

original: Poso vīriyavāso’yaṃ, paraṃ hantvāna vissami.
analyzed: posaḥ vīriya vāsoyam param hantvāna

original: 65. “Vākya”iccādi. Paraṃ sattuṃ hantvāna paharitvā vīriyavā sūro soyaṃ poso puriso
analyzed: param sattum hantvāna paharitvā vīriyavā sūraḥ saḥ ayam posaḥ purisaḥ

original: vissami vissattho. Ayamattho tāva na duppatīto. Paraṃ accantaṃ hantvāna vīriyavā
analyzed: vissami vissatthaḥ ayam attho tāva na duppatītaḥ param accantam hantvāna vīriyavā

original: ucitasambhavo soyaṃ poso vissamīti duppatītoyamattho.
analyzed: ucita sambhavaḥ saḥ ayam posaḥ vissamīti duppatītā yam attho

original: 65. Anvatthavasena lakkhaṇassa apākaṭattā salakkhaṇaṃ lakkhiyamudāharati “vākyatthato”ccādinā.
analyzed: anvattha vasena lakkhaṇassa sa lakkhaṇam lakkhiyam udāharati vākyattha tā ucca ādinā

original: Vākyatthato duppatītikaraṃ viruddhappakāsakaṃ gāmmanti mataṃ. Yathāti udāharati.
analyzed: vākyatthataḥ duppatīti karam viruddha ppakāsakam gāmmanti matam yathā iti udāharati

original: Paraṃ sattuṃ hantvāna māretvāna vīriyavā sūro so ayaṃ poso vissami vigataparissamo
analyzed: param sattum hantvāna māretvāna vīriyavā sūraḥ saḥ ayam posaḥ vissami vigata parissamaḥ

original: ahosi, ayamattho iṭṭho. Paraṃ atisayena hantvāna vītikkamaṃ katvā vīriyavā upacitasambhavo
analyzed: ahosi ayam atthaḥ iṭṭhaḥ param atisayena hantvāna vītikkamam katvā vīriyavā upacita sambhavaḥ

original: upacitasukko so ayaṃ puriso vāyāmena vissami vigatavāyāmo ahosīti. Imassatthassa
analyzed: upacita sukkaḥ saḥ ayam purisaḥ vāyāmena vissami vigata vāyāmaḥ ahosi iti imassa atthassa

original: asabbhārahattā gāmmattaṃ. Vīriyaṃ ussāho sambhavo vā assa atthīti viggaho.
analyzed: a sabbhā raha ttā gāmmattam vīriyam ussāhaḥ sambhavaḥ vā assa atthi iti viggahaḥ

original: Duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇaṃ tetaṃ, yatthālaṅkāradūsanaṃ;
analyzed: duṭṭha alaṅkaraṇam yatthā alaṅkāra dūsanam

original: Tassālaṅkāraniddese, rūpamāvībhavissati.
analyzed: tassa alaṅkāra niddese rūpam āvībhavissati

original: 66. “Duṭṭhā”iccādi. Yattha yasmiṃ vākye alaṅkārānaṃ dūsanaṃ vikaṭatā, etantu duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇaṃ
analyzed: duṭṭha iccādi yattha yasmin vākye dūsanam vikaṭa tā etat tu duṭṭha alaṅkaraṇam

original: duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇaṃ nāma, tassa duṭṭhālaṅkārassa rūpaṃ sarūpaṃ alaṅkāraniddese taṃnāmake
analyzed: duṭṭha alaṅkaraṇam nāma tassa duṭṭha alaṅkārassa rūpam sarūpam alaṅkāra niddese taṃnāmake

original: paricchede āvībhavissati pakāsissati, tattheva taṃ dassayissāmīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: paricchede āvībhavissati pakāsissati tattha eva tam dassayissāmi iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 66. “Duṭṭhālaṅkari”ccādi. Yattha vākye alaṅkāradūsanaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ virodho hoti,
analyzed: vākye

original: etaṃ vākyatthanissitaṃ etaṃ vākyaṃ duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇaṃ duṭṭhālaṅkāro nāma, tassa duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇadosopalakkhitavākyassa
analyzed: etam vākyattha nissitam etam vākyam duṭṭha alaṅkaraṇam duṭṭhālaṅkāraḥ nāma tassa duṭṭha alaṅkaraṇa dosa upalakkhita vākyassa

original: rūpaṃ sarūpaṃ lakkhiyaṃ alaṅkāraniddese alaṅkārānaṃ nidassanaṭṭhānabhūte paricchede
analyzed: rūpam sarūpam lakkhiyam alaṅkāra niddese alaṅkārānam nidassana ṭṭhāna bhūte paricchede

original: āvībhavissati. Ettha vuttepi puna tatthāpi vattabbaṃ siyāti na vuttanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: āvībhavissati ettha vutte api puna tattha api vattabbam siyāti na vuttam ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Uddese “duṭṭhālaṅkatī”ti vatvā idāni “duṭṭhālaṅkaraṇa”nti vacanaṃ alaṅkati alaṅkaraṇaalaṅkārasaddānaṃ
analyzed: uddese duṭṭha alaṅkati iti vatvā idāni duṭṭha alaṅkaraṇa nti vacanam alaṅkati alaṅkaraṇa alaṅkāra saddānam

original: tulyatthattā na virujjhati.
analyzed: tulyattha tā na virujjhati

original: Kato’tra saṅkhepanayā mayā’yaṃ,
analyzed: kataḥ utra saṅkhepanayā mayā ayam

original: Dosānamesaṃ pavaro vibhāgo;
analyzed: pavaraḥ vibhāgaḥ

original: Eso’va’laṃ bodhayituṃ kavīnaṃ,
analyzed: esovalam bodhayitum kavīnam

original: Tamatthi ce khedakaraṃ parampi.
analyzed: tam atthi ce kheda karam param pi

original: Iti saṅgharakkhitamahāsāmipādaviracite subodhālaṅkāre
analyzed: iti saṅgharakkhita mahā sāmi pāda viracite subodhālaṅkāre

original: Dosāvabodho nāma
analyzed: dosa avabodhaḥ nāma

original: Paṭhamo paricchedo.
analyzed: paṭhamaḥ paricchedaḥ

analyzed: evam sa udāharaṇam etesam lakkhaṇam kathayāmi aham ti kata paṭiññā anurūpam paṭipajja

analyzed: dāni kata utricca ādinā nikkhipana nayam saṅkhipati atra imasmin adhikāre paricchede

original: vā esaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ dosānaṃ padadosādīnaṃ pavaro uttamo vibhāgo vibhajanaṃ saṅkhepanayā
analyzed: vā esam yathāvuttānam dosānam pada dosa ādīnam pavaraḥ uttamaḥ vibhāgaḥ vibhajanam saṅkhepanayā

original: saṅkhepakkamena, na vitthārato, yato aparisaṅkhyeyyānaṃ natthi pariyanto mayā kato
analyzed: saṅkhepa kkamena na vitthārataḥ yatas aparisaṅkhyeyyānam natthi pariyantaḥ mayā kato

analyzed: niṭṭhāpitaḥ nanu saṅkhepanayā ati vutta ttā purātanehi purātarehi santi

original: bahū dosā, te pariccattā siyunti? Ettha vuccate, vitthārakkamassa anadhippetattā
analyzed: bahū dosā te pariccattā siyunti ettha vuccate vitthāra kkamassa an adhippeta ttā

original: “saṅkhepanayā”ti vuttaṃ, na pana sabbathā pariccāgena. Tathā hi–
analyzed: saṅkhepanayā iti vuttam na pana sabbathā pariccāgena tathā hi

original: “Nihantu soyaṃ jalitaṃ, pataṅgo aripāvaka”ntiādīnaṃ
analyzed: nihantu saḥ uyam jalitam pataṅgaḥ

original: Akkhamatthantarādikaṃ viruddhatthantarānugatanti ca. Ettha hi pataṅgasaddena jotiriṅgaṇasaṅkhātamatthantaramasamatthamicchitatthe
analyzed: akkham atthantara ādikam ca ettha hi pataṅga saddena jotiḥ iṅgaṇa saṅkhātam atthantaram asamattham icchitatthe

original: “vacanti gaṇḍā”tyevamādikaṃ amaṅgalaapayuttapadādikaṃ kiliṭṭhe antogadhanti ca.
analyzed: vacanti amaṅgala apayutta pada ādikam kiliṭṭhe ca

original: Gajahesādi sambandhadūsitaṃ lokavirodhi, sogatāgamādīsu pasiddhaṃ rūpakkhandhādikamaññatra
analyzed: gaja hesa ādi sambandha dūsitam loka virodhi sogata āgama ādīsu pasiddham rūpa kkhandha ādikam aññatra

original: vuttaṃ appatītaṃ nāma. Idaṃ āgamavirodhiiti, sambandhadūsitappatītādikaṃ virodhimhi
analyzed: vuttam appatītam nāma idam āgama virodhi iti sambandha dūsita patīta ādikam virodhimhi

original: paviṭṭhanti ca, ānetabbahetuttā hetvapekkhaṃ neyyato na byatiriccatīti ca.
analyzed: paviṭṭhanti ca ānetabba hetuttā hetu apekkham na iyyataḥ na byatiriccati iti ca

analyzed: kiliṭṭha tā kiliṭṭha pada doso visaye āruḍhā sahī

original: na hi no duṭṭho siyā. Kīdisīti āha “piye”ccādi. Itīti nidassane. Piyā vallabhāya
analyzed: na hi no duṭṭhaḥ siyā kīdisī iti āha piya iccādi iti iti nidassane piyā vallabhāya

original: āliṅgitaṃ kaṃ janaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ cetasikañca no āliṅgati na saṃyujjati nu. Nuiti
analyzed: āliṅgitam kam janam sukham kāyikam cetasikam ca no āliṅgati na saṃyujjati nu nu iti

original: parivitakke nipāto. Ettha piyāti kiliṭṭhaṃ paheḷikāya samāropena parihaṭaṃ.
analyzed: parivitakke nipātaḥ ettha piyāti kiliṭṭham paheḷikāya samāropena parihaṭam

original: 73. “Paheḷike”ccādi. Kiliṭṭhatā kiliṭṭhapadadosasaṅkhātā paheḷikāyaṃ visaye āruḷhā
analyzed: paheḷikā iccādi kiliṭṭha tā kiliṭṭha pada dosa saṅkhātā paheḷikā ayam visaye āruḷhā

original: ce, na hi duṭṭhā duṭṭhā na hoti. Kimudāharaṇaṃ? Piyā sukhāliṅgitaṃ kamāliṅgati nu
analyzed: ce na hi duṭṭhāḥ duṭṭhāḥ na kim udāharaṇam piyā sukha āliṅgitam kam āliṅgati nu

original: no iti, itisaddassa nidassanatthattā sesaudāharaṇānametamupalakkhaṇanti ñātabbaṃ.
analyzed: no iti iti saddassa nidassana ttha ttā sesa udāharaṇānam etam upalakkhaṇam ti ñātabbam

original: No ce, evaṃpakārānamudāharaṇānamapariggahetabbattā itisaddo pakāratthoti. Piyā vallabhāya
analyzed: no ce evaṃpakārānam udāharaṇānam a pariggahetabba ttā iti saddo pakāra atthaḥ ti piyā vallabhāya

original: āliṅgitaṃ upaguhitaṃ kaṃ nāma janaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikamānasikaṃ no āliṅgati nu, āliṅgatevāti.
analyzed: āliṅgitam upaguhitam kam nāma janam sukham kāyika mānasikam no āliṅgati nu āliṅgatā iva ati

original: Ettha piyāti kiliṭṭhapadaṃ paheḷikāyamāropanena nirākataṃ hoti.
analyzed: ettha kiliṭṭha padam paheḷikāyam āropanena nirākatam hoti

original: Yamake no payojeyya, kiliṭṭhapada’micchite;
analyzed: yamake no payojeyya kiliṭṭha padam icchite

original: Tato yamaka’maññaṃ tu, sabbametaṃmayaṃ viya.
analyzed: tatas yamakam aññam tu sabbam etaṃmayam viya

original: 74. “Yamake”ccādi. Tato aññanti icchitayamakato aññaṃ. Tuiti visesajotako. Etaṃmayaṃ viyāti etena kiliṭṭhapadena nibbattaṃ viya.
analyzed: yamaka iccādi tatas aññanti icchita yamakataḥ aññam tu iti visesa jotakaḥ etaṃmayam viya iti etena kiliṭṭha padena nibbattam viya

original: 74. “Yamake”ccādi. Kiliṭṭhapadaṃ icchite yamake iṭṭhayamake no payojeyya nappayujjeyya,
analyzed: yamaka iccādi kiliṭṭha padam icchite yamake iṭṭha yamake no payojeyya nappayujjeyya

original: tato iṭṭhayamakato aññaṃ sabbaṃ yamakaṃ pana etaṃmayaṃ viya iminā kiliṭṭhapadadosena
analyzed: tatas iṭṭha yamakataḥ aññam sabbam yamakam pana etaṃmayam viya iminā kiliṭṭha pada dosena

original: kataṃ viya hoti. Ettha iṭṭhayamakaṃ vuttanayena ñātabbaṃ, etena nibbattaṃ etaṃmayanti viggaho.
analyzed: katam viya hoti ettha iṭṭha yamakam vutta nayena ñātabbam etena nibbattam etaṃmayanti viggahaḥ

original: Desavirodhino yathā –
analyzed: yathā

original: Bodhisattappabhāvena, thalepi jalajānya’huṃ;
analyzed: thale pi jala jāni ahum

original: Nudantāni’va sucirā-vāsaklesaṃ tahiṃ jale.
analyzed: nudantān iva su cira āvāsa klesam tahim jale

original: 75. “Bodhisatte”ccādi. Bodhisattassa māyādeviyā sutassa vakkhamānassa visesassa taduppannadine
analyzed: bodhisatta iccādi bodhisattassa māyādeviyā sutassa vakkhamānassa visesassa tad uppanna dine

original: sambhavā pabhāvena puññappabhāvato jalajāni ambujāni thalepi ahuṃ ahesuṃ acintanīyattā
analyzed: sambhavā pabhāvena puñña ppabhāvataḥ jala jāni ambu jāni thale pi ahum ahesum a cintanīya ttā

original: puññappabhāvassa. Kiṃ pana vāpyādīsu kiṃ karontāva tahiṃ tasmiñca jale suciraṃ sabbadāva
analyzed: puññappabhāvassa kim pana tasmin ca jale su ciram

original: āvasanamāvāso tena jāto kleso taṃ nudantāniva dūrato jahantāniveti. Acintanīyattā
analyzed: āvasanam āvāsaḥ tena jātaḥ klesaḥ tam nudantān iva dūratas jahantān iva iti a cintanīya ttā

original: puññappabhāvassa īdisampi acchariyamahosīti na desavirodho.
analyzed: puñña ppabhāvassa īdisam pi acchariyam ahosi iti na desa virodho

original: 75. Bodhisattappabhāvena bodhisattassa acinteyyānubhāvena jalajāni jalajasadisattā
analyzed: bodhisatta ppabhāvena bodhisattassa acinteyya anubhāvena jala jāni

original: tannāmakāni padumakeravādīni tahiṃ jale visayattena pasiddhe tasmiṃ udake sucirāvāsaklesaṃ
analyzed: tad nāmakāni paduma kerava ādīni jale tasmin udake

original: aticiraṃ nivāsato jātaāyāsaṃ nudantāni iva cajantāni iva thalepi ahuṃ ahesuṃ, vāpiādīsu
analyzed: aticiram nivāsataḥ jāta āyāsam nudantāni iva cajantāni iva thalepi ahum ahesum vāpī ādīsu

original: kā kathā. Ettha jalajānaṃ thaluppattikathanasaṅkhātaṃ desavirodhaṃ acinteyyapuññappabhāvena
analyzed: kā kathā ettha jala jānam thala uppatti kathana saṅkhātam desa virodham acinteyya puññappa bhāvena

original: īdisānaṃ acchariyānaṃ pātubhāvato “bodhisattappabhāvenā”ti iminā nirākaroti. Bodhiyaṃ
analyzed: īdisānam pātubhāvataḥ bodhisatta ppabhāvena ati iminā nirākaroti

original: catumaggapaññāyaṃ sattoti ca, tassa pabhāvoti ca, suciraṃ āvāsoti ca, tena bhūto klesoti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: catu magga paññāyam satto ti ca tassa pabhāvo ti ca suciram āvāso ti ca tena bhūtaḥ klesaḥ iti ca vākyam

original: Kālavirodhino yathā –
analyzed: kāla virodhinaḥ yathā

original: Mahānubhāvapisuno, munino mandamāruto;
analyzed: mahā anubhāva pisunaḥ muninaḥ

original: Sabbotukamayaṃ vāyi, dhunanto kusumaṃ samaṃ.
analyzed: sabbotuka mayam vāyi dhunantaḥ kusumam samam

original: 76. “Mahā”iccādi. Mando mudubhūto māruto ayaṃ sabbotukaṃ sabbesu utūsu pupphanakaṃ
analyzed: mahā iccādi mandaḥ mudu bhūtaḥ mārutaḥ ayam sabbotukam sabbesu utūsu pupphanakam

original: kusumaṃ pupphaṃ samaṃ ekato katvā dhunanto vikiranto munino munisadisattā bhavissantamunibhāvena
analyzed: kusumam puppham samam ekatas katvā dhunantaḥ vikirantaḥ muninaḥ muni sadisattāḥ bhavissanta muni bhāvena

original: ca bodhisattassa, muninoyeva vā sammāsambodhisamadhigamasamaye mahānubhāvassa pisuno
analyzed: ca bodhisattassa munino yā iva vā sammāsambodhi samadhigama samaye mahā anubhāvassa pisuno

original: sūcako vāyi pavāyatīti. Ettha yadyapekadā sabbotukāsambhavo nānāutūsu nānākusumassa
analyzed: sūcakaḥ vāyi pavāyati iti ettha yadi apekadā nānā otūsu nānā kusumassa

original: sambhavā, tathāpi bhagavato mahānubhāvapisunamīdisamekapadikaṃ sambhavatīti kālavirodho iminā parihaṭo.
analyzed: sambhavā tathā api bhagavataḥ sambhavati iti kāla virodhaḥ iminā parihaṭaḥ

original: 76. “Mahānubhāve”ccādi. Ayaṃ mandamāruto acaṇḍasamīraṇo sabbotukaṃ vasantādīsu sabbautūsu
analyzed: mahā anubhāva iccādi ayam manda mārutaḥ a caṇḍa samīraṇaḥ vasanta ādīsu

original: vikasantaṃ kusumaṃ pupphajātaṃ samaṃ ekato katvā dhunanto kampento munino ekantabhāvittā
analyzed: vikasantam kusumam puppha jātam samam ekatas katvā dhunantaḥ kampentaḥ munino

original: munisaṅkhātassa bodhisattassa, sammāsambodhisamadhigamasamaye bhūtattā munino sabbaññuno
analyzed: muni saṅkhātassa bodhisattassa sammāsambodhi samadhigama samaye bhūta ttā munino sabbaññuno

original: vā mahānubhāvapisuno mahantaṃ puññappabhāvaṃ pakāsento vāyi sampavāyīti. Ettha nānākāle
analyzed: vā mahā anubhāva pisunaḥ mahantam puñña ppabhāvam pakāsentaḥ vāyi sampavāyi iti ettha nānā kāle

original: sambhavantānampi kusumānaṃ ekakāle sambhavassa kālavirodhattepi bhagavato puññānubhāvo
analyzed: sambhavantānam pi kusumānam eka kāle sambhavassa bhagavato puñña anubhāvaḥ

original: tādisamacchariyamekakkhaṇe janetuṃ samatthoti kālavirodhaṃ “mahānubhāvapisuno”ti
analyzed: tādisa macchariyam eka kkhaṇe janetum samatthaḥ uti kāla virodham mahā anubhāva pisunoti

original: iminā nirākaroti. Mahānubhāvassa, mahānubhāvaṃ vā pisunoti vākyaṃ.
analyzed: nirākaroti mahā anubhāvaḥ sa mahā anubhāvam vā pisunoti vākyam

original: Kalāvirodhino yathā –
analyzed: kalā virodhinaḥ yathā

original: Nimuggamanaso buddha-guṇe pañcasikhassapi;
analyzed: nimugga manasaḥ buddha guṇe pañca sikhassa api

original: Tantissaravirodho so, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
analyzed: tantissara virodhaḥ saḥ na sampīṇeti kam janam

original: 77. “Nimuggi”ccādi. Buddhassa guṇe sīlādike aparimāṇe nimuggaṃ ogāḷhaṃ manaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: nimugga iccādi buddhassa guṇe sīla ādike aparimāṇe nimuggam ogāḷham manam cittam

original: yassa tassa pañcasikhassa gandhabbadevaputtassapi vīṇāya tantiyā saro kiriyākālamānalakkhaṇavilambitadutamajjhabhedabhinno
analyzed: yassa tassa pañcasikhassa gandhabba deva puttassa api vīṇāya tantiyā saraḥ

original: chajjādiko tassa virodho kalāsatthapariniddiṭṭhakamavesamaṃ kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇeti,
analyzed: chajja ādikaḥ tassa virodhaḥ kalā sattha pariniddiṭṭha kama vesamam kam janam na sampīṇeti

original: pīṇetiyeva. Sammāsambuddhassa lokiyaguṇānubandhabuddhīnaṃ vikkhepappavattipi tathāvidhaṃ
analyzed: sammāsambuddhassa lokiya guṇa anubandha buddhīnam tathāvidham

original: pīṇetīti. “Buddhaguṇe nimuggamanaso”ti iminā kalāvirodho parihaṭo.
analyzed: pīṇeti iti buddha guṇe iminā kalā virodhaḥ parihaṭaḥ

original: 77. “Nimuggi”ccādi. Buddhaguṇe sabbaññuno vimhayajanakasīlādiguṇasambhāre nimuggamanaso
analyzed: nimugga iccādi buddha guṇe sabbaññunaḥ vimhaya janaka sīla ādi guṇa sambhāre nimugga manasaḥ

original: otiṇṇacittassa pañcasikhassapi gandhabbadevaputtassāpi so tantissaravirodho vīṇāya
analyzed: otiṇṇa cittassa pañcasikhassa api gandhabbadeva puttassa api so tantissara virodhaḥ vīṇāya

original: tantiyā ghaṭṭanakiriyā, addhamattikādikālo, hatthādīnaṃ sannivesalakkhaṇo mānoti
analyzed: tantiyāḥ ghaṭṭana kiriyā addhamattikā ādi kālaḥ hattha ādīnam sannivesa lakkhaṇaḥ

original: imehi tīhi lakkhaṇehi yuttassa mandasīghamajjhimappamāṇehi bhinnassa chajjādisattasarassa
analyzed: imehi tīhi lakkhaṇehi yuttassa manda sīgha majjhima ppamāṇehi bhinnassa chajja ādi satta sarassa

original: kalāsatthāgatakkamassa vināsasaṅkhāto virodho kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇeti, sampīṇeti eva.
analyzed: kalā sattha āgata kkamassa vināsa saṅkhātaḥ virodhaḥ kam janam na sampīṇeti sampīṇeti eva

original: Ettha akantiyā kāraṇabhūto kalāsatthāgatakkamabhaṅgo lokuttarabuddhaguṇānugatabuddhiyā
analyzed: ettha akantiyā kāraṇa bhūtaḥ kalā satthāgata kkama bhaṅgaḥ lokuttara buddha guṇa anugata buddhiyā

original: jātoti so bhaṅgo “nimuggamanaso buddhaguṇe”ti vuttattā pītiyā kāraṇameveti na virodho.
analyzed: jātaḥ iti saḥ bhaṅgaḥ nimugga manasaḥ buddha guṇā iti vutta ttā pītiyā kāraṇam evā iti na virodhaḥ

original: Nimuggo mano assāti ca, tantiyā saroti ca, tesaṃ virodhoti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: nimuggaḥ manaḥ assa ati ca tantiyā saraḥ ti ca tesam virodhaḥ iti ca vākyam

original: Lokavirodhino yathā –
analyzed: loka virodhinaḥ yathā

original: Gaṇaye cakkavāḷaṃ so, candanāyapi sītalaṃ;
analyzed: gaṇaye cakkavāḷam saḥ sītalam

original: Sambodhisattahadayo, padittaṅgārapūritaṃ.
analyzed: sam bodhisatta hadayaḥ

original: 78. “Gaṇaye”ccādi. Candanāya api sītalaṃ gaṇaye cintesi. Kintaṃ? Padittaṅgārapūritaṃ
analyzed: gaṇayet ca ādi candanāya api sītalam gaṇaye cintesi kintam

original: cakkavāḷaṃ. Ko so? Sambodhiyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇe sattaṃ paribaddhaṃ hadayaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: cakkavāḷam kaḥ saḥ sambodhiyam sabbaññuta ññāṇe sattam paribaddham hadayam cittam

original: yassa so. Sabbaññutaññāṇānubandhabuddhino hi tādiso manobandhoti na lokavirodho.
analyzed: yassa saḥ sabbaññu taññāṇa anubandha buddhinaḥ hi tādisaḥ manobandho ti na loka virodhaḥ

original: 78. “Gaṇaye”ccādi. Sambodhisattahadayo sabbaññutaññāṇe āsattacitto so bodhisatto
analyzed: gaṇayet ca ādi sam bodhisatta hadayaḥ sabbaññu taññāṇe āsatta citto saḥ bodhisatto

original: padittaṅgārapūritaṃ ādittaṅgārehi paripuṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ candanāyapi
analyzed: paripuṇṇam cakkavāḷam cakkavāḷa gabbham

original: candanato api sītalaṃ atisītalaṃ katvā gaṇaye cinteyyāti. Iṭṭhatthaluddhassa cittappavattiyā
analyzed: candanataḥ api sītalam ati sītalam katvā gaṇaye cinteyya iti iṭṭhattha luddhassa citta ppavattiyā

original: īdisattā aggino candanatopi adhikasītattakappanā “candanaṃ sītalaṃ, aggi uṇho”ti
analyzed: īdisa ttā aggino candanataḥ pi adhika sītatta kappanā candanam sītalam aggi

original: pavattalokasīmāya viruddhā na hoti. Sambodhiyaṃ sattahadayaṃ yasseti ca, padittāni
analyzed: viruddhā na hoti sambodhiyam satta hadayam yassa iti ca

original: aṅgārānīti ca, tehi pūritanti ca viggaho.
analyzed: aṅgārāni iti ca tehi pūritam ti ca viggahaḥ

original: Ñāyavirodhino yathā –
analyzed: ñāya virodhinaḥ yathā

original: Pariccattabhavopi tva-mupanītabhavo asi;
analyzed: tvam upanīta bhavaḥ asi

original: Acintyaguṇasārāya, namo te munipuṅgava.
analyzed: acintya guṇa sārāya namaḥ te muni puṅgava

original: 79. “Pariccatte”ccādi. Munipuṅgava munīnaṃ uttama pariccatto visaṭṭho bhavo sugatiduggatisaṅkhāto
analyzed: pariccatta iccādi muni puṅgava munīnam uttama pariccattaḥ visaṭṭhaḥ bhavaḥ sugati duggati saṅkhāto

original: yenāti pariccattabhavopi tvaṃ upanīto ānīto pavattito bhavo vuḍḍhi yenāti upanītabhavo
analyzed: yena ati pariccatta bhavaḥ api tvam upanītaḥ ānītaḥ pavattitaḥ bhavaḥ vuḍḍhi yena ati upanīta bhavaḥ

original: asi. Tasmā kāraṇā acintyaguṇasārāya te namo atthūti seso. Īdisaṃ na ñāyaviruddhamevaṃvidhattā munipuṅgavassa.
analyzed: asi tasmā kāraṇā acintya guṇa sārāya te namaḥ atthu ti sesaḥ īdisam na ñāya viruddham evaṃvidha ttā muni puṅgavassa

original: 79. “Pariccatte”ccādi. Munipuṅgava muniseṭṭha tvaṃ pariccattabhavopi apanītasugatiduggatibhavopi
analyzed: pariccatta icca ādi muni puṅgava muni seṭṭha tvam pariccatta bhavaḥ api apanīta sugati duggati bhavaḥ api

original: upanītabhavo lokassānītaabhivuddhiko asi bhavasi, acintyaguṇasārāya tato eva cintāvisayātikkantasāraguṇassa
analyzed: upanīta bhavaḥ asi bhavasi acintya guṇa sārāya tatas eva cintā visaya atikkanta sāra guṇassa

original: te tuyhaṃ namo atthūti sabbākārato bhavassa pariccattattā attani avijjamānaṃ sugatibhavaṃ
analyzed: te tuyham namaḥ atthu ti sabba ākārataḥ bhavassa pariccatta ttā attani a vijjamānam sugati bhavam

original: lokassa detīti etaṃ ñāyāgataṃ na hotīti paṭibhāti, tathāpi ca sabbaññūnaṃ pavatti
analyzed: lokassa deti iti etam ñāya āgatam na hoti iti paṭibhāti tathā api ca sabbaññūnam pavatti

original: īdisāyevāti ñāyavirodho nirākato. Acintyā guṇasārā yasminti viggaho.
analyzed: īdisāya iva iti ñāya virodhaḥ nirākataḥ acintyāḥ guṇa sārāḥ yasmin ti viggahaḥ

original: Āgamavirodhino yathā –
analyzed: āgama virodhinaḥ yathā

original: Nevālapati kenāpi, vacīviññattito yati;
analyzed: na iva ālapati kena api vacī viññattitaḥ yati

original: Sampajānamusāvādā, phuseyyāpattidukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: sampajāna musā vādā phuseyya āpatti dukkaṭam

original: 80. “Neve”tiādi. Yatīti bhikkhu kenāpi saha nevālapati na vadatyeva, tathāpi vacīviññattito
analyzed: na iva itiādi yati iti bhikkhu kena api saha na iva ālapati na vadati eva tathā api vacī viññattitaḥ

original: copanavācāsaṅkhātena vacīviññattihetunā pavattito sampajānantassa musāvādato kāraṇā
analyzed: copana vācā saṅkhātena vacī viññatti hetunā pavattitaḥ sampajānantassa musāvādato kāraṇā

original: āpattidukkaṭaṃ “sampajānamusāvādassa hotī”ti vuttadukkaṭāpatti phuseyya āpajjatīti.
analyzed: āpatti dukkaṭam sampajāna musāvādassa hoti iti vutta dukkaṭa āpatti phuseyya āpajjati iti

original: Ettha anālapato vacīviññattiyā kathaṃ musāvādoti abhidhammāpannavirodho natthi, aparavacanatthe
analyzed: ettha an ālapataḥ vacī viññattiyā katham musāvādaḥ ti abhidhamma āpanna virodhaḥ natthi aparavacana tthe

original: tvīdiso virujjhatīti.
analyzed: virujjhati iti

original: 80. “Nevi”ccādi. Yati samaṇo kenāpi kenaci saddhiṃ nevālapati no bhāsati, tathāpi
analyzed: neviccādi yati samaṇaḥ kena api kenacid saddhim na iva ālapati no bhāsati tathā api

original: vacīviññattito copanavācāsaṅkhātaviññattikāraṇā pavattanato sampajānamusāvādā sampajānantassa
analyzed: vacī viññattitaḥ copana vācā saṅkhāta viññatti kāraṇā pavattanato sampajāna musāvādā sampajānantassa

original: musābhaṇanato āpattidukkaṭaṃ dukkaṭāpattiṃ phuseyya āpajjeyyāti. Ettha anālapantassa
analyzed: musā bhaṇanataḥ āpatti dukkaṭam dukkaṭa āpattim phuseyya āpajjeyya ati ettha an ālapantassa

original: vacīviññattito musāvādo kathaṃ sambhavatīti abhidhammāpannavirodho, “santiṃ āpattiṃ

original: Yathā –

analyzed: samīpam upagatam pi tādisam mārasenam tiṇataḥ api hīnam maññi tena assa paresam vijaya ppadāna ekarasa tā visesataḥ yuttā ti

Rasalolavilocano;

original: 137. “Alaṅkāre”ccādi. Edisī evaṃvidhā sukhumālatā alaṅkāravihīnāpi atthālaṅkāravirahitāpi

original: Romañcapiñcharacanā, sādhuvādāhitaddhanī;

analyzed: yathā mata ādi saddesu kitti sesa ādi kittanam

Indamandhatamaṃ paraṃ.

original: Vamanuggiranādye’taṃ, guṇavutyapariccutaṃ;

original: Vamanañca uggiranañca, ādisaddena virecanādipariggaho. Etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ guṇā padhānetarā

analyzed: vindati paṭilabhati pasavati iti attho

original: Kantīnaṃ vamanabyājā, munipādanakhāvalī;

original: kantīnañca vamanabyājaṃ.
analyzed: kantīnañca vamana byājam

original: 160. Iṭṭhavisaye payuttavamanuggiranādīnamudāharaṇamuddisati “kantīna”miccādinā.
analyzed: iṭṭha visaye udāharaṇam uddisati kantīnam iccādinā

original: Munipādanakhāvalī munipādanakhaseṇiyo kantīnaṃ attano candamarīcisadisasobhānaṃ vamanabyājā

original: Acittakattukaṃ rujha-miccevaṃ guṇakamma taṃ guṇakammakaṃ (sī.);

analyzed: vadantaḥ kam janam kīdisam puggalam na sampīṇaye pīṇeti eva ati ettha uggiranam

analyzed: iti saṅgharakkhita mahā sāmi pāda viracite

analyzed: guṇāvabodha paricchedo tatiyo

analyzed: attanāva samam jātam iti asādhāraṇa upamā

analyzed: kaccham iccādi candassa aravindassa ca kaccham padavim atikkamma avatthariya

original: tesa’mavakaṃsato avatthuyatesamaṇaṃsato (ka.), tava mukhaṃ attano sarūpeneva samaṃ
analyzed: ka tava mukham sarūpena iva samam

original: Samasaddo mukhagatassa sādhāraṇadhammaṃ joteti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyaṃ.

original: Sabbambhojappabhāsāro, rāsibhūtova katthaci;

original: Patīyate’tthagammā tu, saddasāmatthiyā kvaci;

analyzed: sāmatthiyena patīyate

analyzed: attha sattiyā patīyate saddānam sāmatthiyam iti viggahaḥ

original: Subyattasadisattena, sā sarūpopamā matā.
analyzed: sā sarūpa upamā matā

original: Mayeva mukhasobhā’sse-tyala’mindu vikatthanā;

original: Kiṃ lolanayanaṃ mukhaṃ;

original: Kiñci vatthuṃ padassetvā,

original: Sadhammassā’bhidhānato;

original: 208. “Cande”ccādi. “Cande kalaṅko bhiṅgo ivā”ti ayaṃ upamāpekkhinī candassaupamābhūtapupphagacchakādiapekkhanato
analyzed: candet ca ādi cande kalaṅkaḥ bhiṅgaḥ iva ati ayam upamā apekkhinī candassa aupama bhūta puppha gacchaka ādi apekkhanato

original: upamāpekkhinī nāma hoti. Cande bhiṅgapavattiyā abhāvato tassa visayabhūtapupphagacchakādi
analyzed: upamā apekkhinī nāma hoti cande bhiṅga pavattiyāḥ abhāvataḥ tassa visaya bhūta puppha gacchaka ādi

original: candassa upamattena gahetvā avuttattā duṭṭhāti adhippāyo. Sakalaṅko kalaṅkasahito
analyzed: candassa upamattena gahetvā a vutta ttā duṭṭhā ati adhippāyaḥ sa kalaṅkaḥ kalaṅka sahito

original: nisākaro cando keravākāro kumudasadisoti ayaṃ khaṇḍitā candagataṃ kaṇhattaṃ pakāsetuṃ
analyzed: nisākaraḥ candaḥ kerava ākāraḥ kumuda sadisaḥ iti ayam khaṇḍitā canda gatam kaṇhattam pakāsetum

original: “sabhiṅgakeravākāro”ti vattabbe bhiṅgopamābhāvassa khaṇḍitattā khaṇḍitopamā nāma
analyzed: sa bhiṅga kerava ākāraḥ ti vattabbe bhiṅga upamā bhāvassa khaṇḍita ttā khaṇḍitopamā nāma

original: hoti. Upamaṃ apekkhatīti ca, khaṇḍaṃ itā gatāti ca, khaṇḍena itā yuttā vāti ca, keravassākāro
analyzed: hoti upamam apekkhati iti ca khaṇḍam itā gatā ati ca khaṇḍena itā yuttā vāti ca keravassa ākāraḥ

original: asseti ca, saha kalaṅkena vattatīti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: assā iti ca saha kalaṅkena vattati iti ca vākyam

original: Iccevamādirūpesu, bhavanti vigatādarā;
analyzed: bhavanti vigata ādarā

original: Karonti cā’daraṃ dhīrā, payoge kvacideva tu.
analyzed: karonti ca ādaram kvacid eva tu

original: 209. Vuttaṃ nigameti “icceva”mādinā. Rūpesu payogesu. Vigato apagato ādaro sambhāvanā
analyzed: vuttam nigame ti iti ca evamādinā rūpesu payogesu vigataḥ apagataḥ ādaraḥ sambhāvanā

original: yesaṃ tathā bhavanti. Kiṃ bhinnaliṅgādikaṃ niyamenānādaraṇīyameva, aniyameneti niyameneti
analyzed: tathā bhavanti kim bhinna liṅga ādikam niyamena anādaraṇīyam eva aniyamena iti niyamena iti

original: (ka.) ce gayhūpagampi atthīti āha “karonti”ccādiṃ. Kvacideva tu payoge dhīrā kavayo
analyzed: ka ce atthi iti āha karonti icca ādim kvacid eva tu payoge dhīrā kavayaḥ

original: ādaraṃ karonti cāti. Casaddo vattabbantaratthaṃ samuccinoti.
analyzed: ādaram karonti ca ati ca saddaḥ vattabba antara ttham samuccinoti

original: 209. “Icce”ccādi. Iti anantaraṃ niddiṭṭhesu evamādirūpesu payogesu dhīrā vigatādarā
analyzed: iti anantaram niddiṭṭhesu evamādi rūpesu payogesu dhīrā vigata ādarā

original: bhavanti. Imeyeva dhīrā kvacideva tu payoge bhinnaliṅgādike ādaraṃ karonti ca. Iti
analyzed: bhavanti kvacid eva tu bhinna liṅga ādike ādaram karonti ca iti

original: evaṃ ayaṃ pakāro ādi yesamiti ca, tāni ca tāni rūpāni ceti ca, vigato ādaro yesamiti
analyzed: evam ayam pakāraḥ ādi yesam iti ca tāni ca tāni rūpāni ca iti ca vigataḥ ādaraḥ yesam iti

original: ca viggaho. Casaddo vākyantarasamuccaye. Tasmā vigatādaratthena aññamādarakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: ca viggahaḥ ca saddaḥ vākī antara samuccaye tasmā vigata ādara atthena aññam ādara karaṇam

original: vuccamānakathāsantatiṃ ākaḍḍhati.
analyzed: vuccamāna kathā santatim ākaḍḍhati

original: Itthīvā’yaṃ jano yāti,
analyzed: itthī iva ayam janaḥ yāti

original: Vadatyesā pumā viya;
analyzed: vadati esā pumān

original: Piyo pāṇā ivā’yaṃ me,
analyzed: piyaḥ pāṇā iva ayam me

original: Vijjā dhanamiva’ccitā.
analyzed: vijjā dhanamivat citā

original: 210. Udāharati “itthi”ccādi. Ayaṃ jano itthīva yāti kriyānuvattito. Esā itthī pumāva
analyzed: udāharati itthi ccādi ayam janaḥ itthī iva yāti kriyā anuvattitaḥ esā itthī

original: puriso viya vadati tādisassa pāgabbhiyayogato. Ettha liṅganānattamupamānopameyyānaṃ.
analyzed: purisaḥ viya vadati tādisassa ettha liṅga nānattam upamāna upameyyānam

original: Ayamicchito koci me pāṇā iva piyo iṭṭho, vijjā byākaraṇādayo dhanamiva accitā rāsikatāti vacanabhedo.
analyzed: ayam icchitaḥ koci me pāṇāḥ iva piyaḥ iṭṭhaḥ vijjāḥ byākaraṇa ādayaḥ dhanam iva vacana bhedo

original: 210. Idāni bhinnaliṅgānaṃ gahetabbavisayaṃ dasseti “itthīvā’ya”miccādinā. Ayaṃ jano
analyzed: idāni bhinna liṅgānam gahetabba visayam dasseti itthī iva ayam iccādinā ayam janaḥ

original: itthīva avisadagamanena mahilā viya yāti. Esā itthī pumā viya tādisapāgabbhiyayuttattā
analyzed: itthī iva avisada gamanena mahilā viya yāti esā itthī pumā viya

original: puriso viya vadatīti. Iha dvinnaṃ upamānopameyyānaṃ liṅgabhede satipi kavayo ādaraṃ
analyzed: purisaḥ viya vadati iti iha dvinnam upamāna upameyyānam liṅga bhede kavayaḥ ādaram

original: karonti. Ayaṃ puriso me mama pāṇā iva pāṇā iva jīvo iva (ka.) āyavova piyo. Accitā
analyzed: karonti ayam purisaḥ me mama pāṇāḥ iva pāṇāḥ iva jīvaḥ iva kaḥ āyavā uva piyaḥ accitā

original: sañcitā vijjā byākaraṇanighaṇṭuādayo dhanamiva hontīti. Ettha upamānopameyyānaṃ vacanato
analyzed: sañcitāḥ vijjāḥ byākaraṇa nighaṇṭu ādayaḥ dhanam iva honti iti ettha upamāna upameyyānam vacanataḥ

original: visesatte satipi iṭṭhameva.
analyzed: satipi iṭṭham eva

original: Bhavaṃ viya mahīpāla, devarājā virājate;
analyzed: bhavam mahīpāla devarājā virājate

original: Ala’maṃsumato kacchaṃ, tejasā rohituṃ ayaṃ.
analyzed: alam aṃsumataḥ kaccham tejasā rohitum ayam

original: 211. Hīnādhikamuttamudāharaṇamāha “bhavaṃ viyi”ccādi. Mahīpāletyāmantanaṃ, devarājā
analyzed: hīna adhikam uttam udāharaṇam āha bhavam mahīpāla iti āmantanam devarājā

original: bhavaṃ viya virājate. Iti hīnenāpi hoti. Evaṃvidhe samucite visaye liṅgavacanabhedādikaṃ
analyzed: bhavam viya virājate iti hīnena api evaṃvidhe samucite visaye liṅga vacana bheda ādikam

original: nopamaṃ dūsetīti dassetīti (ka.).
analyzed: na upamam dūseti iti dasseti iti ka

original: 211. “Bhava”miccādi. Mahīpāla bho rāja, devarājā sakko devarājā bhavaṃ viya virājateti.
analyzed: bhavam iccādi mahīpāla bho rāja devarājā sakkaḥ devarājā bhavam viya virājata iti

original: Ettha sakkamupādāya “bhavaṃ viyā”ti hīnattepi iṭṭhameva. Ayaṃ rājā aṃsumato sūriyassa
analyzed: ettha sakkam upādāya bhavam viyāti hīna tte pi iṭṭham eva ayam rājā aṃsumataḥ sūriyassa

original: kacchaṃ padaviṃ tejasā ārohituṃ pattuṃ alaṃ samatthoti. Ettha tejasā adhikopi sūriyo
analyzed: kaccham padavim tejasā ārohitum pattum alam samatthaḥ iti ettha tejasā adhikaḥ api sūriyaḥ

original: upamābhūto iṭṭhova, “kacchaṃ ārohitu”nti ivasaddapariyāyo. Īdisaṃ bhinnaliṅgādikopamādikaṃ
analyzed: upamā bhūtaḥ iṭṭhaḥ uva kaccham ārohitum ti iva sadda pariyāyaḥ īdisam bhinna liṅga ādika upama ādikam

original: upamādūsanaṃ na karoti.
analyzed: upamā dūsanam na karoti

original: Upamānopameyyānaṃ, abhedassa nirūpanā;
analyzed: upamāna upameyyānam abhedassa nirūpanā

original: Upameva upamāva tirobhūta-bhedā rūpakamuccate.
analyzed: upamā iva tirobhūta bhedā rūpakam uccate

original: 212. Rūpakaṃ nirūpayati “upamāne”ccādinā. Upamānopameyyānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ abhedassa
analyzed: rūpakam nirūpayati upamāna icchā ādinā upamāna upameyyānam yathāvuttānam abhedassa

original: nānattābhāvassa nirūpanā āropanena upamānopameyyānamabhedaṃ rūpayati dassetīti rūpakamuccate.
analyzed: nānatta abhāvassa nirūpanā āropanena upamāna upameyyānam abhedam rūpayati dasseti iti rūpakam uccate

original: Upamānassa upamānopameyyānamabhedāropanena tirobhūto apākaṭo bhedo nānattaṃ yassāti
analyzed: upamānassa upamāna upameyyānam abheda āropanena tirobhūtaḥ apākaṭaḥ bhedaḥ nānattam yassa ati

original: tādisī upameva yathāvuttalakkhaṇā rūpakamuccate “rūpaka”nti. “Padambuja”nti ettha
analyzed: tādisī upamā iva yathā vutta lakkhaṇā rūpakam uccate ettha

original: padameva ambujasadisattā ambujaṃ rupyate. Ityupameyyopamānabhūtānaṃ padambujānamabhedāropanena
analyzed: padam eva ambuja sadisattā ambujam rupyate iti upameyya upamāna bhūtānam

original: upamānopameyyagatasādhammasaṅkhātāyapi upamāya bhedo vijjamānopi tirohito. Na tu
analyzed: upamāna upameyya gata sādhamma saṅkhātāya api upamāya bhedaḥ vijjamānaḥ api tirohitaḥ na tu

original: āvibhūto abbhuto (ka.) “padaṃ ambujamive”ti. Sā copamā tathāvidhā upamānopameyyānamabhedamāyāti
analyzed: padam ambujam iva iti sā ca upamā tathāvidhā upamāna upameyī ānam abhedam āyāti

original: nāmāti rūpakamuccateti adhippāyo.
analyzed: nāma ati rūpaka mucca tā iti adhippāyo

original: 212. Idāni uddiṭṭhakkamena rūpakālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “upamāno”ccādinā. Upamānopameyyānaṃ
analyzed: idāni uddiṭṭha kkamena rūpaka alaṅkāram dasseti upamāna ucca ādinā upamāna upameyyānam

original: anantaraniddiṭṭhaupamānopameyyānaṃ abhedassa sabhāvato bhede satipi vibhūtasadisattaṃ
analyzed: abhedassa sabhāvataḥ bhede vibhūta sadisa ttam

original: nissāya “so eso, eso so”ti vattārehi parikappitassa abhedassa nirūpanā upamānopameyyapadatthesu
analyzed: nissāya saḥ esaḥ esaḥ so ti vattārehi parikappitassa abhedassa nirūpanā upamāna upameyya padatthesu

original: buddhiyā āropanaṃ nissāya tirobhūtabhedā “padaṃ ambujamivā”ti evaṃ pākaṭanānattaṃ
analyzed: buddhiyāḥ āropanam nissāya tirobhūta bhedā padam ambujam iva ati evam pākaṭa nānattam

original: vinā “padambuja”nti tirohitabhedā upameva padatthānaṃ sādhammasaṅkhātā upamā eva
analyzed: vinā tirohita bhedā upamā iva pada tthānam sā adhamma saṅkhātā upamā eva

original: rūpakaṃ iti vuccate. Vibhūtasadisattaṃ nissāya upamānopameyyavatthūni abhedena gayhanti.
analyzed: rūpakam iti vuccate vibhūta sadisa ttam nissāya upamāna upameyya vatthūni abhedena gayhanti

original: Tesamabhedaggahaṇeneva te nissāya pavattamānabhinnasādhammasaṅkhātāya upamāyapi bhedo
analyzed: tesam abheda ggahaṇena iva te nissāya pavattamāna bhinna sa adhamma saṅkhātāya bhedaḥ

original: tirohito hoti. Evaṃ tirobhūtanānattavantasādhammasaṅkhātā upamā eva vatthūnamabhedaṃ
analyzed: tirohitaḥ hoti evam upamāḥ eva vatthūnam abhedam

original: dīpetīti rūpakaṃ nāma hotīti adhippāyo. Tirobhūto bhedo yasseti ca, abhedaṃ rūpayati
analyzed: dīpeti iti rūpakam nāma hoti iti adhippāyaḥ tirobhūtaḥ bhedaḥ yassa iti ca abhedam rūpayati

original: pakāsetīti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: pakāsa iti iti ca vākyam

original: Asesavatthuvisayaṃ, ekadesavivatti ca;
analyzed: asesa vatthu visayam eka desa vivatti ca

original: Taṃ dvidhā puna paccekaṃ, samāsādivasā tidhā.
analyzed: tam dvidhā puna tidhā

original: 213. Tassa bhedaṃ niddisati “asesa”iccādinā. Asesavatthu visayo yassa taṃ tathāvidhañca,
analyzed: tassa bhedam niddisati asesa ecca ādinā asesa vatthu visayaḥ yassa tam tathāvidham ca

original: ekadese avayave vivattatīti ekadesavivatti ceti taṃ rūpakaṃ dvidhā, puna paccekaṃ
analyzed: eka dese avayave vivattati iti eka desa vivatti ca iti tam rūpakam dvidhā puna paccekam

original: visuṃ visuṃ samāsādivasā upamānopameyyānaṃ katasamāsattā samāsarūpaka asamāsarūpaka
analyzed: visum visum samāsāt ivasāḥ samāsa rūpaka asamāsa rūpaka

original: samāsāsamāsarūpakavasena tidhā siyā.
analyzed: samāsa asamāsa rūpaka vasena tidhā

original: 213. “Asesi”ccādi. Taṃ rūpakaṃ asesavatthuvisayaṃ ekadesavivatti cāti dvidhā hoti,
analyzed: tat rūpakam asesa vatthu visayam eka desa vivatti ca ati dvidhā hoti

original: puna paccekaṃ taṃ dvayampi samāsādivasā samāsarūpakaṃ asamāsarūpakaṃ samāsāsamāsarūpakañceti
analyzed: puna paccekam tam dvayam pi samāsādivasā samāsa rūpakam asamāsa rūpakam samāsa asamāsa rūpakam ca iti

original: imesaṃ bhedena tidhā hoti. Asesaṃ vatthu visayo asseti ca, ekadese vivattatīti ca,
analyzed: imesam bhedena tidhā hoti asesam vatthu visayaḥ assa iti ca eka dese vivattati iti ca

original: ekaṃ ekaṃ patīti ca, samāso samāsarūpakaṃ ādi yesamiti ca, tesaṃ vaso bhedoti ca,
analyzed: ekam ekam pati iti ca samāsaḥ samāsa rūpakam ādi ca ca

original: tīhi pakārehīti ca viggaho.
analyzed: tīhi pakārehi iti ca viggahaḥ

original: Asesavatthuvisayasamāsa
analyzed: asesa vatthu visaya samāsa

original: Aṅgulīdalasaṃsobhiṃ, nakhadīdhitikesaraṃ;
analyzed: aṅgulī dala saṃsobhim nakha dīdhiti kesaram

original: Sirasā na piḷandhanti, ke munindapadambujaṃ.
analyzed: sirasā na piḷandhanti ke muninda pada ambujam

original: 214. Udāharati “aṅguli”ccādi. Aṅgulīhiyeva upamānagammattā siniddhatambāhi dalehi
analyzed: udāharati dalehi

original: pattehi saṃsobhiṃ accantaṃ virocamānaṃ nakhānaṃ dīdhitiyo kiraṇā eva kesarāni yattha
analyzed: pattehi saṃsobhim accantam virocamānam nakhānam dīdhitiyaḥ kiraṇāḥ eva kesarāni yattha

original: tādisaṃ munindassa padameva ambujaṃ sirasā muddhanā ke nāma janā na piḷandhanti pasādhanavasena
analyzed: tādisam munindassa padam eva ambujam sirasā muddhanā ke nāma janāḥ na piḷandhanti pasādhana vasena

original: na dhārentīti. Idamasesavatthuvisayaṃ samāsarūpakaṃ aṅgino padassa aṅgānamaṅgulyādīnamasesānaṃ
analyzed: na dhārenti iti idam asesa vatthu visayam samāsa rūpakam aṅginaḥ padassa aṅgānam aṅguli ādīnam asesānam

original: rūpanato. Evamuparipi yathāyogaṃ.
analyzed: evam upari pi yathāyogam

original: 214. Idāni udāharati “aṅguli”ccādi. Aṅgulīdalasaṃsobhiṃ aṅgulisaṅkhatehi pattehi
analyzed: idāni udāharati

original: saṃsobhiṃ nakhadīdhitikesaraṃ nakharaṃsisaṅkhatakesaraṃ munindapadambujaṃ sirasā
analyzed: saṃsobhim nakha dīdhiti kesaram nakha raṃsi saṅkhata kesaram muninda pada ambujam sirasā

original: ke na piḷandhanti. Visesyabhūtaṃ caraṇaṃ visesanabhūtā aṅgulī nakhadīdhiti ceti imesaṃ
analyzed: ke na piḷandhanti visesya bhūtam caraṇam visesana bhūtāḥ aṅgulī nakha dīdhiti ca iti

original: upamābhūtehi ambujadalakesarehi abhedakappanāya ekattaṃ gahetvā samāseneva niddiṭṭhattā
analyzed: upamā bhūtehi ambuja dala kesarehi abheda kappanāya ekattam gahetvā samāsena iva niddiṭṭha ttā

original: idaṃ asesavatthuvisayasamāsarūpakaṃ nāma. Aṅguliyo eva dalānīti ca, tehi saṃsobhīti
analyzed: idam asesa vatthu visaya samāsarūpakam nāma aṅguliyaḥ eva dalāni iti ca tehi

original: ca, nakhesu dīdhitiyoti ca, tā eva kesarāni asseti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: ca nakhesu ca tāḥ eva kesarāni ca vākyam

original: Asesavatthuvisayaasamāsa
analyzed: asesa vatthu visaya asamāsa

original: Ratanāni guṇā bhūrī, karuṇā sītalaṃ jalaṃ;
analyzed: ratanāni guṇāḥ bhūrī karuṇā sītalam jalam

original: Gambhīrattamagādhattaṃ, paccakkho’yaṃ jino’mbudhi.
analyzed: gambhīrattam agādhattam jina umbudhi

original: 215. “Ratanāni”iccādi. Ayaṃ jino sammāsambuddho, paccakkho na parokkho amhākaṃ ambudhi
analyzed: ayam jino sammāsambuddho paccakkhaḥ na parokkhaḥ amhākam ambudhi

original: sāgaro. Kathaṃ? Ye tassa bhūrī bahavo guṇā mettādayo, te ratanāni atulyadullabhadassanādisādhammena.
analyzed: sāgaraḥ katham ye tassa bhūrī bahavaḥ guṇāḥ metta ādayaḥ te ratanāni atulya dullabha dassana ādi sādhammena

original: Yā tassa karuṇā, sā sītalaṃ jalaṃ sakalajanasantāpāpahattasādhammena. Yaṃ tassa gambhīrattamanuttānatā
analyzed: yā tassa karuṇā sā sītalam jalam sakala jana santāpa apahatta sādhammena yam tassa gambhīra ttam anuttāna tā

original: lābhādīsu, taṃ agādhattamakalalambhaso ambudhiṭṭhatāsādhammenāti idamasesavatthuvisayaṃ asamāsarūpakaṃ.
analyzed: lābha ādīsu tam ambu dhiṭṭha tāsa dhammena ati idam asesa vatthu visayam asamāsa rūpakam

original: 215. “Ratanāni”ccādi. Ayaṃ jino amhākaṃ paccakkho ambudhi sāgaro, tathā hi tassa
analyzed: ratana anicca ādi ayam jinaḥ amhākam paccakkhaḥ ambudhi sāgaraḥ tathā hi tassa

original: bhūrī guṇā sīlasamādhiādayo ratanāni cittīkatādisādhammato ratanāneva, karuṇā anaññasādhāraṇakaruṇā
analyzed: bhūrī guṇā sīla samādhi ādayaḥ ratanāni karuṇā anañña sādhāraṇa karuṇā

original: sītalaṃ jalaṃ santāpavinodanasādhammena sītalajalameva hoti, gambhīrattaṃ lābhālābhādīsu
analyzed: sītalam jalam santāpa vinodana sādhammena sītala jalam eva hoti gambhīra ttam lābha a lābha ādīsu

original: ekākāratā agādhattaṃ gambhīratā eva hoti. Idaṃ asesavatthuvisayaasamāsarūpakaṃ. “Bhūrī”ti abyayaṃ.
analyzed: eka ākāra tā gambhīra tā eva hoti idam asesa vatthu visaya asamāsa rūpakam bhūri iti abyayam

original: Asesavatthuvisayamissaka
analyzed: asesa vatthu visaya missaka

original: Candikā mandahāsā te, muninda vadaninduno;
analyzed: candikā manda hāsā te muninda

original: Pabodhayatya’yaṃ sādhu-manokumudakānanaṃ.
analyzed: sādhu manaḥ kumuda kānanam

original: 216. “Candikā”iccādi. “Muninda”iccāmantanaṃ, te vadanameva indu vadaninduno iti samāsarūpakaṃ,
analyzed: te vadanam eva indu iti samāsa rūpakam

original: ayaṃ mandahāsā candikā candakantiyo, asamāsarūpakaṃ. Sādhūnaṃ manāniyeva kumudāni

original: Padāvutti
analyzed: pada avutti

original: Vibhāsenti disā sabbā, munino dehakantiyo;
analyzed: vibhāsenti disā sabbāḥ munino deha kantiyaḥ

original: yato evaṃ tasmā kāraṇā candādīnaṃ sabbāpi vibhā sobhā hatā pahatā viya senti pavattantīti padāvutti.

analyzed: ubhaya avutti

analyzed: atthassa padānam ca āvuttitaḥ ubhaya āvutti

original: arīnaṃ vaggoti ca, arāsi rāsi abhavīti ca, kucchito janoti ca vākyaṃ.

analyzed: majjhedīpaka

original: Accantakantalāvaṇya-candātapamanoharo;

original: Mālādīpaka
Hotā’vippaṭisārāya,
analyzed: hotā a vippaṭisārāya

original: Sīlaṃ pāmojjahetu so;

analyzed: passaddha ādi pasiddhiyā

analyzed: ādi dīpaka ādīsu pi tesu payoga kkamena pakāra antaram atthi iti vadati sīlam

original: 232. Idāni navasu dīpakesu payogavisesena sādhetabbe aññappakāre dasseti “hoti”ccādinā.

original: Iccā’didīpakattepi, pubbaṃ pubbamapekkhinī;

original: Aneneva pakārena, sesānamapi dīpake;

original: Vikappānaṃ vidhātabbā-nugatī suddhabuddhibhi.

original: gato pattoyeva, hisaddo samatthane. Sabbe saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā na sassatā na

original: niccā uppādavayadhammattā aniccā. Ayampi hisaddasahitasabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso
analyzed: niccā uppāda vaya dhamma ttā aniccā ayam pi hi sadda sahita sabba byāpī atthantara nyāsaḥ

original: aniccatāya sabbagatattāti.
analyzed: anicca tāya sabba gata ttā ti

original: 241. “Satthā”iccādi. Devamanussānaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena satthā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthehi
analyzed: satthā iccādi deva manussānam ukkaṭṭha vasena satthā diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika tthehi

original: na hontīti. Ayaṃ hisaddasahito aniccatāya sabbagatattā sabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso.

original: Vaso assa atthīti vākyaṃ.
analyzed: vaso assa atthi iti vākyam

original: Hi-rahitavisesaṭṭha
analyzed: hiḥ rahita visesa ṭṭha

original: Jino saṃsārakantārā, janaṃ pāpeti nibbutiṃ;
analyzed: jinaḥ saṃsāra kantārā janam pāpeti nibbutim

analyzed: nanu sāyam vesā rajja samaṅginam

analyzed: jino iccādi jino tatas janam sakalam pi lokam

original: nibbutiṃ pāpeti. Nanu pasiddhiyamanumatiyaṃ vā. Sāyaṃ gati nibbutipāpanasaṅkhātā

original: 242. “Jino”iccādi. Jino janaṃ sattalokaṃ saṃsārakantārā nibbutiṃ pāpeti, sā ayaṃ
analyzed: jinaḥ iccādi jinaḥ janam satta lokam saṃsāra kantārā nibbutim sā ayam

analyzed: hi sadda rahitaḥ atthantara nyāsaḥ vigataḥ sāra daḥ bhayam assa iti ca kassa bhāvaḥ ti ca

original: vuttanayena ñātabbo.

original: Hi-sahitavisesaṭṭha
analyzed: hi sahita visesa ṭṭha

analyzed: su rattam tedharapuṭam jina rañja iti mānasam

analyzed: sāgaraḥ sugataḥ pi ca ati te ubho sattāḥ makara ādayaḥ sāgare

original: bhedassa patīyamānattā.

original: Gammaekabyatireka
analyzed: gamma eka byatireka

analyzed: ca mukham eva mukha mattam mukham ca tam vā mattam sāmaññam ca iti ca tassa nidassanam iti

original: ca vākyaṃ. Mattasaddo avadhāraṇe sāmaññe vā vattate.
analyzed: ca vākyam matta saddaḥ avadhāraṇe sāmaññe vā vattate

original: Paramatthapakāseka-
analyzed: paramattha pakāsa ika

original: Rasā sabbamanoharā;
analyzed: rasā sabba manoharā

original: Munino desanā’yaṃ me,
analyzed: muninaḥ me

original: Kāmaṃ toseti mānasaṃ.
analyzed: kāmam tosā iti mānasam

original: Bhāvakicco kārakahetu.
analyzed: bhāva kicco kāraka hetu

original: 254. Udāharati “paramattha”iccādi. Paramatthasabhāvassa nāmarūpādino pakāsoyeva ekaraso
analyzed: udāharati param attha e c ādi param attha sabhāvassa nāma rūpa ādino ekarasaḥ

analyzed: asahāya kiccam yassā sā tādisī sabbesam manaḥ harati iti sabba manoharā munino ayam desanā

original: 254. Idāni udāharati “paramattha”iccādinā. Paramatthapakāsekarasā nāmarūpakhandhaāyatanādiuttamatthānaṃ

original: pakāsanasaṅkhāta asahāyakiccavatī sabbamanoharā vohārānurūpena visayabhāvūpagamanena
analyzed: pakāsana saṅkhāta asahāya kiccavatī sabba manoharā vohāra anurūpena visaya bhāva upagamanena

analyzed: sabbesam manoharā munino ayam desanā me mayham mānasam kāmam ekantena toseti iti buddhassa

analyzed: dhamma desanā pubbe a vijjamānassa santosassa sattā saṅkhāta samuppādam karoti iti kāraka hetu

analyzed: sa visesanam katvā vutta ttā alaṅkāraḥ iti abhimatā eko ca so raso ca iti ca

original: ekaraso ekakiccamasseti ca viggaho. Bhāvakicco bhāvasaṅkhātaṃ sattākiccaṃ katvā pavatto

original: kārakahetu janakahetu.
analyzed: kāraka hetu janaka hetu

original: Dhīrehi saha saṃvāsā, saddhammassā’bhiyogato;
analyzed: dhīrehi saha saṃvāsā saddhammassa abhiyogataḥ

original: Niggaheni’ndriyānañca, dukkhassu’pasamo siyā.
analyzed: siyā

original: Abhāvakicco kārakahetu.
analyzed: abhāva kicco kāraka hetu

original: 255. “Dhīrehi”ccādi. Dhīrehi sappaññehi saha saṃvāsā saṃsaggena ca, saddhammassa

original: vijayena ca hetunā dukkhassa pañcakkhandhasaṅkhatassa anuppādanirodhasaṅkhāto upasamo
analyzed: vijayena ca hetunā dukkhassa pañca kkhandha saṅkhatassa anuppāda nirodha saṅkhātaḥ upasamaḥ

original: 255. “Dhīrehi”ccādi. Dhīrehi saha saṃvāsā samaggavāsena ca, saddhammassa buddhadesitassa

original: subhādiggahaṇassa nivāraṇena cāti imehi kāraṇehi dukkhassa khandhāyatanādikassa upasamo

original: anuppādanirodho khandhaparinibbānaṃ vā siyāti. Abhiṇhaso yogoti viggaho. Abhāvakicco

original: dukkhassa upasamasaṅkhātaṃ asattākiccaṃ katvā pavatto kārakahetu avijjamānasaṅkhātāya

original: asattāya uppādanato janakahetu nāma. Abhāvo kiccamasseti ca, kārako ca so hetu cāti
analyzed: asattāya uppādanataḥ janaka hetu nāma abhāvaḥ kiccam assa iti ca kārako ca saḥ hetu ca ati

original: ca vākyaṃ. Bhāvakiccopi vuttabyatirekato ñāyati.
analyzed: ca vākyam vutta byatirekataḥ

original: Muninda candasaṃvādi-kantabhāvopasobhinā;
analyzed: muninda canda saṃvādi kanta bhāva upasobhinā

original: Mukheneva subodhaṃ te, manaṃ pāpābhinissaṭaṃ.
analyzed: mukhena iva su bodham te manam pāpa abhinissaṭam

original: Bhāvakicco ñāpakahetu.
analyzed: bhāva kiccaḥ ñāpaka hetu

original: 256. “Munindi”ccādi. Munindeti āmantanaṃ. Te tava candasaṃvādinā candasadisena kantabhāvena
analyzed: munindit ca ādi muninda iti āmantanam te tava canda saṃvādinā canda sadisena kanta bhāvena

original: upasobhinā sobhamānena mukheneva pāpehi rāgādīhi abhinissaṭaṃ byapagataṃ manaṃ cittaṃ

analyzed: su bodham suṭṭhu viññāyati iti ayam bhāva kiccaḥ ñāpaka hetu avabodha sattāya ñāpanato

original: nikkhantanti subodhaṃ suṭṭhu viññāyatīti. Iha mukhaṃ manakantabhāvasambandhena samannāgataṃ

original: ceti ca, tena upasobhitoti ca, pāpehi abhinissaṭanti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: ca iti ca tena upasobhitaḥ iti ca pāpehi ca vākyam

original: Sādhuhatthāravindāni, saṅkocayatite kathaṃ;
analyzed: sādhu hattha aravindāni saṅkocayati te katham

original: Muninda caraṇadvanda-rāgabālātapo phusaṃ.
analyzed: caraṇa dvanda rāga bāla ātapo

original: Ayuttakārī cittahetu.
257. “Sādhu”iccādi. Muninda te caraṇānaṃ dvandassa rāgo bālo ca so ātapo ceti rāgabālātapo
analyzed: sādhu iccā ādi muninda te caraṇānam dvandassa rāgaḥ bālo ca saḥ ca iti rāga bāla ātapo

original: taruṇakiraṇasamūho lohitattādinā sādhūnaṃ hatthāravindāni kantādinā phusaṃ visārittenā’masanto
analyzed: taruṇa kiraṇa samūhaḥ lohita tta ādinā hattha aravindāni kantā ādinā phusam

original: kathaṃ saṅkocayati makulayati, añjalipaṇāmabandhena ayuttametaṃ. Bālātapo hi padumānamummīlanahetu,
analyzed: katham saṅkocayati makulayati añjali paṇāma bandhena ayuttam etam bāla ātapaḥ hi padumānam ummīlana hetu

original: ayaṃ tu apubbo bālātapo yo padumāni nimīletīti anucitakāriyakāraṇā ayuttakārī cittahetu,
analyzed: ayam tu apubbaḥ bāla ātapaḥ yaḥ padumāni nimīleti iti anucita kāriya kāraṇā ayutta kārī citta hetu

original: evaṃvidho viññeyyo bhāvakiccattepīti.
analyzed: evaṃvidhaḥ viññeyyaḥ bhāva kiccatte pi iti

original: 257. “Sādhu”iccādi. He muninda te tava caraṇadvandarāgabālātapo pādayugaḷassa aruṇavaṇṇasaṅkhataabhinavasūriyakiraṇo
analyzed: sādhu iccā ādi he muninda te tava caraṇa dvanda rāga bāla ātapaḥ pāda yugaḷassa aruṇa vaṇṇa saṅkhata abhinava sūriya kiraṇaḥ

original: sādhuhatthāravindāni sujanānaṃ karapadumāni phusaṃ attano sabbabyāpittā phusanto
analyzed: sādhu hattha aravindāni su janānam kara padumāni phusam attanaḥ sabba byāpittā phusantaḥ

analyzed: ayam ayutta kārī citta hetu nāma ayuttam karoti iti ca cittam ca tam hetu ca ati ca vākyam

original: Saṅkocayanti jantūnaṃ, pāṇipaṅkeruhāni’ha;
analyzed: saṅkocayanti pāṇi paṅkeruhān iha

original: Munindacaraṇadvanda-nakhacandāna’maṃsavo.
analyzed: mu ninda caraṇa dvanda nakha canda anamaṃsavaḥ

original: Yuttakārī cittahetu.
258. “Saṅkocayanti”ccādi. Munindassa pādānaṃ dvande nakhā eva candā kantādinā tesaṃ
analyzed: pādānam dvande nakhāḥ eva candā kantā ādinā tesam

original: paṇāmakaraṇasampuṭarūpena milīyantīti milāyayantīti (?) yuttakārī cittahetu candato
paṅkajasaṅkocassa ucitattā. Vuttanayepīti.
analyzed: paṅkaja saṅkocassa ucita ttā vutta naye pi iti

original: 258. “Saṅko”iccādi. Munindacaraṇadvandanakhacandānaṃ sambuddhassa pādadvande nakhāvalisaṅkhātānaṃ

analyzed: saṅkocayanti makulam karonti iti canda kiraṇehi kattabbāya eva paduma saṅkoca sattāya

original: katattā ca, pakaticandakiraṇakattabbakiccassa candamarīcisamānaaññādiṭṭhapubbavicitraaṃsūhi

original: katattā ca ayaṃ yuttakārī cittahetu nāma. Pāṇayo ca te paṅkeruhāni ceti ca, munindassa
analyzed: ca ayam yutta kārī nāma pāṇayaḥ ca te paṅkeruhāni ca iti ca munindassa

original: caraṇadvandamiti ca, tasmiṃ nakhānīti ca, teva candāti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: caraṇa dvandam iti ca tasmin nakhāni iti ca candāti ca vākyam

original: Uddiṭṭhānaṃ padatthānaṃ, anuddeso anudeso (?) yathākkamaṃ;
analyzed: uddiṭṭhānam padatthānam anuddesaḥ anudesaḥ yathākkamam

original: Saṅkhyāna’miti niddiṭṭhaṃ, yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kamopi ca.
analyzed: saṅkhyānam iti niddiṭṭham yathāsaṅkhyam ca

original: 259. Kamaṃ vivaritumupakkamati “uddiṭṭhāna”miccādi. Uddiṭṭhānaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ padatthānaṃ
analyzed: kamam vivaritum upakkamati uddiṭṭhānam iccādi uddiṭṭhānam pubbe vuttānam padatthānam

original: vatthūnaṃ kesañci yathākkamaṃ uddesakkamānatikkamena anuddeso puna atthantaraniddesanayena
analyzed: vatthūnam yathākkamam uddesa kkama anatikkamena anuddesaḥ puna atthantara niddesa nayena

original: anukathanaṃ kathanaṃ (?) “saṅkhyāna”mityapi ca, “yathāsaṅkhya”mityapi ca niddiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: anukathanam kathanam saṅkhyānam iti api ca yathāsaṅkhyam iti api ca niddiṭṭham

original: vuttaṃ. Vidheyyattā tesaṃ padhānattamiti tadapekkhāya napuṃsakattaṃ, anuvaditabbattānuddesassāppadhānattamiti
analyzed: vuttam vidheyya ttā tesam padhāna ttam iti tad apekkhāya napuṃsaka ttam anuvaditabba ttā an uddesassa appadhāna ttam iti

original: na pulliṅgapariggaho. “Kamo”iccapi niddiṭṭhoti liṅgavipariṇāmo.
analyzed: na put liṅga pariggaho niddiṭṭhaḥ ti liṅga vipariṇāmo

original: 259. Idāni kamālaṅkāraṃ uddisati “uddiṭṭhāna”miccādinā. Uddiṭṭhānaṃ paṭhamakathitānaṃ
analyzed: idāni kam ālaṅkāram uddisati uddiṭṭhānam iccādinā uddiṭṭhānam

original: padatthānaṃ yathākkamaṃ uddiṭṭhakkamamanatikkamma anuddeso atthantaraṃ nissāya punakathanaṃ
analyzed: pada tthānam yathākkamam uddiṭṭha kkamam an atikkamma an uddesaḥ atthantaram nissāya punakathanam

original: “saṅkhyāna”miti ca, “yathāsaṅkhya”miti ca niddiṭṭhaṃ, kamopi ca niddiṭṭho. Ettha
analyzed: saṅkhyānam iti ca yathāsaṅkhyam iti ca niddiṭṭham ca niddiṭṭhaḥ ettha

original: pasiddhaṃ anuddesaṃ pubbaddhena anuvaditvā appasiddhaṃ kamampi kamapariyāyaṃ saṅkhyānayathāsaṅkhyadvayampi
analyzed: pasiddham an uddesam pubbaddhena anuvaditvā appasiddham kamam pi kama pariyāyam saṅkhyāna yathāsaṅkhya dvayam pi

original: aparaddhena vidadhāti. Ettha vidhātabbaṃ dassetuṃ anuvādassa āhariyamānattā anuvādo
analyzed: aparaddhena vidadhāti ettha vidhātabbam dassetum anuvādassa āhariyamāna ttā anuvādaḥ

original: appadhāno, vidhātabbo padhāno. Yañhi vidhātabbaṃ, taṃ padhānaṃ, itaramappadhānanti
analyzed: appadhānaḥ vidhātabbaḥ padhānaḥ yat hi vidhātabbam tat padhānam itaram appadhānam ti

original: iminā kāraṇena vuccati. Tasmā “niddiṭṭha”nti “saṅkhyānaṃ, yathāsaṅkhya”nti dvayaṃ
analyzed: iminā kāraṇena vuccati tasmai saṅkhyānam dvayam

original: apekkhāya (tassa appadhānattā) idaṃ padadvayaṃ sīhaḷabyākhyāyaṃ na dissati napuṃsakaṃ
analyzed: apekkhāya tassa appadhāna ttā idam pada dvayam sīhaḷa byākhyāyam na dissati napuṃsakam

original: hoti. “Kamo”ti apekkhāya “niddiṭṭho”ti pulliṅgo hoti. Appadhāno anuddesoti nāpekkhati.
analyzed: hoti kamaḥ iti apekkhāya niddiṭṭho ti pulliṅgaḥ hoti appadhānaḥ anuddeso ti na apekkhati

original: Kamamanatikkammāti ca, saṅkhyāya anabhikkamoti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: ca saṅkhyāya anabhikkamo iti ca vākyam

original: Ālāpahāsalīlāhi, muninda vijayā tava;
analyzed: ālāpa hāsa līlā hi muni nda vijayā tava

original: Kokilā kumudāni co-pasevante vanaṃ jalaṃ.
analyzed: kokilā kumudāni ca upasevante vanam jalam

original: 260. Tamudāharati “ālāpi”ccādinā. Muninda tava ālāpahāsā ca tesaṃ līlāhi, uddesoyaṃ.
analyzed: tam udāharati ālāpi cca ādinā muninda tava ālāpa hāsā ca tesam uddesaḥ yaṃ

original: Vijayā kokilakumudānaṃ parābhavena kokilā karavīkā kumudāni ca, yathoddesamanuddesoyaṃ
analyzed: vijayā kokila kumudānam parābhavena kokilā karavīkā kumudāni ca yathoddesam anuddesaḥ yam

original: vuttāpekkhāya. Vakkhamānāpekkhāya tu ayampi uddesova, “kokilā vanaṃ, kumudāni jala”miti
analyzed: vutta apekkhāya vakkhamāna apekkhāya tu ayam pi uddesaḥ uva kokilāḥ vanam kumudāni jalam iti

original: yathoddesamanuddesoyaṃ. Upasevante iva nissayanti maññe. Iti vatthuto eva sambhavo
analyzed: yathoddesam anuddesaḥ ayam upasevante iva nissayanti maññe iti vatthutaḥ eva sambhavaḥ

original: iveti parikappate. Yajjevaṃ parikappanāya kathaṃ yathāsaṅkhyanti ce? Atroccate –
analyzed: iva iti parikappate yat jevam parikappanāya katham ce atra uccate

original: yatthālaṅkārantaramapi patīyate. Tatthuddesānurūpānuddesasambhave saṅkhyānamevālaṅkāro
analyzed: yatthā alaṅkāra antaram api patīyate saṅkhyānam eva alaṅkāraḥ

original: voharīyate tasseva mukhyato vattumicchitattā. Yatthālaṅkārantaraṃ na gamyate, tattha
analyzed: mukhyatas

original: accantameva kamoti viññeyyaṃ.
analyzed: accantam eva kamo ti viññeyyam

original: 260. Udāharati “ālāpi”ccādinā. He muninda te tava ālāpahāsalīlāhi madhurasaralīlāhi
analyzed: udāharati he muni nda te tava ālāpa hāsa līlā ahi madhura sara līlā ahi

original: saddhiṃ mandahasitalīlāhi sañjātā vijayā jayahetu kokilā karavīkā ca kumudāni keravāni
analyzed: saddhim sañjātāḥ vijayā jaya hetu kokilā karavīkā ca kumudāni keravāni

original: ca vanaṃ jalañca kamena upasevante iva nissayaṃ karontīti maññeti. Ettha “ālāpahāsalīlāhī”ti
analyzed: ca vanam jalam ca kamena upasevante iva nissayam karonti iti maññeti ettha ālāpa hāsa līlā hi iti

analyzed: uddesaḥ uva hoti kokila ādīnam vana ādi nissaya kāraṇa abhāvataḥ iva sadda payogena

analyzed: niddiṭṭhaḥ evam sati ayam parikappanā na bhavati kasmā nānā alaṅkāra sannipāte sati

original: yo yo alaṅkāro vattunā icchito, tasseva mukhyato voharīyamānattā. Evaṃ parikappanālaṅkārasaṃsagge
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ alaṅkāraḥ vattunā icchito tassa iva mukhyatas evam parikappanā alaṅkāra saṃsagge

analyzed: sati pi uddesa kkamena dassitassa anuddesassa mukhya ttā ayam kamālaṅkāraḥ nāma

original: evameva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ālāpo ca hāso ceti ca, tesaṃ līlāyoti ca viggaho.
analyzed: evam eva daṭṭhabbam ālāpo ca hāso ca iti ca tesam līlāyaḥ iti ca viggaho

original: Siyā piyataraṃ nāma, attharūpassa kassaci;
analyzed: siyā piyataram nāma attha rūpassa kassaci

original: Piyassā’tisayene’kaṃ, yaṃ hoti paṭipādanaṃ.
analyzed: piyassa atisayena ikam yam hoti paṭipādanam

original: 261. Piyataramāharati “siyā”iccādinā. Atisayena piyassa kassaci attharūpassa abhidheyyasabhāvassa yaṃ paṭipādanamākhyānaṃ hoti, etaṃ piyataraṃ nāma siyā.
analyzed: piyataram āharati siyā iccādinā atisayena piyassa kassaci attha rūpassa abhidheyya sabhāvassa yam paṭipādanam ākhyānam hoti etam piyataram nāma siyā

original: 261. Idāni piyatarālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “siyā”iccādinā, atisayena piyassa kassaci attharūpassa
analyzed: idāni piyatara alaṅkāram dasseti siyā iccādinā atisayena piyassa kassaci attha rūpassa

original: abhidheyyasabhāvassa yaṃ paṭipādanaṃ kathanaṃ hoti, etaṃ paṭipādanaṃ piyataraṃ nāma
analyzed: abhidheyya sabhāvassa yam paṭipādanam kathanam hoti etam paṭipādanam piyataram nāma

original: piyatarālaṅkāro nāma hoti. Atisayena piyanti ca, attho eva rūpaṃ sabhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: piyatara alaṅkāraḥ nāma hoti atisayena ca attho eva rūpam ca vākyam

original: Pīti yā me samuppannā, santa sandassanā tava;
analyzed: pīti yā me samuppannā santa sandassanā tava

original: Kālenā’yaṃ bhave pīti, taveva puna dassanā.
analyzed: kālena ayam bhave tava iva puna dassanā

original: 262. Udāharati “pīti”ccādi. Santa sappurisa mahāmuni tava sandassanā cakkhupathāpāthamattena
analyzed: udāharati santa sappurisa mahā muni tava sandassanā

original: madhurakathāsavanā yā pīti me mama samuppannā, ayaṃ pīti kālena īdisena sukhena sukhaṇane

original: (?) taveva nāññassa kassaci, ko hi nāmoñño tavādisoti, puna dassanā bhaveyyāti.

original: 262. “Pīti”ccādi. He santa sappurisa tathāgata tava sandassanā mama nette āpāthagamanato
analyzed: he santa sappurisa tathāgata tava sandassanā mama na id te āpātha gamanataḥ

analyzed: yā pi iti me samuppannā ayam pi iti kālena īdisa kkhaṇena tayā sadisassa

original: pīti gahitā yathā “soyeva vaṭṭako vaddhako, tāniyeva osadhānī”ti.
analyzed: pīti gahitā yathā saḥ yā iva vaṭṭakaḥ vaddhakaḥ osadhāni iti

original: Vaṇṇiteno’pamānena, vutyā’dhippetavatthuno;
analyzed: vaṇṇitena upamānena vutyā adhippeta vatthuno

original: Samāsavutti nāmā’yaṃ, atthasaṅkheparūpato.

original: manasi nihitassa vatthuno atthassa vutyā kathanena ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇā samāsavutti
analyzed: manasi nihitassa vatthunaḥ atthassa vutyā kathanena ayaṃ vutta lakkhaṇā samāsa vutti

original: nāma. Kasmā? Atthassa vattumicchitassa saṅkhepo saṅkhipitvā kathanaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo,

original: tasmā tatoyamanvatthasaññā saṅkhepavutti samāsavuttīti katvā. Kasmā? Ayaṃ guṇībhūtā
analyzed: tasmā tatas yam anvattha saññā saṅkhepa vutti samāsa vutti iti katvā kasmai ayam guṇībhūtā

analyzed: sakatthā atthantaram vidadhāti na tu sakattha padhānā

analyzed: vattum icchita atthassa saṅgaha rūpa ttā ayam yathāvutta lakkhaṇā samāsavutti nāma hoti

original: Sā’yaṃ visesyamattena, bhinnā’bhinnavisesanā;

Gambhīro cā’ya’mambhodhi,

analyzed: jinataḥ visesyassa kappa rukkhassa bhinna ttā phala puppha upasobhita tthassa kappa rukkheya iva

analyzed: dosa ābhāsāḥ guṇāḥ eva iddhimanta tā ādayaḥ na dosaḥ api koci sannidhim avaṭṭhānam

original: yanti. Hīti avadhāraṇe atra byājavaṇṇanamevidaṃ, na nindakamiti.
analyzed: yanti hi iti avadhāraṇe atra byāja vaṇṇanam eva idam na nindakam iti

original: 279. Idāni byājavaṇṇanaṃ dasseti “thuti”ccādinā. Nindanto viya dosaṃ dassento viya
analyzed: idāni byāja vaṇṇanam dasseti thuti cca ādinā nindantaḥ viya dosam dassentaḥ viya

original: thutiṃ karoti vaṇṇanaṃ karoti, taṃ vaṇṇanākaraṇaṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ nāma hoti. Nindāsabhāvena
analyzed: thutim karoti vaṇṇanam karoti tam vaṇṇanā karaṇam byājavaṇṇanam nāma hoti nindā sabhāvena

original: pavattathutittā nindā eveti ce? Atra asmiṃ vuttivisese dosābhāsā dosā viya paṭibhāsamānā
analyzed: nindā evā iti ce atra asmin vutti visese dosa ābhāsāḥ dosāḥ viya paṭibhāsamānā

original: guṇā eva tādisapadappayogena iddhimantatādayo guṇāva sannidhiṃ guṇasabhāvāvaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: guṇāḥ eva sannidhim guṇa sabhāva avaṭṭhānam

original: yanti pāpuṇantīti. Byājena vaṇṇanamiti ca, dosā iva ābhāsanti paṭibhāsantīti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: yanti pāpuṇanti iti byājena vaṇṇanam iti ca dosāḥ iva ābhāsanti paṭibhāsanti iti ca vākyam

original: Sañcāletu’malaṃ tvaṃ’si, bhusaṃ kuvalayā’khilaṃ;
analyzed: sañcāletum alam bhusam kuvalaya akhilam

original: Visesaṃ tāvatā nātha, guṇānaṃ te vadāma kiṃ.
analyzed: visesam tāvatā nātha te vadāma kim

original: siliṭṭhaṃ sañcāletuṃ bhamayitumito cito ca bhusamaccantaṃ alaṃ samatthopi tāvatā

original: taṃmattena te guṇānaṃ visesaṃ atisayalakkhaṇaṃ kiṃ kena kāraṇena vadāma. Iha uppalacālanasāmatthiyavibhāvanavasena
analyzed: taṃmattena te guṇānam visesam atisaya lakkhaṇam kim kena kāraṇena vadāma iha uppala cālana sāmatthiya vibhāvana vasena

analyzed: mahā anubhāvam vicitavāti bhuvana maṇḍala sikhāmaṇī iti ramaṇīyam

original: tadidañca sabbathā silesamupajīvati.
analyzed: tat idam ca sabbathā silesam upajīvati

original: 280. Idāni udāharati “sañcāletu”miccādinā. Nātha tvaṃ akhilaṃ kuvalayaṃ nissesaṃ
analyzed: idāni udāharati sañcāletum icca ādinā nātha tvam akhilam kuvalayam

original: nīluppalavanaṃ pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ vā sañcāletuṃ kampetuṃ bhusamatisayena alaṃ samattho,
analyzed: nīluppala vanam pathavī maṇḍalam vā sañcāletum kampetum alam samatthaḥ

analyzed: tāvatā te guṇānam visesam atisayam kim vadāma katham bhaṇāma ati kuvalaya saddassa uppala visesa vācaka ttā

analyzed: paṭhamam tassa iva saddassa pathavī maṇḍala vācaka ttā iddhimataḥ tava idam kim

original: visesa”nti uttamaguṇavaṇṇanā katā hoti. Īdisā byājavaṇṇanā pasatthā, sā ca sabbathā

original: silesaṃ nissāya pavattatīti. Kuyā pathaviyā valayaṃ maṇḍalamiti samāso.
analyzed: silesam nissāya pavattati iti kuyā pathaviyā valayam maṇḍalam iti samāsaḥ

original: Visesi’cchāyaṃ dabbassa, kriyājātiguṇassa ca;
analyzed: visesi chāyam dabbassa kriyā jāti guṇassa ca

original: Vekalladassanaṃ yatra, viseso nāma’yaṃ bhave.
analyzed: vekalla dassanam yatra visesaḥ nāma ayam bhave

original: 281. Visesavuttiṃ vatteti “visesicchāya”miccādinā. Visese atisaye kismiñcipi kāriyavisese
analyzed: visesa vuttim vatta iti visesi chāyam iccādinā visese atisaye kismiñcipi kāriya visese

original: visesavutti nāma bhave.
analyzed: visesavutti nāma bhave

original: 281. Idāni visesālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “visesi”ccādinā. Visesicchāyaṃ atisaye kāriyavisese
analyzed: idāni visesa alaṅkāram dasseti visesa iccādinā atisaye kāriya visese

original: icchāyaṃ sati dabbassa ca kriyājātiguṇassa ca yatra yasmiṃ vuttivisese vekalladassanaṃ

analyzed: abhāva kathanam atthi ayam visesaḥ nāma bhave visesa vutti nāma siyā ati vikalassa bhāvaḥ ti

original: ca, tassa dassanamiti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: ca tassa dassanam iti ca vākyam

original: Na rathā na ca mātaṅgā, na hayā na padātayo;
analyzed: na rathāḥ na ca mātaṅgāḥ na hayāḥ na padātayaḥ

original: Jito mārāri muninā, sambhārāvajjanena hi.
analyzed: jitaḥ mārāri muninā sambhārāvat janena hi

original: Dabbavisesavutti.
analyzed: dabba visesa vutti

original: 282. Udāharati “na rathā”iccādi. Subodhaṃ. Atra ca vijayopakaraṇacaturaṅgānīkalakkhaṇadabbābhāvena samatiṃsapāramitāsaṅkhatasambhārāvajjanasseva mārārivijayalakkhaṇo viseso vutto.
analyzed: udāharati na su bodham atra ca vijaya upakaraṇa caturaṅga anīka lakkhaṇa dabba abhāvena mārāri vijaya lakkhaṇaḥ visesaḥ vuttaḥ

original: 282. “Na rathā”iccādi. Rathā tayo antamaso saparivārānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rathānaṃ anīkavohārato
analyzed: na rathā iccādi rathā tayaḥ antamasaḥ sa parivārānam tiṇṇam rathānam anīka vohārato

original: tādisā tayo rathā ca natthi. Mātaṅgā tayo vuttanayena anīkasaṅkhātā tayo mātaṅgā
analyzed: tādisā tayo rathā ca natthi mātaṅgā tayo anīka saṅkhātā tayo mātaṅgā

original: ca natthi. Na hayā tayo tādisā anīkasaṅkhātā tayo assā ca natthi. Padā na antamaso
analyzed: ca natthi na hayā tayo tādisā anīka saṅkhātā tayo assā ca natthi padā na antamaso

original: sāyudhānaṃ catunnaṃ purisānaṃ anīkavohārato tādisā cattāro purisā padā ca natthi.
analyzed: sa āyudhānam catunnam purisānam anīka vohārato tādisā cattāro purisā padā ca natthi

original: Tathāpi muninā sambhārāvajjanena hi samatiṃsapāramidhammānaṃ ābhogakaraṇeneva mārāri

analyzed: māra paccattikaḥ jitaḥ abhibhavitaḥ iha jaya upakaraṇa bhāvena ṭhitānam ratha anīka ādīnam

original: esā dabbavisesavutti nāma. Ratho nāma catupurisaparivāro, tādisaṃ rathattayaṃ rathānīkaṃ

original: nāma. Hatthī pana dvādasapurisaparivāro hoti, tādisaṃ hatthittayaṃ hatthānīkaṃ nāma.
analyzed: nāma hatthī pana dvādasa purisa parivāraḥ hoti tādisam hatthittayam hatthānīkam nāma

original: Asso tipurisaparivāro, tādisaṃ hayattayaṃ hayānīkaṃ nāma. Sāyudhā cattāro purisā
analyzed: assaḥ ti purisa parivāraḥ tādisam hayattayam hayānīkam nāma sa āyudhā cattāro purisā

original: padānīkaṃ nāma. Iha rathādīsu ṭhitā viya sīghaṃ pādabalena gantvā yujjhamānā purisā

original: pādopacārena “pādā”ti vuttā. Rathādīnaṃ pamāṇaṃ tayoti anīkaṭṭhāne dassetvā purisapamāṇassāvuttepi
analyzed: pāda upacārena pādā ati vuttāḥ ratha ādīnam pamāṇam tayaḥ ti anīkaṭṭhāne dassetvā

analyzed: padāti saddassa padātayaḥ ti bahuvacanena rūpa sambhavataḥ rathāḥ na mātaṅgāḥ na hayā

analyzed: na padātayaḥ na iti sambandhaḥ dabba visesa vutti dabbena dabba paṭisedhanataḥ visesa kathanam

original: visesassa vuttīti ca, dabbena dabbapaṭisedhena visesavuttīti ca vākyaṃ. Kriyāvisesavutyādittayampi evameva daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: visesassa vutti iti ca dabbena dabba paṭisedhena visesa vutti iti ca vākyam evam eva daṭṭhabbam

original: Na baddhā bhūkuṭineva, phurito dasanacchado;
analyzed: na baddhā bhūkuṭinā iva phuritaḥ dasanacchadaḥ

analyzed: muni vīraḥ sayam

original: Kriyāvisesavutti.

original: tesaṃ bhaṅgoti ca vākyaṃ.

analyzed: disāsu dasasu byattā patthaṭā raṃsi na bhavati loke sakalasmin patthaṭaḥ

original: Na kharaṃ na hi vā thaddhaṃ, muninda vacanaṃ tava;

285. “Na khara”miccādi. Muninda tava vacanaṃ na kharaṃ na lūkhaṃ, na thaddhaṃ vā

285. “Na khara”miccādi. He muninda tava vacanaṃ kharaṃ kakkasaṃ na hoti, thaddhaṃ
analyzed: na kharam iccādi he muninda tava vacanam kharam kakkasam na

original: Vadanti viññū vacanaṃ,

analyzed: ruḍha ahaṅkāram vadanti

original: ruḷhāhaṅkāramiti vadantīti. Sūro ca vīro cāti ca, tesaṃ bhāvoti ca, ruḷho uggato

original: Dame nandopanandassa,

original: Kiṃ me byāpāradassanā;

original: Puttā me pādasambhattā,

original: Abhinnapadavākyādi-

original: Vasā tedhā’ya’mīrito.

original: 288. Silesaṃ niddisati “sileso”iccādinā. Anekaṃ bhinnamabhidheyyattho yassātyanekābhidheyyaṃ.

original: Andhantamaharo hārī, samāruḷho mahodayaṃ;
analyzed: hārī samāruḍhaḥ mahodayam

original: Rājate raṃsimālī’yaṃ, bhagavā bodhayaṃ jane.
analyzed: rājate raṃsimālīyam bhagavā jane

original: Abhinnapadavākyasileso.
analyzed: abhinna pada vākya si lesaḥ

analyzed: tāva tu andhakāra moha tama apahārī

original: niddāpagamanena kilesaniddāpagamanena vā pabodhayanto rājate dibbatīti. Abhinnapadavākyasileso

original: Sāradāmalakābhāso, samānītaparikkhayo;
analyzed: sārada āmalaka ābhāsaḥ samānīta parikkhayo

original: Kumudākarasambodho, pīṇeti janataṃ sudhī.
analyzed: kumuda ākara sambodhaḥ janatam sudhī

original: Bhinnapadavākyasileso.
analyzed: bhinna pada vākya si lesaḥ

original: Sudhī sudhāsaṅkhātaamatavantatāya tannāmako cando, sundarapaññavantatāya tannāmako

analyzed: atthi iti ca su sobhanā dhī buddhi assa sambuddhassa ati ca viggaho

original: Samāhitattavinayo, ahīnamadamaddano;
Sugato visadaṃ pātu, pāṇinaṃ so vināyako.
analyzed: sugataḥ visadam pātu saḥ vināyakaḥ

original: Bhinnābhinnapadavākyasileso.
analyzed: bhinna abhinna pada vākya si lesaḥ

original: 291. “Samāhite”ccādi. Saṃ sammā āhito patiṭṭhāpito attassa vinayo vinayanaṃ sabbattha
analyzed: samāhita iccādi sam sammā āhitaḥ patiṭṭhāpitaḥ attassa vinayaḥ vinayanam sabbattha
