analyzed: gatiyā samannāgato sammā āhitena ṭhapitena citta damanena samannāgataḥ vā ahīna mada maddano

original: nāgarājūnaṃ madamaddano, ahīnānaṃ uttamānaṃ bakabrahmādīnampi madamaddano vā, sugato
analyzed: nāga rājūnam mada maddanaḥ ahīnānam uttamānam baka brahma ādīnam pi mada maddanaḥ vā sugataḥ

original: pakkhavātavegena samuddajalaṃ dvidhā katvā tasmiṃ jale anekībhūteyeva nāgabhavanaṃ
analyzed: pakkha vāta vegena samudda jalam dvidhā katvā tasmin jale nāga bhavanam

original: gantvā nāge gahetvā gamane samatthattā sundaragamano, samantabhaddakaanekappakāragamano
analyzed: gantvā nāge gahetvā gamane samattha ttā sundara gamano samanta bhaddaka aneka ppakāra gamano

original: vā, vināyako pakkhīnaṃ nāyako so garuḷarājā visadaṃ ghoravisattā visadāyakaṃ pāṇinaṃ
analyzed: vā vināyako pakkhīnam so garuḷa rājā visadam ghoravisattā visadāyakam

original: nāgalokaṃ pātu ahiṃsanavasena pāletu. No ce, vināyako veneyye vinento so sammāsambuddho
analyzed: nāga lokam pātu ahiṃsana vasena pāletu no ce vināyakaḥ veneyye vinento saḥ sammāsambuddho

original: pāṇinaṃ sakalasattalokaṃ visadaṃ visāradaṃ katvā pātu ahitāpanayanahitopanayanena
analyzed: pāṇinam sakala satta lokam visadam visāradam katvā pātu ahita apanayana hita upanayanena

original: rakkhatūti. Ubhayapakkhesu “ahīnamadamaddano”iccādikehi bhinnehi ca “samāhitattavinayo”iccādikehi
analyzed: rakkhatu uti ubhaya pakkhesu ahīna mada maddana uicca ādikehi bhinnehi ca samāhita tta vinaya uicca ādikehi

original: abhinnehi ca padehi samannāgatattā ayaṃ bhinnābhinnapadavākyasileso. Attassa vinayoti
analyzed: abhinnehi ca padehi samannāgata ttā ayam bhinna abhinna pada vākya silesaḥ attassa vinayo ti

original: ca, samāhito attavinayo yassa garuḷassa tathāgatassa vāti ca, ahīnaṃ inā nāyakāti
analyzed: ca samāhitaḥ atta vinayaḥ yassa garuḷassa tathāgatassa vāti ca ahīnam inā nāyakā ati

original: ca, ahīnānaṃ nāgarājūnaṃ madoti ca, hīnehi aññe ahīnā uttamā, tesaṃ madoti ca, taṃ
analyzed: ca ahīnānam nāga rājūnam ca hīnehi aññe ahīnāḥ uttamā tesam ca tam

original: maddatīti ca, vīnaṃ pakkhīnaṃ nāyakoti ca, veneyyajane vinetīti ca vākyaṃ. Dutiyapakkhe
analyzed: maddati iti ca vīnam pakkhīnam nāyako ti ca veneyya jane vineti iti ca vākyam dutiya pakkhe

original: “visada”nti kriyāvisesanaṃ.
analyzed: visadanti kriyā visesanam

original: Viruddhāviruddhābhinna-kammā niyamavā paro;
analyzed: viruddha aviruddha abhinna kammā niyamavā paraḥ

original: Niyamakkhepavacano, avirodhi virodhya’pi.
analyzed: niyama kkhepa vacanaḥ avirodhi virodhi api

original: Ocityasamposakādi, sileso padajādi’ti padajātipi (ka.);
analyzed: ocitya samposaka ādi si lesaḥ pada jāt iti pada jātipi ka

original: Esaṃ nidassanesveva, rūpa’māvibhavissati.
analyzed: nidassanesu eva rūpam āvibhavissati

original: 292-3. Silesabhedamaññathāpi dassetumāha “viruddha”iccādi. Viruddhāni cāviruddhāni
analyzed: silesa bhedam aññathā api dassetum āha viruddha e c ca ādi viruddhāni ca aviruddhāni

original: ca aññamabhinnañca, tāniyeva kammāni kriyāni yesaṃ, te tayo silesā. Niyamo’vadhāraṇamasmiṃ
analyzed: ca aññam abhinnam ca tāniyā iva kammāni kriyāni yesam te

original: atthīti niyamavā, paro añño silesopi. Niyamassa akkhepo nisedhanaṃ yassa, taṃ vacanamabhidhānaṃ
analyzed: atthi iti niyama vā paraḥ aññaḥ silesaḥ api niyamassa akkhepaḥ nisedhanam yassa tam vacanam abhidhānam

original: yassa, tādisopi. Nāssa virodho atthītyavirodhi, sopi. Virodho asaṅgati ettha vijjatīti
analyzed: yassa tādisaḥ api na assa virodhaḥ atthi iti avirodhi saḥ api virodhaḥ ettha vijjati iti

original: virodhi, sopi. Ocityaṃ samposetīti ocityasamposako, so ādi yassa alaṅkārantaragocarassa
analyzed: virodhi saḥ api ocityam samposeti iti ocitya samposako so ādi yassa alaṅkāra antara gocarassa

original: silesassa, so padato jātādisilesopi. Itite parepi silesabhedā santi. Esaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ
analyzed: silesassa saḥ padataḥ jāta ādi silesaḥ api iti te pare pi silesa bhedāḥ santi yathā vuttānam

original: nidassanesu payogesveva rūpaṃ sabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ āvibhavissatīti.
analyzed: nidassanesu payogesu eva rūpam sabhāvaḥ lakkhaṇam āvibhavissati iti

original: 292-3. Avuttasilesavisese dassetuṃ uddisati “viruddhā”iccādi. Viruddhāviruddhābhinnakammā
analyzed: a vutta silesa visese dassetum uddisati viruddha iccādi viruddha aviruddha abhinna kammā

original: api ubhayatthassa viruddhena ca aviruddhena ca abhinnena ca kammena samanvitā tayo
analyzed: api ubhayatthassa viruddhena ca aviruddhena ca abhinnena ca kammena samanvitā

original: silesā ca, paro añño niyamavāpi avadhāraṇena yuttasileso ca, niyamakkhepavacanopi
analyzed: ca paraḥ aññaḥ niyamavā api avadhāraṇena yutta sileso ca niyama kkhepa vacanaḥ api

original: avadhāraṇassa paṭisedhapakāsakābhidhānasileso ca, avirodhipi ubhayapakkhāvirodhisileso
analyzed: avadhāraṇassa paṭisedha pakāsaka abhidhāna sileso ca avirodhi pi ubhaya pakkha avirodhi sileso

original: ca, virodhiapi ubhayatthassa virodhisileso ca, padajādi padena jāto vākyena jāto
analyzed: ca ubhayatthassa virodhi silesaḥ ca pada ja ādi padena jātaḥ vākyena jātaḥ

original: ocityasamposakādisilesopīti esaṃ silesānaṃ nidassanesveva nidassanasaṅkhataudāharaṇesveva
analyzed: ocitya samposaka ādi silesaḥ api iti esam silesānam nidassanesu eva nidassana saṅkhata udāharaṇesu eva

original: rūpaṃ sarūpaṃ tesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vā āvibhavissati, nidassiyamānaudāharaṇeneva lakkhaṇassa
analyzed: rūpam sarūpam tesam lakkhaṇam vā āvibhavissati lakkhaṇassa

original: gammamānattā visuṃ na kathessāmīti adhippāyo. Viruddhāni ca aviruddhāni ca abhinnañceti
analyzed: visum na kathessāmi iti adhippāyaḥ viruddhāni ca aviruddhāni ca abhinnam ca iti

original: ca, tameva kammaṃ kriyā yesaṃ silesānamiti ca, niyamo avadhāraṇaṃ asmiṃ atthīti ca,
analyzed: ca tam eva kammam kriyā silesānam iti ca niyamaḥ avadhāraṇam asmin atthi iti ca

original: niyamassa akkhepo paṭisedho assa atthīti ca, taṃ vacanaṃ abhidhānaṃ yassa silesassāti
analyzed: niyamassa akkhepaḥ paṭisedhaḥ assa atthi iti ca tam vacanam abhidhānam yassa silesassa ati

original: ca, nāssa virodho atthīti ca, ocityaṃ samposetīti ca, so ādi yassa upamāsilesādinoti
analyzed: ca na assa virodhaḥ atthi iti ca ocityam samposeti iti ca saḥ ādi yassa

original: ca, padato jātoti ca, so ādi yassa vākyassāti ca viggaho.
analyzed: ca padataḥ jātaḥ iti ca saḥ ādi yassa vākyassa ati ca viggahaḥ

original: Viruddhakammasilesa
analyzed: viruddha kamma silesa

original: Savase vattayaṃ lokaṃ, akhilaṃ kallaviggaho kalaviggaho (sī.);
analyzed: lokam akhilam kalla viggaho kala viggaho sī

original: Parābhavati mārāri, dhammarājā vijambhate.
analyzed: parābhavati mārāri dhammarājā vijambhate

original: 294. Tato kamena tedassīyanti “savase”iccādi. Akhilaṃ lokaṃ savase vattayaṃ mārāri
analyzed: akhilam lokam mārāri

original: dhammarājā ca, kallo manuñño viggaho kalaho yassa mārārino, viggaho sarīrasampadā
analyzed: dhammarājā ca kallaḥ manuññaḥ viggahaḥ kalahaḥ yassa māra arino viggahaḥ sarīra sampadā

original: yassa dhammarājassa, tesu mārāri parābhavati parābhavamapeti bodhiyaṃ paṭiladdhaparājayavasena,
analyzed: yassa dhamma rājassa tesu mārāri parābhavati parābhavam apeti bodhiyam paṭiladdha parājaya vasena

original: dhammarājā samantabhaddo tu vijambhate lokattayabyāpisamullapitavijayaddhanipavattivasena
analyzed: dhamma rājā samantabhaddaḥ tu vijambhate

original: samaṃ bhavatīti ayaṃ viruddhakammasileso parābhavavijambhanānamaññoññavirodhato.
analyzed: samam bhavati iti ayam viruddha kamma sileso parābhava vijambha nānam aññoñña virodhato

original: 294. Idāni uddesakkamena udāharati “savase”iccādi. Akhilaṃ lokaṃ savase vattayaṃ
analyzed: idāni uddesa kkamena udāharati akhilam lokam

original: anatthe yuñjanato attano vase vattayanto, no ce, sakalalokaṃ hite yuñjanato attano
analyzed: anatthe yuñjanataḥ attanaḥ vase vattayantaḥ no ce sakala lokam hite yuñjanataḥ attanaḥ

original: vase vattayanto kallaviggaho manuññakalaho, no ce, manuññasarīrasampattiyutto mārāri
analyzed: vase vattayantaḥ kalla viggahaḥ manuñña kalahaḥ no ce manuñña sarīra sampatti yuttaḥ

original: parābhavati bodhimūle laddhaparājayavasena parābhavaṃ pāpuṇāti, dhammarājā tathāgato
analyzed: parābhavati bodhi mūle laddha parājaya vasena parābhavam pāpuṇāti dhamma rājā tathāgataḥ

original: pana vijambhate lokattaye patthaṭajayaghosavasena vijambhatīti. Parābhavanavijambhanakriyānaṃ
analyzed: pana vijambhate lokattaye patthaṭa jaya ghosa vasena vijambhati iti parābhavana vijambhana kriyānam

original: aññamaññaviruddhattā ayaṃ viruddhakammasileso nāma. Sassa attano vaso issariyamiti
analyzed: añña mañña viruddha ttā ayam viruddha kamma silesaḥ nāma sassa attanaḥ vaso issariyam iti

original: ca, kallo manuñño viggaho vivādo deho vā yasseti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: ca kallaḥ manuññaḥ viggahaḥ vivādaḥ dehaḥ vā yassa iti ca vākyam

original: Aviruddhakammasilesa
analyzed: a viruddha kamma silesa

original: Sabhāvamadhuraṃ puñña-visesodayasambhavaṃ;
analyzed: sabhāva madhuram puñña visesa udaya sambhavam

original: Suṇanti vācaṃ munino, janā passanti cā’mataṃ.
analyzed: suṇanti vācam muninaḥ janāḥ passanti ca amatam

original: 295. “Sabhāve”ccādi. Sabhāveneva madhurā piyā vācā, madhuraṃ amataṃ, puññavisesassa
analyzed: sabhāva iccādi sabhāvena iva madhurā piyā vācā madhuram amatam puñña visesassa

original: udayo abhivaḍḍhi, tena sambhavo, yassa vā taṃ, munino vācaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ janā
analyzed: udayaḥ abhivaḍḍhi tena sambhavaḥ yassa vā tam muninaḥ vācam saddhamma saṅkhātam janāḥ

original: suṇanti, tassayaṃ amatañca tassa ca nissayaṃ amatanti (ka.) passantīti ayamaviruddhakammasileso
analyzed: suṇanti tassayam amatañca tassa ca nissayam amatanti ka passanti iti ayam aviruddha kamma sileso

original: savanadassanānaṃ aviruddhattāti.
analyzed: savana dassanānam a viruddha ttā ati

original: 295. “Sabhāva”miccādi. Sabhāvamadhuraṃ “vācāmadhuraṃ karissāmī”ti kattabbapayogaṃ
analyzed: sabhāvam iccādi sabhāva madhuram vācā madhuram karissāmi iti kattabba payogam

analyzed: vinā api madhura ttā pakati madhuram no ce kenacid paccayena anuppanna ttā saṅkhara visesam

original: vināpi pakatipaṇītaṃ, puññavisesodayasambhavaṃ puññavisesadesakassa munino kassaci
analyzed: vinā api pakati paṇītam puña visesa udaya sambhavam puñña visesa desakassa munino kassaci

analyzed: kusala visesassa abhivuddhiyā sambhūtam no ce veneyya janānam nibbāna adhippāyena kata kusala visesassa

original: nibbānañca janā veneyyajanā passantīti. Savanadassanakriyānaṃ aññamaññāviruddhattā
analyzed: nibbānam ca janāḥ veneyya janā passanti iti savana dassana kriyānaṃ aññamañña a viruddha ttā

original: ayaṃ aviruddhakammasileso. Sassa attano bhāvoti ca, tena madhurā, madhuramiti ca,
analyzed: ayam a viruddha kamma silesaḥ sassa attanaḥ bhāvaḥ iti ca tena madhurāḥ madhuram iti ca

original: puññameva visesoti ca, tassodayoti ca, tena sambhavo yasseti ca viggaho.
analyzed: puññam eva visesaḥ ti ca tassa udayaḥ ti ca tena sambhavaḥ yassa iti ca viggahaḥ

original: Abhinnakammasilesa
analyzed: abhinna kamma silesa

original: Andhakārāpahārāya,
analyzed: andhakāra apahārāya

original: Sabhāvamadhurāya ca;
analyzed: sabhāva madhurāya ca

original: Mano pīṇeti dhinoti jantūnaṃ,
analyzed: manaḥ pīṇa iti dhinoti jantūnam

original: Jino vācāya bhāya ca.
analyzed: jinaḥ vācāya bhāya ca

original: 296. “Andhakāre”ccādi. Andhakāraṃ mohasaṅkhātaṃ pakatiandhakāraṃ vā apaharatīti andhakārāpahārā,
analyzed: andhakāra iccā ādi andhakāram moha saṅkhātam pakati andhakāram vā apaharati iti andhakāra apahārā

original: vācā, bhā ca. Tāya sabhāvabhāsāya, sobhāya ca jino jantūnaṃ mano cittaṃ pīṇetīti
analyzed: vācā bhā ca tāya sabhā avabhāsāya sobhāya ca jinaḥ jantūnam mano cittam pīṇeti iti

original: ayamabhinnakammasileso pīṇanalakkhaṇāyekāya kriyāya vācāya bhāya ca sampannoti.
analyzed: ayam abhinna kamma silesaḥ pīṇana lakkhaṇāya ekāya kriyāya vācāya bhāya ca sampannoti

original: 296. “Andhakārā”iccādi. Andhakārāpahārāya mohandhakāraṃ pakatiandhakāraṃ vā apaharaṇāya
analyzed: andhakāra apahārāya moha ndhakāram pakati andhakāram vā apaharaṇāya

original: sabhāvamadhurāya ca sabhāvato kaṇṇasukhāya, sabhāvato nettābhirāmāya vācāya bhāya
analyzed: sabhāva madhurāya ca sabhāvataḥ kaṇṇa sukhāya sabhāvataḥ nettā abhirāmāya vācāya bhāya

original: sarīrakantiyā ca jino jantūnaṃ mano cittaṃ dhinoti pīṇetīti. Pīṇayanasabhāvāya ekāya
analyzed: sarīra kantiyā ca jinaḥ jantūnam mano cittam dhinoti pīṇeti iti pīṇayana sabhāvāya ekāya

original: kriyāya saddhiṃ karaṇabhūtānaṃ dvinnaṃ vācābhānaṃ yojitattā ayaṃ abhinnakammasileso.
analyzed: kriyāya saddhim karaṇa bhūtānam dvinnam vācā ābhānam ayam abhinna kamma sileso

original: Andhakāra’mapaharatīti ca, sabhāvena madhurāti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: andhakāram apaharati iti ca sabhāvena ca vākyam

original: Niyamavantasilesa
analyzed: niyamavant asilesa

original: Kesakkhīnaṃva kaṇhattaṃ, samūnaṃyeva vaṅkatā;
analyzed: kesa khīnam iva kaṇhattam samūnam yā iva vaṅka tā

original: Pāṇipādādharānaṃva, munindassā’tirattatā.
analyzed: muni dassa ati ratta tā

original: 297. “Kesi”ccādi. Kaṇhattaṃ kesakkhīnaṃyeva, na manasi, kaṇhattaguṇo pāpattañca siliṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: kesicca ādi kaṇhattam na manasi kaṇhatta guṇaḥ pāpattam ca siliṭṭham

original: Vaṅkatā bhamūnaṃyeva, na ajjhāsaye, vaṅkatānatattaṃ saṭhattañca siliṭṭhaṃ. Atirattatā
analyzed: vaṅka tā na ajjhāsaye

original: pāṇipādādharānaṃyeva, na citte, atirattatāguṇo rāgo ca silissate. “Munindassā”ti
analyzed: na citte ati ratta tā guṇaḥ rāgo ca silissate munindassa ati

original: “kaṇhatta”ntiādīsu sabbattha sambandhanīyaṃ. Niyamavā sileso kesakkhīnaṃvāti avadhāraṇappayogāti.
analyzed: kaṇhatta nti ādīsu sabbattha sambandhanīyam niyama vā silesaḥ avadhāraṇa ppayogā ti

original: 297. “Kesakkhīna”miccādi. Munindassa kaṇhattaṃ kesakkhīnaṃ eva hoti, kaṇhattasaṅkhatamakusalaṃ
analyzed: kesa khīnam iccādi muni ndassa kaṇhattam kesa khīnam eva hoti kaṇhatta saṅkhata makusalam

original: na citte. Vaṅkatā bhamūnaṃyeva, najjhāsaye. Atirattatā pāṇipādādharānaṃ eva, na kesuci
analyzed: na citte vaṅka tā eva na kaścisu

original: vatthūsūti. “Kesakkhīnaṃvā”tiādīsu niyamasaṅkhātaavadhāraṇapadassa vijjamānattā kaṇhabhāvena
analyzed: vatthūsu iti kesa kkhīnam vā iti ādīsu niyama saṅkhāta avadhāraṇa padassa vijjamāna ttā kaṇha bhāvena

original: saddhiṃ pāpattassa ca, vaṅkaguṇena saddhiṃ sāṭheyyassa ca, rattaguṇena saddhiṃ rāgassa
analyzed: saddhim pāpattassa ca vaṅka guṇena saddhim sāṭheyyassa ca ratta guṇena saddhim rāgassa

original: ca siliṭṭhattā ayaṃ niyamavantasileso nāma. Kesāni ca akkhīni ceti ca, kaṇhassa bhāvoti
analyzed: ca siliṭṭha ttā ayam niyamavantasilesaḥ nāma kesāni ca akkhīni ca iti ca kaṇhassa bhāvaḥ ti

original: ca, vaṅkassa bhāvoti ca, pāṇayo ca pādāni ca adharāni cāti ca, atirattassa bhāvoti ca viggaho.
analyzed: ca vaṅkassa bhāvaḥ ti ca pāṇayaḥ ca pādāni ca adharāni ca ati ca ati rattassa bhāvaḥ ti ca viggahaḥ

original: Niyamakkhepasilesa
analyzed: niyama kkhepa silesa

original: Pāṇipādādharesveva, sārāgo tava dissati;
analyzed: pāṇi pāda adharesu eva sa ārāgo tava dissati

original: Dissate so’ya’matha vā, nātha sādhuguṇesvapi.
analyzed: dissate saḥ uyam atha vā nātha sādhu guṇesu api

original: 298. “Pāṇi”ccādi. Nātha tava pāṇipādādharesveva sārāgo sobhano rattavaṇṇo dissati,
analyzed: pāṇi cca ādi nātha tava pāṇi pāda adharesu eva sa rāgaḥ sobhanaḥ ratta vaṇṇo dissati

original: na citte, sārāgo rattavaṇṇo chandarāgo cāti siliṭṭhaṃ. Ayaṃ niyamo akkhipyate. Atha
analyzed: na citte sā rāgaḥ ratta vaṇṇo chanda rāgo ca ati siliṭṭham ayam niyamaḥ akkhipyate atha

original: vā kathaṃ niyamyate, yato so ayaṃ sārāgo sādhūnaṃ guṇesveva virāgalakkhaṇo dissate
analyzed: vā katham niyamyate yatas saḥ ayam sa ārāgaḥ sādhūnam guṇesu eva virāga lakkhaṇaḥ dissate

original: iti. Tasmā kathamavadhārīyatīti niyamakkhepavacano silesoyaṃ.
analyzed: iti tasmai katham avadhārīyati iti niyama kkhepa vacanaḥ

original: 298. “Pāṇi”ccādi. He nātha tava sārāgo sobhano rattavaṇṇo pāṇipādādharesveva dissati,
analyzed: pāṇi cca ādi he nātha tava sā rāgaḥ sobhanaḥ ratta vaṇṇo pāṇi pāda adharesu eva dissati

original: citte lobho pana na dissati. Atha vā so ayaṃ sārāgo kattukamyatākusalacchandabhūto
analyzed: citte lobho pana na dissati atha vā saḥ ayam sa ārāgo kattu kamya tā kusala chanda bhūto

original: sādhuguṇesvapi sajjanānaṃ sīlādiguṇesupi dissati. “Evā”ti dassitaniyamassa paṭisedhakena

original: Avirodhisilesa

original: Salakkhaṇo’tisubhago,

analyzed: vibhāti samaṇissaraḥ

analyzed: salakkhaṇaḥ iccādi salakkhaṇaḥ lakkhaṇena sahitaḥ ati subhagaḥ ati sundarāya lakkhiyā

original: Virodhisilesa
analyzed: virodhi silesa

original: Asamopi samo loke,
analyzed: asamaḥ api samaḥ loke

analyzed: sa daya upya dayaḥ pāpe

analyzed: cittā ayam muninaḥ gati

analyzed: natthi samaḥ rāja guṇa ādīhi assa ati asamaḥ koci rāja ādi asamaḥ ti

original: lokekasikhāmaṇibhāvena muni. Tattha yadā asamo rājādi, tadā loke samoti viruddhaṃ
analyzed: loka ika sikhāmaṇi bhāvena yadā asamaḥ rāja ādi tadā loke viruddham

analyzed: tassa api saddaḥ virodham jotā iti pakkha antare tu aviruddham loke devadatta ādīnam

analyzed: brahmā ca tattha brahmā naruttamo ti viruddham

analyzed: tassa pakkhantare tassa dayaḥ dānam saha dayena ati sa dayaḥ

analyzed: virujjhati muni pāpe rāga ādike virujjhati tasmai muninaḥ ayam yathā vuttā gati

original: pavatti cittā abbhutāti ayaṃ vuttanayena virodhisileso udāhaṭo.
analyzed: cittā abbhutā ati ayam vutta nayena virodhi silesaḥ udāhaṭaḥ

original: 300. “Asamo”iccādi. Asamopi atulyopi koci rājādiko loke samo tulyo, no ce, sadisapuggalarahito

analyzed: akusale niddayaḥ muninaḥ ayam rāja ādinaḥ asamasama tā ca

analyzed: ca viruddhaḥ hoti tasmā rāja brahma purisehi munino ayam virodhi silesaḥ

original: nāma. Pubbapubbapakkhe virodho aparāparapakkhehi nirākato hoti. Pubbapakkhe apisaddo
analyzed: nāma pubba pubba pakkhe virodhaḥ apara apara pakkhehi nirākataḥ hoti pubba pakkhe api saddaḥ

original: virodhaṃ joteti, aparapakkhe avadhāraṇanti. Natthi samo yasseti ca, naro ca so uttamo
analyzed: virodham jotā iti apara pakkhe avadhāraṇanti natthi samaḥ yassa iti ca naro ca so uttamo

original: ceti ca, saha dayena dayāya vā vattamānoti ca, natthi dayo dayā vā asseti ca viggaho.
analyzed: ca iti ca saha dayena dayāya vā vattamānaḥ iti ca na atthi dayaḥ dayā vā assa iti ca viggahaḥ

original: Ocityasamposakapadasilesa
analyzed: ocitya samposaka pada si lesa

analyzed: bhavati sā tulya yogitā ati matā ati guṇehi yuttā ati ca tulyena guṇena saha ca

original: uttiviseso tadatthiyena tulyayogitāti ñeyyā.
analyzed: tulya yogitā ati ñeyyā

original: Sampattasammado loko,

original: Sampattālokasampado;
analyzed: sampattā loka sampadaḥ

original: Ubhohi raṃsimālī ca,
analyzed: raṃsi mālī ca

analyzed: bhagavā ca tamonudaḥ

analyzed: udāharati tamam nudati iti tamonudaḥ raṃsimālī ca atha

analyzed: ettha pīti dāna ādi guṇa yuttena raṃsimālinā samam katvā bhagavataḥ thuti vasena

analyzed: ca ca ca hoti iti ettha pīti dāna āloka karaṇa saṅkhāta guṇa yuttena sūriyena

analyzed: atthantaram sādhayatā kiñci taṃsadisam phalam

analyzed: nidassanam padasseti atthantaram iccādinā atthantaram nidassetabba apekkhāya

analyzed: aññassa canda sadisassa chattassa dassita ttā ayam vutti samavañcanā nāma munīnam

original: indoti ca, tassa vadanamiti ca, indusadiso indu, munindavadanameva indūti ca, samantato

original: puṇṇoti ca, manasi bhūtoti ca viggaho.

original: Parānuvattanādīhi, nibbindeni’ha yā katā;

original: Thutira’ppakate sā’yaṃ, siyā appakatatthuti.
analyzed: thutiḥ appakate sāyam siyā appakata thuti

original: 313. Appakatatthutiṃ pakāseti “pari”ccādinā. Paresaṃ yesaṃ kesañci anuvattanaṃ sevā,

original: Sukhaṃ jīvanti hariṇā, vanesva’parasevino;

original: Anāyāsopalābhehi, jaladabbaṅkurādibhi.
analyzed: anāyāsa upalābhehi

original: Vidhiekāvali

original: Nakhālī raṃsibhāsurā;
Raṃsī tamopahāneka …pahāreka (sī.) -

analyzed: nisedha eka āvali

original: Santoso nā’layāhato;

original: Yahiṃ bhūsiyabhūsattaṃ, aññamaññaṃ tu vatthunaṃ;

analyzed: aññam aññam āha yahim iccādinā yahim sadisattam vinā eva padatthānam aññam aññam bhūsiya bhūsattam tam aññamaññam nāma vibhūsanam alaṅkāroti

original: 318. Idāni aññamaññālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “yahi”miccādinā. Yahiṃ alaṅkāre sadisattaṃ vinā

original: Byāmaṃsumaṇḍalaṃ tena, muninā lokabandhunā;

original: sopi muni tena eva byāmaṃsumaṇḍalena tādisiṃ kantiṃ vindatīti. Aññamaññaṃ asadisānaṃ

original: byāmaṃsumaṇḍalamunisaṅkhātānaṃ dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ byāmaṃsumaṇḍalaṃ paṭhamavākye alaṅkāriyaṃ
analyzed: dvinnam vatthūnam byāma aṃsu maṇḍalam paṭhama vākye alaṅkāriyam

original: hoti, munipadattho alaṅkāro hoti. Aparavākye ime dve vipallāsena alaṅkāriyaalaṅkārā
analyzed: hoti muni padattho alaṅkāro hoti apara vākye ime dve vipallāsena alaṅkāriya alaṅkārā

analyzed: honti aṃsūnam maṇḍalam iti ca byāmam eva aṃsu maṇḍalam iti ca lokaḥ bandhu

original: ca, sā viya dissatīti ca viggaho.
analyzed: ca sā viya dissati iti ca viggahaḥ

analyzed: kathanam sahabhāvassa kriyāya ca guṇassa ca

original: Sahavuttīti viññeyyaṃ, tadudāharaṇaṃ yathā.
analyzed: sahavuttī iti viññeyyam tat udāharaṇam yathā

analyzed: sahavuttim vadati kathanam iccādinā su bodham

analyzed: vakkhamāna nayena daṭṭhabbanti saha saddhim bhavanam iti ca sahabhāvassa vutti kathanam iti

original: ca, tassa udāharaṇamiti ca viggaho. Sahabhāvo candarasminakhaṃsuādīnaṃ padatthānaṃ.
analyzed: ca tassa udāharaṇam iti ca viggahaḥ sahabhāvaḥ canda rasmina khaṃsu ādīnam padatthānam

original: Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ taṃsahattaṃ yassaṃ kriyāyaṃ guṇe vā bhavatīti sahattaṃ kriyāguṇānaṃ

original: hotīti katvā “kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa kriyāya ca guṇassa cā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: hoti iti katvā kathanam sahabhāvassa kriyāya ca guṇassa ca ati vuttam

original: Kriyāsahavutti
Jalanti candaraṃsīhi, samaṃ satthu nakhaṃsavo;
analyzed: jalanti canda raṃsīhi samam satthu nakhaṃsavaḥ

original: Vijambhati ca candena, samaṃ tammukhacandimā.
analyzed: vijambhati ca candena samam

original: 321. “Jalanti”iccādi. Samanti saha, tassa satthuno mukhacandimā. Sesaṃ subodhaṃ. Ettha jalanavijambhanānaṃ ubhayasādhāraṇānaṃ kriyānaṃ sahabhāvo vihitoti kriyāsahavutti ayanti.
321. Idāni yathāpaṭiññātaudāharaṇaṃ dasseti “jalanti”iccādinā. Satthu satthuno nakhaṃsavo
analyzed: idāni yathā paṭiññāta audāharaṇam dasseti

original: nakhakiraṇā candaraṃsīhi samaṃ jalanti, tammukhacandimā ca candena samaṃ vijambhatīti.
analyzed: samam jalanti ca candena samam vijambhati iti

original: Ettha ubhayapadatthānaṃ sādhāraṇabhūtajalanavijambhanakriyānaṃ sahabhāvassa vuttattā

original: esā kriyāsahavutti nāma. Candassa raṃsiyoti ca, nakhānaṃ aṃsavoti ca, tassa satthuno
analyzed: esā kriyāsahavutti nāma candassa raṃsiyaḥ ti ca nakhānam aṃsavaḥ ti ca tassa satthuno

analyzed: ca tam eva candima sadisattā candima ati ca vākyam samam iti saha pariyāyaḥ nipātaḥ

original: Guṇasahavutti
analyzed: guṇa sahavutti

original: Jinodayena malinaṃ, saha dujjanacetasā;
analyzed: jina udayena malinam saha dujjana cetasā

original: Pāpaṃ disā suvimalā, saha sajjanacetasā.
analyzed: pāpam disā su vimalā saha sat jana cetasā

original: 322. “Jinodayena”ccādi. Jinodayena karaṇabhūtena, hetubhūtena vā dujjanacetasā saha
analyzed: jinodayena acca ādi jinodayena karaṇa bhūtena hetu bhūtena vā dujjana cetasā saha

original: pāpaṃ malinaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ, sajjanacetasā saha disā dasavidhāpi suvimalā accantanimmalā

analyzed: su vimala yasaḥ mālā valayita ttā sat jana cetaḥ pāpa apagamena iti ettha malinattassa ca su vimalattassa

analyzed: sahabhāvaḥ vutto ti ayam guṇa sahavutti

original: ca, su atisayena vimalāti ca, santo ca te janā ceti ca, tesaṃ cetoti ca vākyaṃ.

original: Virodhitādīpakavutti tadatthena tannāmikā hoti.

original: Guṇā sabhāvamadhurā, api lokekabandhuno;

original: Sevitā pāpasevīnaṃ, sampadūsenti sampadūsanti (ka.) mānasaṃ.

original: Yassa kassaci dānena, yassa kassaci vatthuno;

original: Purā paresaṃ datvāna, manuññaṃ nayanādikaṃ;

original: Samaṃ disāsu’jjalāsu, jinapādanakhaṃsunā;

original: Abhinandanti santussantīti.

original: Kavīnaṃ bhāvabodhanaṃ;

original: Yena kenaci vaṇṇena,

original: Bhāvonāmā’ya’mīrito.

original: Nanu teye’va santā no,

original: Sāgarā na kulācalā;

original: palayakāle attano velānullaṅghanasaṅkhātaṃ acalattasaṅkhātañca mariyādaṃ pariccajanti.
analyzed: palaya kāle velā anullaṅghana saṅkhātam mariyādam pariccajanti

original: Kiñcarahi santā evete samuddādayo, ye yadi palayakālepi samāpateyyuṃ, tadāpi attano
analyzed: kiñcarahi santaḥ eva ete samudda ādayaḥ ye yadi palaya kāle api samāpateyyum tadā api

original: mariyādaṃ na muñcanti. Koci vipattiṃ patto niratisayaṃ dhīrattamattanovabodhetīti
analyzed: mariyādam na muñcanti koci vipattim pattaḥ niratisayam

original: aññanisedhena kathitaṃ nāmaṃ kavisabhāvaṃ yathāvuttaṃ bodhetīti bhāvoyamiti.
analyzed: añña nisedhena kathitam nāmam kavi sabhāvam yathāvuttam bodheti iti bhāvoyam iti

original: 330. Idāni udāharati “nanu”ccādinā. Sāgarā saṃvaṭṭakāle tīramariyādaṃ atikkamentā
analyzed: idāni udāharati nanu ca ādinā sāgarā saṃvaṭṭa kāle tīra mariyādam

original: pakatisamuddā sāgarā na bhavanti. Kulācalā tādisakāle acalasaṅkhātamariyādamatikkamentā
analyzed: sāgarāḥ na bhavanti

original: satta kulapabbatā kulācalā nāma na bhavanti. Kiñcarahi sāgarādayo. Ye sādhavo saṃvaṭṭepi
analyzed: satta kula pabbatā kula acalāḥ nāma na bhavanti kiñcarahi sāgara ādayaḥ ye sādhavaḥ

original: sabbavatthuvināsakakappavināsakālepi mariyādaṃ attano ācāramariyādaṃ manampi īsakampi
analyzed: sabba vatthu vināsaka kappa vināsa kāle pi mariyādam attanaḥ ācāra mariyādam manam pi īsakam pi

original: no jahanti. Santā eva te sāgarādayo nāma honti nanūti. Koci byasanaṃ patto attano
analyzed: no jahanti santaḥ eva te sāgara ādayaḥ nāma honti nanu uti koci byasanam pattaḥ attanaḥ

original: anaññasādhāraṇaṃ dhīrattaṃ pakāsetīti iha sāgarādiatthantarapaṭisedharūpena dassitasāgarādinā
analyzed: anañña sādhāraṇam dhīra ttam pakāseti iti iha sāgara ādi atthantara paṭisedha rūpena dassita sāgara ādinā

original: vattuno akampanādhippāyaṃ avabodhetīti ayaṃ bhāvālaṅkāro nāma. Mananti appakālavācakamasaṅkhyaṃ. Apīti sambhāvane.
analyzed: vattunaḥ a kampana adhippāyam avabodheti iti ayam bhāvālaṅkāraḥ nāma mananti appa kāla vācakam asaṅkhyam api iti sambhāvane

original: Aṅgaṅgībhāvā sadisa-balabhāvā ca bandhane;
analyzed: ca bandhane

original: Saṃsaggo’laṅkatīnaṃ yo, taṃ missanti pavuccati.
analyzed: saṃsagga ulaṅkatīnam yaḥ tam missanti pavuccati

original: 331. Missaṃ dasseti “aṅga”iccādinā. Aṅgamupakārakaṃ, aṅgī upakāriyaṃ, tesaṃ bhāvo
analyzed: missam dasseti aṅga ecca ādinā aṅgam upakārakam aṅgī upakāriyam tesam bhāvaḥ

original: aṅgaṅgibhāvo sādhiyasādhanattaṃ, tato ca. Sadisaṃ samaṃ balaṃ yesaṃ te, tesaṃ bhāvo
analyzed: aṅgaṅgi bhāvaḥ tatas ca sadisam samam balam yesam te tesam bhāvaḥ

original: aṅgaṅgibhāvamantarena appadhānabhāvenāvaṭṭhānaṃ tato ca hetuto. Bandhane visaye,
analyzed: aṅga aṅgi bhāvam antarena appadhāna bhāvena avaṭṭhānam tatas ca hetutaḥ bandhane visaye

original: yo alaṅkatīnaṃ saṃsaggo ekattha sannidhānaṃ, taṃ missanti pavuccati.
analyzed: yaḥ alaṅkatīnam saṃsaggaḥ ekattha sannidhānam tam missanti pavuccati

original: 331. Idāni missālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “aṅgaṅgī”ccādinā. Aṅgaṅgībhāvā upakārakaupakāriyasaṅkhātapaṭipādakapaṭipādanīyasabhāvena
analyzed: idāni missā alaṅkāram dasseti aṅgaṅgī iccādinā aṅgaṅgībhāvāḥ upakāraka aupakāriya saṅkhāta paṭipādaka paṭipādanīya sabhāvena

original: hetubhūtena sadisabalabhāvā ca sādhiyasādhanabhāvaṃ vinā samānabalavantabhāvena ca
analyzed: hetu bhūtena ca ca

original: bandhane pajjādibandhanavisaye alaṅkatīnaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ yo saṃsaggo sannidhānaṃ, taṃ
analyzed: bandhane pajja ādi bandhana visaye alaṅkatīnam alaṅkārānam yaḥ saṃsaggo sannidhānam taṃ

original: missanti pavuccatīti. Aṅgaṃ sādhanaṃ assa sādhiyassa atthīti ca, aṅgañca aṅgī ceti
analyzed: missanti pavuccati iti aṅgam sādhanam assa sādhiyassa atthi iti ca aṅgam ca aṅgī ca iti

original: ca, tesaṃ bhāvo sādhiyasādhanasaṅkhāto sambandhoti ca, sadisaṃ balaṃ yesamalaṅkārānamiti
analyzed: ca tesam bhāvo sādhiya sādhana saṅkhāto sambandho ti ca sadisam balam iti

original: ca, tesaṃ bhāvo aññamaññanirapekkhatāti ca, missanaṃ missībhavanamiti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: ca tesam bhāvaḥ aññamañña nirapekkha tā ati ca missanam missībhavanam iti ca vākyam

original: Aṅgaṅgibhāvamissa
analyzed: aṅga ṅgi bhāva miḥ sa

original: Pasatthā munino pāda-nakharaṃsimahānadī;
analyzed: pasatthā munino pāda nakha raṃsi mahā nadī

original: Aho gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi, sukhayatye’va te jane.
analyzed: aho gāḷham nimugga ipi sukhayati eva te jane

original: 332. Udāharati “pasatthā muni”ccādi. Munino pādesu nakhā tesaṃ raṃsi eva mahānadīsadisattā
analyzed: udāharati pasatthāḥ muni ccādi munino pādesu nakhāḥ tesam eva mahā nadī sadisa ttā

original: mahānadī, sā pasatthā acchariyappattisabbhāvato gāḷhamaccantaṃ nimuggepi te jane
analyzed: mahā nadī sā pasatthā acchariya ppatti sabbhāvataḥ gāḷham accantam nimugge api te jane

original: sukhayatyeva, aho acchariyaṃ yato sesanadīvidhuraṃ. “Ayaṃ attani gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi
analyzed: sukhayati eva aho acchariyam yatas sesa nadī vidhuram ayam gāḷham

original: sukhayatī”ti ettha “nimuggepī”ti samādhino sādhiyattenaṅgitāyāvaṭṭhitassa “pādanakharaṃsimahānadī”ti
analyzed: sukhayati iti ettha pāda nakha raṃsi mahā nadī ti

original: rūpakaṃ sādhanattenaṅgatāyāvaṭṭhitanti missamidamalaṅkaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: rūpakam missam idam alaṅkaraṇam

original: 332. Idāni udāharati “pasatthā” iccādinā. Munino pasatthā acchariyattā pasaṃsanīyā
analyzed: idāni udāharati pasatthā iccādinā munino pasatthā acchariyattā pasaṃsanīyā

original: pādanakharaṃsimahānadī caraṇanakhakiraṇasaṅkhātamahāgaṅgā gāḷhaṃ atisayena nimuggepi
analyzed: pāda nakha raṃsi mahā nadī caraṇa nakha kiraṇa saṅkhāta mahāgaṅgā gāḍham atisayena

original: te jane sādhusappurise sukhayati eva sukhite kato eva. Aho acchariyaṃ sesanadīnamesā
analyzed: te jane sādhu sappurise sukhayati eva sukhite kato eva aho acchariyam

original: pavatti viruddhāti. Ettha sādhanīyabhāvena aṅgino “nimugge”ti samādhialaṅkārassa
analyzed: pavatti viruddhā ati ettha sādhanīya bhāvena aṅginaḥ nimuggā iti samādhi alaṅkārassa

original: “pādanakharaṃsimahānadī”ti rūpakālaṅkāro sādhanabhāvena aṅganti katvā aṅgāaṅgībhāvena
analyzed: pāda nakha raṃsi mahānadī iti sādhana bhāvena katvā aṅga aaṅgībhāvena

original: imesaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ missitā. Pādesu nakhāti ca, tesaṃ raṃsīti ca, mahatī ca sā nadī
analyzed: imesam alaṅkārānam missitā pādesu ca tesam raṃsī iti ca mahatī ca sā nadī

original: ceti ca, mahānadī viya mahānadī pādanakharaṃsiyo eva mahānadīti ca vākyaṃ. Gāḷhanti
analyzed: ca iti ca mahā nadī mahā nadī eva mahā nadī iti ca vākyam gāḷhanti

original: kriyāvisesanaṃ. Gāḷhaṃ nimujjanaṃ ye akaṃsu, tepīti yojanā. Sukhasamaṅgino janā sukhite
analyzed: kriyā visesanam gāḷham nimujjanam ye te api iti yojanā sukha samaṅginaḥ janāḥ sukhite

original: sukhe karotīti vākyaṃ.
analyzed: sukhe karoti iti vākyam

original: Sadisabalabhāvamissa
analyzed: sa disa bala bhāva missa

original: Veso sabhāvamadhuro, rūpaṃ nettarasāyanaṃ;
analyzed: vesaḥ sa bhāva madhuraḥ rūpam

original: Madhūvamunino vācā, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
analyzed: madhūva muninaḥ vācā na kam janam

original: 333. “Veso”iccādi subodhaṃ. Idaṃ pana samādhirūpakopamāmissasadisabalanti.
analyzed: su bodham idam pana

original: 333. “Veso”iccādi. Munino sabhāvamadhuro pakatimadhuro veso jināveṇiko buddhaveso
analyzed: vesaḥ iccādi munino sabhāva madhuraḥ pakati madhuraḥ vesaḥ jina āveṇikaḥ buddha vesaḥ

original: ca nettarasāyanaṃ rūpaṃ lakkhaṇānubyañjanasampannaṃ rūpañca madhūva madhurattena
analyzed: ca netta rasāyanam rūpam lakkhaṇa anubyañjana sampannam rūpam ca madhu uva madhura ttena

original: madhusamānā vācā bhāratī ca kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇetīti. “Sabhāvamadhuro”ti samādhialaṅkāro
analyzed: madhu samānā vācā bhāratī ca kam janam na sampīṇā iti iti sabhāva madhurā iti samādhi alaṅkāraḥ

original: ca, “nettarasāyana”nti rūpakālaṅkāro ca, “madhūvā”ti upamālaṅkāro cāti ime tayo pīṇane
analyzed: ca rūpaka alaṅkāro ca upamā alaṅkāro ca ati ime tayo pīṇane

original: aññamaññāpekkharahitattā tulyabalāti imesaṃ missattaṃ hoti. Sabhāvena madhuroti ca,
analyzed: tulya balā ati imesam missattam hoti sa bhāvena ca

original: rasīyati assādīyatīti ca, raso rasabhūto āyanaṃ gati pavatti assāti rasāyanaṃ, rasavatthu.
analyzed: rasīyati assādīyati iti ca rasaḥ rasa bhūtaḥ āyanam gati pavatti assāti rasāyanam rasa vatthu

original: Rasāyanamiva rūpaṃ rasāyanaṃ, nettānaṃ rasāyananti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: rasāyanam iva rūpam rasāyanam ca vākyam

original: Āsī nāma siyā’tthassa,
analyzed: āsī nāma siyā atthassa

original: Iṭṭhassā’sīsanaṃ yathā;
analyzed: yathā

original: Tilokekagatī nātho,
analyzed: nātho

original: Pātu loka’mapāyato.
analyzed: pātu lokam apāyato

original: 334. Āsiṃ dasseti “āsi”ccādinā. Iṭṭhassa abhimatassa vatthuno āsīsanaṃ patthanamityanuvaditvā
analyzed: āsim dasse iti āsicca ādinā iṭṭhassa abhimatassa vatthuno āsīsanam patthanam iti anuvaditvā

original: āsī nāma siyāti vidhīyate. “Yathe”tyudāharati. Tilokassa lokattayavattino janassa
analyzed: āsī nāma siyā iti vidhīyate yathā iti udāharati ti lokassa lokattaya vattinaḥ janassa

original: ekagati asahāyagati paṭisaraṇabhūto nātho lokaṃ sattalokaṃ apāyato pātu pāletūti.
analyzed: eka gati asahāya gati paṭisaraṇa bhūtaḥ nāthaḥ lokam satta lokam apāyatas pātu pāletu uti

original: Etthātilasitaṃ pālanamāsīsitanti.
analyzed: ettha ati lasitam

original: 334. Idāni āsīalaṅkāraṃ dasseti “āsī” iccādinā. Iṭṭhassa atthassa icchitavatthuno
analyzed: idāni āsī alaṅkāram dasseti āsī icca ādinā iṭṭhassa atthassa icchita vatthuno

original: āsīsanā patthanā āsī nāma siyā. Yathā tatthodāharaṇamevaṃ. Tilokekagati tibhavassa
analyzed: āsīsanā patthanā āsī nāma siyā yathā tattha udāharaṇam evam ti bhavassa

original: asahāyasaraṇabhūto nātho lokasāmi lokaṃ sattalokaṃ apāyato pātu rakkhatūti. Āsī nāma
analyzed: asahāya saraṇa bhūtaḥ nāthaḥ loka sāmi lokam satta lokam apāyataḥ pātu rakkhatu iti āsī nāma

original: patthanā, taddīpikāpi utti tannāmikāva hoti. “Tilokekagatī”ti imasmiṃ udāharaṇe pālanaṃ
analyzed: patthanā tad dīpikā api tad nāmikā ava hoti imasmin udāharaṇe pālanam

original: āsīsitaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ samāhāroti ca, ekoyeva gati paṭisaraṇanti ca, tilokassa
analyzed: tiṇṇam lokānam samāhāro ti ca ekoyā iva gati paṭisaraṇanti ca ti lokassa

original: ekagatīti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: eka gatī iti ca vākyam

original: Rasappatītijanakaṃ, jāyate yaṃ vibhūsanaṃ;
analyzed: rasappatīti janakam jāyate yam vibhūsanam

original: Rasavantanti taṃ ñeyyaṃ, rasavantavidhānato.
analyzed: tam ñeyyam

original: 335. Rasavantamudāharati “rasa”iccādinā. Yaṃ vibhūsanamalaṅkaraṇaṃ rasābhāsādino
analyzed: rasavantam udāharati yam vibhūsanam alaṅkaraṇam

original: patītijanakaṃ avagamasampādakaṃ jāyate, taṃ vibhūsanaṃ rasavantavidhānato sampādanato
analyzed: patīti janakam avagama sampādakam jāyate tam vibhūsanam sampādanataḥ

original: “rasavanta”nti viññeyyaṃ yathā atthappatīti janako saddo “atthavā”ti.
analyzed: rasavantam ti viññeyyam yathā atthappati iti janakaḥ saddaḥ attha vāti

original: 335. Uddese rasīti uddiṭṭharasālaṅkāraṃ dasseti “rasa”iccādinā. Yaṃ vibhūsanaṃ vuttālaṅkārānamantare
analyzed: uddese rasī iti uddiṭṭha rasa alaṅkāram dassa iti yam vibhūsanam

original: yo koci alaṅkāro rasappatītijanakaṃ siṅgārādinavavidharasesu ekassa rasassa vā tasseva
analyzed: yaḥ koci alaṅkāraḥ rasa ppatīti janakam siṅgāra ādi navavidha rasesu ekassa rasassa vā tassa iva

original: rasābhāsassa vā avabodhanaṃ sampādento jāyate, taṃ vibhūsanaṃ rasavantavidhānato
analyzed: rasa ābhāsassa vā avabodhanam sampādentaḥ jāyate tam vibhūsanam

original: attano rasasahitabhāvassa pakāsanato rasavantanti rasīti ñeyyanti. Yathā atthappatītijanako
analyzed: attanaḥ rasa sahita bhāvassa pakāsanato rasavantanti rasī iti ñeyyanti yathā attha ppatīti janakaḥ

original: saddo “atthavā”ti vuccati, evaṃ rasappatītijanako alaṅkāro rasavanto “rasī”ti ca
analyzed: saddo atthavāti vuccati evam rasa ppatīti janakaḥ alaṅkāraḥ rasavantaḥ ca

original: vuccati. Rasassa patīti ca, taṃ janetīti ca, raso assa atthīti ca, rasavato bhāvoti
analyzed: vuccati rasassa pati iti ca tam janeti iti ca rasaḥ assa atthi iti ca rasavataḥ bhāvaḥ ti

original: ca, tassa vidhānaṃ sampādananti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: ca tassa vidhānam sampādananti ca vākyam

original: Rāgānatabbhutasarojamukhaṃ dharāya,
analyzed: rāga ānata abbhuta saroja mukham dharāya

original: Pādā tilokaguruno’dhikabaddharāgā;
analyzed: tiloka guru nā adhika baddha rāgā

original: Ādāya niccasarasena karena gāḷhaṃ,
analyzed: ādāya nicca sarasena karena gāḷham

original: Sañcumbayanti satatāhitasambhamena.
analyzed: sañcumbayanti satata ahita sambhamena

original: 336. Udāharati “rāga”iccādi. Dharāya pathavīaṅganāya rāgena ānataṃ, mukhaṃ. Rāgaṃ
analyzed: udāharati dharāya pathavī aṅganāya rāgena ānatam mukham

original: rattavaṇṇaṃ ānataṃ ninnamitaṃ, sarojaṃ. Paṭhame abbhutasarojasadisatāya mukhaṃ, tena

original: samānādhikaraṇanti rāgānatena samāso. Dutiye tu rāgānatañca taṃ abbhutasarojaṃ pathaviṃ
analyzed: rāga ānatena samāsaḥ dutiye tu rāga ānatam ca tam abbhuta sarojam pathavim

original: bhinditvā sirīpādasampaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ uṭṭhahamacchariyapadumañca, tameva tassā mukhasadisattā
analyzed: bhinditvā sirī pāda sampaṭiggahaṇa attham tam eva tassāḥ mukha sadisa ttā

original: mukhanti rāgānatabbhutasarojamukhaṃ. Tilokaguruno sammāsambuddhassa pādā. Kīdisā?
analyzed: mukhanti rāga ānata bbhuta saroja mukham tiloka guruno sammāsambuddhassa pādā kīdisā

original: Adhikabandho rāgo anurāgo, rattavaṇṇo vā yesaṃ te, tathāvidhā. Niccamanavarataṃ sarasena
analyzed: adhika bandhaḥ rāgaḥ anurāgaḥ ratta vaṇṇo vā yesam te tathāvidhāḥ niccam anavaratam sa rasena

original: rasavatā karena hatthena, raṃsinā vā gāḷhaṃ ādāya gahetvā satataṃ niccaṃ āhito sambhamo
analyzed: rasavatā karena hatthena raṃsinā vā gāḷham ādāya gahetvā satatam niccam āhitaḥ sambhamaḥ

original: ādaro, tadabhimukhatā vā, tena sañcumbayanti, nikkhipanti vā. Ettha silesarūpakehi
analyzed: ādaraḥ tad abhimukha tā vā tena sañcumbayanti nikkhipanti vā ettha silesa rūpakehi

original: sambhogasiṅgārarasābhāso janyate. Siṅgāro duvidho vippalambho, sambhogo ceti. Tesu
analyzed: sambhoga siṅgāra rasa ābhāsaḥ janyate siṅgāraḥ duvidhaḥ vippalambho sambhogaḥ ca iti tesu

original: vippalambhova samaggavaṇṇanādhārattā manoharo, nediso sambhogo. Sambhogābhāse tu
analyzed: vippalambhaḥ uva samagga vaṇṇanā dhārā ttā manoharaḥ nedisaḥ sambhogaḥ sambhoga ābhāse tu

original: vattabbameva natthi. Tathāpi’hā’dhigataṃ sambhogābhāsodāharaṇaṃ bālappabodhanatthaṃ
analyzed: vattabbam eva na atthi tathā api iha adhigatam sambhoga ābhāsa udāharaṇam bāla ppabodhana attham

original: kiñci vicāressāma. Tatra pādānaṃ kāmukattaṃ dharāya kāminittañca vākyasāmatthiyā
analyzed: kiñci vicāressāma tatra pādānam kāmuka ttam dharāya vākya sāmatthiyā

original: viññāyate. Saddena vuccamānaṃ puna vuttaṃ siyā. Atra pādānaṃ taṃ viññeyyaṃ, ratyukkaṃsābhāso

original: yadi kavinā paṭipādetabbo na bhaveyya, tadā gāthāyamananupapannaṃ siyāti evaṃvidhavacanatova
analyzed: yadi kavinā paṭipādetabbaḥ na bhaveyya tadā gāthāyam ananupapannam siyā iti evaṃvidha vacanataḥ va

original: pādā ratyābhāsavantoti gamyate. Ratiyā ālambaṇavibhāvābhāso dharākāmini, rammadesādivisesābhāve
analyzed: pādāḥ rati ābhāsavantaḥ iti gamyate ratiyā ālambaṇa vibhāva ābhāsaḥ dharā kāmini ramma desa ādi visesa abhāve

original: acchariyapadumuggamanābhāvato abbhutasarojasaddasavanena gammamānā rammadesādayo
analyzed: acchariya padumutgamana abhāvataḥ abbhuta saroja sadda savanena gammamānāḥ ramma desa ādayaḥ

original: uddīpanavibhāvābhāsā, byabhicārībhāvābhāsabodhakāni kavivacanāni anubhāvābhāso. Tathā
analyzed: uddīpana vibhāva ābhāsāḥ byabhicārībhāva ābhāsa bodhakāni kavi vacanāni tathā

original: hi “niccasarasena karena gāḷhaṃ ādāyā”ti karassa sarasatāgāḷhaggahaṇakathanena harisādayo

original: 336. Idāni udāharaṇaṃ dassento uttaripi dassetabbasiṅgārahassakaruṇādirasuddesassa

original: Ṭhāyīsambandhino bhāva-vibhāvā sānubhāvakā;

analyzed: byabhicārībhāva ppabheda

analyzed: matummāda mohāḥ

analyzed: niddā vegā

original: Sacapalābyādhi tettiṃsame’te.
analyzed: sa capala abyādhi tettiṃsam ete

original: gilāni ussukaiti ussukkaṃ. Capalaiti cāpallaṃ, saha capalena sacapalo, so cāyaṃ byādhi

analyzed: ekekassa rasassa bahavaḥ vaṇṇanīyāḥ yatas tad vaṇṇanā dvārena sabbaḥ api tesu kiñci assādeti iti

original: Tattha yasmā pana māraṇopagataveridassanamekameva taṅkhaṇeyeva bhinnaṃ pakativasena
analyzed: tattha yasmā pana māraṇa upagata veri dassanam ekam eva bhinnam pakati vasena

analyzed: bhīrunaḥ bhayassa hetu saṅgāma lolassa tu ussāha nimittam siyā tathā naṭena katam

original: vikatamābharaṇaṃ kriyāvā nīcapakatīnaṃ ṭhāyino hāsassa hetu, gambhīrapakatīnaṃ byabhicārino
analyzed: vikatam ābharaṇam kriyāvā nīca pakatīnam ṭhāyinaḥ hāsassa hetu gambhīra pakatīnam byabhicārinaḥ

original: hāsassa, tasmā bhāve vaṇṇayatā kavinā bhāvā tathā vaṇṇanīyā, yathocityapariposo siyā.
analyzed: hāsassa tasmā bhāve vaṇṇayatā kavinā bhāvā tathā vaṇṇanīyā yathā ucitya pariposaḥ siyā

original: Ocityabhaṅgo tu mahatā vāyāmena pariharitabbo.
analyzed: ocitya bhaṅgo tu mahatā vā āyāmena pariharitabbo

original: Tesu nibbedo attāvamānanaṃ. Tassa ca itthīnañca nīcānañca dāliddiyaṃ vibhāvo, yogīnaṃ tu tatvasaṃvedanaṃ vibhāvo, assupatanacintādayo ettha anubhāvā.
analyzed: tesu nibbedaḥ atta avamānanam tassa ca itthīnam ca nīcānam ca dāliddiyam vibhāvaḥ yogīnam tu ta tva saṃvedanam vibhāvaḥ assu patana cintā ādayaḥ ettha anubhāvāḥ

original: Takko vitakkanaṃ. Tassa sandeho vibhāvo, sirokampādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: takkaḥ vitakkanam tassa sandehaḥ vibhāvaḥ sirokampā ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Saṅkāya viruddhacaraṇaṃ vibhāvo, kampādayo anubhāvo.
analyzed: viruddha caraṇam vibhāvaḥ kampa ādayaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Samo khedo. Tattha gatyādi vibhāvo, sedādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: samaḥ khedaḥ tattha gati ādi vibhāvaḥ seda ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Dhiti santoso. Ñāṇādi vibhāvo, anubhāvo bhogālolatādi.
analyzed: santosaḥ ñāṇa ādi vibhāvaḥ anubhāvaḥ bhoga ālola tā ādi

original: Jaḷatā appaṭipatti. Tassā iṭṭhāniṭṭhadassanādi vibhāvo, animisanayanālocanādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: jaḷa tā appaṭipatti tassāḥ iṭṭha aniṭṭha dassana ādi vibhāvaḥ a nimisa nayana ālocanā ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Dīnatā cetaso anojatā. Tassā vibhāvo duggatatādi, anubhāvo malinavatthatādi.
analyzed: dīna tā cetasaḥ anoja tā tassāḥ vibhāvaḥ duggata tā ādi anubhāvaḥ malina vattha tā ādi

original: Uggatā dāruṇattaṃ. Tassā vibhāvo balavāparādhādi, tassa anubhāvo tajjanādi.
analyzed: uggatā dāruṇa ttam tassā vibhāvaḥ balava aparādha ādi tassa anubhāvaḥ tad jana ādi

original: Ālasattassa parisamādi vibhāvo, jimhatādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: ālasattassa vibhāvaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Suttassa niddā vibhāvo, tassādādayo anubhāvo.
analyzed: suttassa niddā vibhāvo anubhāvo

original: Tāso cittakkhobho. Vibhāvo assa gajjitādi, kampanādi anubhāvo.
Āyāsapipāsādi vibhāvo gilāniyā, vivaṇṇatādayo anubhāvo.
analyzed: āyāsa pipāsā ādi vibhāvaḥ gilāniyāḥ vivaṇṇa tā ādayaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Kālakkhamatā ussukaṃ. Vibhāvo tassa ramaṇīyadassanicchādi, anubhāvo turitatādi.
analyzed: kāla kkhama tā ussukam vibhāvaḥ tassa ramaṇīya dassa nicchā ādi anubhāvaḥ turita tā ādi

original: Cetopasādo harito. Tatra ussavādi vibhāvo, assusedādayo anubhāvo.
analyzed: ceta upasādaḥ harito tatra ussava ādi vibhāvaḥ assuseda ādayaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Sadisadassanādi vibhāvo satiyā, anubhāvo bhamusamunnamanādi.
analyzed: vibhāvaḥ satiyāḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Paresamukkaṃsāsahanatā issā. Tassā dujjanattagabbādayo vibhāvo, dosakathanāvajānanādayo anubhāvo.
analyzed: issā tassā dujjanatta gabba ādayaḥ vibhāvaḥ dosa kathana avajānana ādayaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Visādo khedo. Vibhāvo tassa āraddhakāriyāsiddhādi, bādhayatāpādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: visādaḥ khedaḥ vibhāvo tassa āraddha kāriyā siddha ādi bādhaya tāpa ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Abahitthā kāyasaṃvaraṇaṃ. Tassā vibhāvo lajjādi, anubhāvo’ññavikriyā.
analyzed: kāya saṃvaraṇam tassā vibhāvaḥ lajjā ādi

original: Cintā iṭṭhālābhādīhi, anubhāvo mukulitanayanādi.
analyzed: cintā iṭṭha ālābha ādīhi anubhāvaḥ mukulita nayana ādi

original: Gabbo abhimāno. Vibhāvossa issariyādi, anubhāvo avajānanādi.
analyzed: gabbaḥ abhimānaḥ vibhāva ussaḥ issariya ādi anubhāvaḥ avajānana ādi

original: Apamāro gāharukkhādīhi gāharukkhapatanādīhi (?), bhūpātādayo ettha anubhāvo.
analyzed: apamāraḥ gāha rukkha ādīhi gāha rukkha patana ādīhi bhū pāta ādayaḥ ettha anubhāvaḥ

original: Amariso akkhamatā. Vibhāvo assāvamānanādi, sirokampanatajjanādayo anubhāvo.
analyzed: amarisaḥ akkhama tā vibhāvaḥ assa avamānana ādi siro kampana tad jana ādayaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Mado pamādukkaṃso. Tassa vibhāvo pānaṃ, calamānaṅgavacogatihāsādayo anubhāvo.
analyzed: madaḥ pamād ukkaṃsaḥ tassa vibhāvaḥ pānam cala mānaṅga vacogati hāsa ādayaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Mati kaṅkhacchedo. Upadesādi vibhāvo, mukhavikāsādi ettha anubhāvo.
analyzed: upadesa ādi vibhāvaḥ mukha vikāsa ādi ettha anubhāvaḥ

original: Asamekkhitakāritā ummādo. Tassa vibhāvo sannipātagahaṇādi, aṭṭhānaruditagītahāsādayo anubhāvo.
analyzed: asamekkhita kāri tā ummādaḥ tassa vibhāvaḥ sannipāta gahaṇa ādi aṭṭhāna rudita gīta hāsa ādayaḥ anubhāvo

original: Moho bhayādīhi, anubhāvo thambhakampādi.
analyzed: mohaḥ bhaya ādīhi anubhāvaḥ thambha kampa ādi

original: Durācārādīhi biḷaṃ, adhomukhatādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: adhomukha tā ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Maraṇaṃ vibhāvaanubhāvehi supasiddhaṃ.
analyzed: maraṇam

original: Capalatā rāgadosādīhi, sacchandacaraṇādi anubhāvo. Byādhi pākaṭo.
analyzed: capalatā rāga dosa ādīhi anubhāvaḥ

original: Ye vā panaññe idha niddiṭṭhā cittavuttivisesāpi saṃvijjanti sukhumabhedā, tesu keci
analyzed: ye vā panaññe idha niddiṭṭhā citta vutti visesā api saṃvijjanti tesu keci

original: vuttesvantogadhā honti. Yathā hi icchāsabhāvā sabbe kāmā ratiyaṃ antogadhā, tathā
analyzed: vuttesu antogadhāḥ honti yathā hi icchā sabhāvā sabbe kāmāḥ ratiyam antogadhā tathā

original: dosappakārā kodhā marisaissādīsvantogadhā, dukkhasabhāvā sokasamabyādhigilāni visādādīsvantogadhā.
analyzed: dosa ppakārā kodhā visāda ādīsu antogadhā

original: Pītyādayo sukhasabhāvā hariseti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesu bhayā tāso añño, saṅkā tathā amariso.
analyzed: pīti ādayo sukha sabhāvā harisā iti daṭṭhabbam tesu bhayā tāsaḥ saṅkā tathā amariso

analyzed: tasmai issā tathā gilānitaḥ samaḥ niddāya suttam ussukā capalatā tathā mohā palayo

original: vakkhamāno aññoti mantabbaṃ.
analyzed: vakkhamānaḥ aññaḥ ti mantabbam

original: 344. Idāni te byabhicārībhāve sarūpena dasseti “nibbedo”iccādinā. Nibbedo attanindāsaṅkhato
analyzed: idāni te byabhicārībhāve sarūpena dasseti nibbedo icca ādinā nibbedaḥ atta nindā saṅkhato

analyzed: ca takka saṅkā ca sama dhiti jaḷa tā parisamaḥ santosa lakkhaṇā dhiti jaḷa tā ca dīna tuggāla sattam

analyzed: dīna bhāva dāruṇa bhāva alasa bhāvā ca suttam sayanam ca tāsaḥ citta kkhobho ca gilāna parimaddita bhāvo

analyzed: ca ussuka harisa sa tissā visāda abahitthāḥ ussāha pitisa tiissā kheda ākāra saṃvarā ca cintā

analyzed: ca gabbo abhimāno ca apamāro ca a marisa mada ma tummāda mohāḥ akkhanti pamāda adhikkā

analyzed: ca iti ete tettiṃsa byabhicārībhāvāḥ nāma honti ca ca ca ca

analyzed: ca jaḷa tā ca iti ca dīna tā ca uggo ca ca ca sati ca

analyzed: issā ca visādaḥ ca abahitthā ceti ca amarisaḥ ca madaḥ ca mati ca ummādaḥ ca mohaḥ ca iti

analyzed: ca niddā ca āvego ca iti ca saha biḷāya vattati iti ca saha capalena cāpalyena vattati iti

analyzed: ca sa capalaḥ ca saḥ byādhi ca iti ca maraṇam ca sa capala byādhi ca iti ca vākyam maraṇa sa capala a byādhi iti

original: samāhāradvando. Tasmā “sabiḷa”nti padaṃ etassa visesanaṃ hoti.
analyzed: samāhāra dvandaḥ padam etassa visesanam hoti

original: Lokasabhāvassa anekavidhattā ekoyeva vīraraso ussāhavatā vīrarasākārena assādanīyo
analyzed: loka sabhāvassa aneka vidha ttā ekaḥ yā iva vīra rasaḥ ussāhavatā vīra rasa ākārena assādanīyaḥ

original: hoti, soyeva bhīrunā bhayākārena assādanīyo hoti. Tasmā ekekassa rasassa ime bahū
analyzed: hoti saḥ yā iva bhīrunā bhayākārena assādanīyaḥ hoti tasmai ekekassa rasassa ime bahū

analyzed: byabhicārino vaṇṇetabbāḥ honti evam sati aneka adhippāyakaḥ loko tesu kiñci assādeti

original: Evaṃ sati bandho sabbajanassa kanto hoti. Tassaṃ bhāvavaṇṇanāyaṃ yasmā māretumāgacchantānaṃ
analyzed: evam sati bandho sabba janassa kantaḥ hoti bhāva vaṇṇanāyam yasmai māretum āgacchantānam

original: sattūnaṃ dassanamekameva taṅkhaṇe janādhippāyato bhijjitvā pakatibhīrūnaṃ purisānaṃ
analyzed: sattūnam dassanam ekam eva taṅkhaṇe jana adhippāyataḥ bhijjitvā pakati bhīrūnam purisānam

original: bhayassa ca yuddhalolassa ussāhanassa ca kāraṇaṃ hoti. Evaṃ naṭena hasanatthaṃ katavikatamābharaṇañca
analyzed: bhayassa ca yuddha lolassa ussāhanassa ca kāraṇam hoti evam naṭena hasana attham kata vikatam ābharaṇam ca

original: tādisakiriyā ca uttānapakatikānaṃ purisānaṃ ṭhāyīhāsassa ca gambhīrapakatikānaṃ byabhicārīhāsassa
analyzed: tādisa kiriyā ca uttāna pakatikānam purisānam ṭhāyī hāsassa ca gambhīra pakatikānam byabhicārī hāsassa

original: ca hetu bhaveyya. Tasmā bhāve vaṇṇentena kavinā ocityabhaṅgamakatvā sakkaccamocityaṃ
analyzed: ca hetu tasmai bhāve vaṇṇentena kavinā ocitya bhaṅgam a katvā

original: sajjetvā bhāvappakāsakāni savibhāvānubhāvakavivacanāni vaṇṇetabbāni. Ettha bhāvāvabodhakavibhāvādīnaṃ
analyzed: sajjetvā bhāva pakāsakāni sa vibhāva anubhāvaka vivacanāni vaṇṇetabbāni ettha bhāva avabodhaka vibhāva ādīnam

original: jānitabbattā tehi tehi bhāvehi saddhiṃ evaṃ veditabbā.
analyzed: jānitabba ttā tehi tehi bhāvehi saddhim evam veditabbā

original: Tesu bhāvesu attāvamānanalakkhaṇo nibbedo. Itthīnaṃ, hīnānaṃ hīnācārānaṃ (ka.) vā
analyzed: tesu bhāvesu atta avamānana lakkhaṇaḥ nibbedaḥ itthīnam hīnānam hīna ācārānam vā

original: uppajjati ce, dāliddiyaṃ ālambaṇavibhāvo nāma, yogīnaṃ ce, tathāvabodho ālambaṇavibhāvo,
analyzed: uppajjati ce dāliddiyam ālambaṇa vibhāvaḥ nāma yogīnam ce tathā avabodhaḥ ālambaṇa vibhāvaḥ

original: ettha assupatanacintādikaṃ anubhāvo nāma.
analyzed: ettha assu patana cintā ādikam anubhāvaḥ nāma

original: Vitakkassa sandeho uddīpanavibhāvo nāma, sirokampādikaṃ anubhāvo nāma.
analyzed: vitakkassa sandehaḥ uddīpana vibhāvaḥ nāma sirokampā ādikam anubhāvaḥ nāma

original: Saṅkāya viruddhappavatti uddīpanavibhāvo, kampādiko anubhāvo. Upari “vibhāvo”ti vutte ālambaṇuddīpanesu dvīsu yaṃ yujjati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: saṅkāya viruddha ppavatti uddīpana vibhāvaḥ kampa ādikaḥ anubhāvaḥ upari vibhāvaḥ ti vutte ālambaṇa uddīpanesu dvīsu yam yujjati tam gahetabbam

original: Khedalakkhaṇassa samassa gamanādikaṃ vibhāvo, sedādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: kheda lakkhaṇassa samassa gamana ādikam vibhāvaḥ seda ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Santosalakkhaṇāya dhitiyā ñāṇādi vibhāvo, bhogesu alolabhāvādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: santosa lakkhaṇāya dhitiyā ñāṇa ādi vibhāvaḥ bhogesu alola bhāva ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Ayoggatālakkhaṇāya jaḷatāya iṭṭhāniṭṭhānaṃ ajānanādi vibhāvo, vivaṭanayanehi abhimukhavilokanatādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: a yogga tā lakkhaṇāya jaḷa tāya iṭṭha aniṭṭhānam a jānana ādi vibhāvaḥ vivaṭa nayanehi abhimukha vilokana tā ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Cittassanittejalakkhaṇāya dīnatāya duggatatādi vibhāvo, malinavatthatādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: dīna tāya duggata tā ādi vibhāvaḥ malina vattha tā ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Dāruṇatālakkhaṇassa uggabhāvassātisayāparādhādi vibhāvo, tajjanādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: dāruṇa tā lakkhaṇassa vibhāvaḥ tad jana ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Alasattassa aṭṭhānaparisamādi vibhāvo, vaṅkikabhāvo anubhāvo.
analyzed: ala sattassa vibhāvaḥ vaṅkika bhāvaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Sayanasaṅkhātassa suttassa niddādi vibhāvo, assādādi anubhāvo. Ettha assādanaṃ nāma seyyasukhapassasukhādikaṃ.
analyzed: sayana saṅkhātassa suttassa niddā ādi vibhāvaḥ assāda ādi anubhāvaḥ ettha assādanam nāma seyya sukha passa sukha ādikam

original: Cittakkhobhasaṅkhātassa tāsassa gajjitādi vibhāvo, gajjitaṃ nāma bhayajanakavacanaṃ. Kopena kampanā anubhāvo.
analyzed: citta kkhobha saṅkhātassa tāsassa gajjita ādi vibhāvaḥ gajjitam nāma bhaya janaka vacanam kopena kampanā anubhāvaḥ

original: Pīḷāsaṅkhātassa gilānassa āyāsapipāsādi vibhāvo, dubbaṇṇatādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: pīḷā saṅkhātassa gilānassa āyāsa pipāsā ādi vibhāvaḥ dubbaṇṇa tā ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Anurūpakālassa anolokanassa ussukkassa rammavatthudassanicchādi vibhāvo, turitatādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: anurūpa kālassa anolokanassa ussukkassa ramma vatthu dassa nicchā ādi vibhāvaḥ turita tā ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Cetopasādalakkhaṇassa harisassa maṅgalakīḷādi vibhāvo, santosavacanādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: cetaḥ upasāda lakkhaṇassa harisassa maṅgala kīḷā ādi vibhāvaḥ santosa vacana ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Saraṇalakkhaṇāya satiyā saññāṇadassanādi vibhāvo, bhamukkhepādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: saraṇa lakkhaṇāya satiyā saññāṇa dassana ādi vibhāvaḥ bham ukkhepa ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Parasampattiasahanalakkhaṇāya issāya dujjanabhāvagabbādi vibhāvo, dosakathanāvajānanādi anubhavo.
analyzed: para sampatti a sahana lakkhaṇāya issāya dujjana bhāva gabba ādi vibhāvaḥ dosa kathana avajānana ādi anubhavaḥ

original: Khedalakkhaṇassa visādassa āraddhakāriyāsiddhikāriyabyāpattiādi vibhāvo, manosantāpādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: kheda lakkhaṇassa visādassa āraddha kāriya asiddhi kāriya byāpatti ādi vibhāvaḥ manaḥ santāpa ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Ākārasaṃvaraṇalakkhaṇāya, rasasabhāvapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya vā abahitthayalajjādi vibhāvo, tadaññakriyākaraṇaṃ, adhomukhakaraṇaṃ, pādehi bhūmikhaṇanantiādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: ākāra saṃvaraṇa lakkhaṇāya rasa sabhāva paṭicchādana lakkhaṇāya vā vibhāvaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Cintāya iṭṭhatthālābhādī vibhāvo, makulitanayanādi adhokhittacakkhādi vā anubhāvo.
analyzed: cintāya iṭṭha attha alābha ādī vibhāvaḥ makulita nayana ādi adhas khitta cakkha ādi vā anubhāvaḥ

original: Gabbassa issariyādi vibhāvo, avajānanādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: gabbassa issariya ādi vibhāvaḥ avajānana ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Apamārassa yakkhapīḷādi vibhāvo, bhūmipatanādayo anubhāvo.
analyzed: apamārassa yakkha pīḷā ādi vibhāvaḥ bhūmi patana ādayaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Akkhamalakkhaṇassa amarisassa avamānanādi vibhāvo, sirokampanatajjanādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: akkhama lakkhaṇassa amarisassa avamānana ādi vibhāvaḥ siro kampana tajjana ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Pamādādhikkalakkhaṇassa madassa santosapānaṃ vibhāvo, kampamānahatthapādavacanagamanahāsādī anubhāvo.
analyzed: pamāda adhikka lakkhaṇassa madassa santosa pānam vibhāvaḥ kampamāna hattha pāda vacana gamana hāsa ādī anubhāvaḥ

original: Kaṅkhācchedanalakkhaṇāya matiyā upadesādi vibhāvo, mukhasantosādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: kaṅkhā chedana lakkhaṇāya matiyā upadesa ādi vibhāvaḥ mukha santosa ādi anubhāvo

original: Anupaparikkhakāritālakkhaṇassa ummādassa sannipātajjarayakkhādi vibhāvo, akāraṇarodanahasanādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: ummādassa sannipāta jjara yakkha ādi vibhāvaḥ akāraṇa rodana hasana ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Muyhanalakkhaṇassa mohassa adhikabhayādi vibhāvo, sabhāvānavabodhanādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: muyhana lakkhaṇassa mohassa adhika bhaya ādi vibhāvaḥ sabhāva anavabodhana ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Niddāpagamasaṅkhātassa vibodhassa kālapariṇāmādi ālokasaraṇādi vā vibhāvo, akkhimaddanādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: niddā apagama saṅkhātassa vibodhassa kāla pariṇāma ādi āloka saraṇa ādi vā vibhāvaḥ akkhi maddana ādi anubhāvaḥ

analyzed: manaḥ sampīḷana lakkhaṇāya niddāya kassaci a cintana a karaṇa ādi vibhāvaḥ akkhipi dahana ādi anubhāvaḥ

analyzed: bhaya āgamana lakkhaṇassa āvegassa paccatthika dassana ādi vibhāvaḥ anubhāvaḥ

original: Lajjālakkhaṇāya biḷāya durācārādi vibhāvo, adhomukhatādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: lajjā lakkhaṇāya biḷāya durācāra ādi vibhāvaḥ adhomukha tā ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Maraṇassa satthapahārarogādi vibhāvo, mukhavikārādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: maraṇassa sattha pahāra roga ādi vibhāvaḥ mukha vikāra ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Cāpallassa rāgadosādi vibhāvo, attano sacchandacaraṇādi anubhāvo.
analyzed: cāpallassa rāga dosa ādi vibhāvaḥ attano sacchanda caraṇa ādi anubhāvaḥ

original: Byādhiyā vātapittādīnaṃ ussadabhāvādi vibhāvo, nitthunanādi anubhāvo.

analyzed: aññathā visum visum dassitam ti daṭṭhabbam

analyzed: sāttika bhāva adhippāya

original: 345. Idāni uddesakkamenādhigatakevalabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ sāttikābhāvaṃ dasseti “samāhita”iccādinā.

analyzed: yojetabbam anubhāvaḥ nāma ṭhāyībhāva ādīnam tesam tesam bhāvānam pakāsaka vācasika byāpāra saṅkhātaka vipayogaḥ

analyzed: ca abhinaya saṅkhātaḥ ca iti duvidhaḥ byāpāraḥ

original: Nekahetuṃ manovutti-visesañca vibhāvituṃ;

analyzed: āha neka ecca ādi neka hetum tesam tesam bhāvānam ālambaṇa vibhāva ādi bahu kāraṇavantam

original: Savibhāvānubhāvehi, bhāvā te te yathārahaṃ;

original: Cittavutti visesattā, mānasā sāttika’ṅgato;

original: Rasaadhippāya
analyzed: rasa adhippāya

original: Rasappabheda
analyzed: rasa ppabheda

original: Savibhāvānubhāvehi,

original: Sāttikābyabhicārihi;

original: Assādiyatta’mānīya-

original: Siṅgārahassakaruṇā, ruddavīrabhayānakā;

original: 354. Tesaṃ nāmavasena vibhāgamāha “siṅgāre”ccādinā. Ṭhāyīnanukkamāti “ratihāsā ca soko cā”tiādinā vuttānaṃ ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ anukkamā, paṭipāṭiyāti attho.

original: 354. Rasāvatthāsampattaratihāsādīnaṃ ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ idāni kamena nāmantaraṃ dasseti

analyzed: karaṇa bhūtehi paripose sati hassaḥ hassaḥ nāma rasaḥ siyā saḥ hassaḥ bhiyyaḥ itthi pabhutīnam

original: nīcapakatīnañca siyāti. Vikārā ca sā ākati ceti ca, so ādi yesanti ca, niddā ca samo
analyzed: siyāti ca ca ca ca

original: ca ālasyañca mucchā ceti ca, te ādi yesaṃ akkhiphandanādīnaṃ anubhāvānanti ca, te
analyzed: ca ālasyam ca mucchā ca iti ca te ādi yesam akkhiphandana ādīnam ca te

original: ca byabhicārino ceti ca, itthī pabhuti yesaṃ nīcapakatīnanti ca vākyaṃ.
analyzed: ca ca iti ca itthī ca vākyam

original: Hassappabheda
analyzed: hassa ppabheda

original: Sitamiha vikāsinayanaṃ,
analyzed: sitam iha vikāsi nayanam

original: Kiñcā’lakkhiyadijantu taṃ hasitaṃ;
analyzed: tam hasitam

original: Madhurassaraṃ vihasitaṃ,
analyzed: madhurassaram vihasitam

original: Saṃsasirokampamupahasitaṃ.
analyzed: saṃsa sirā kampam upahasitam

original: Apahasitaṃ sañjala’kkhi,
analyzed: apahasitam

original: Vikkhittaṅgaṃ bhavatya’tihasitaṃ;
analyzed: vikkhittaṅgam bhavati ati hasitam

original: Dve dve hassā kathitā ce’saṃ,
analyzed: dve dve hassā

original: Jeṭṭhe majjhe’dhamepi ca kamaso.
analyzed: jeṭṭhe majjhe dhame pi ca kamasaḥ

original: 359-360. Hasse bhedamāha “sita”miccādinā. Iha hasse vikāsīni nayanāni yassa taṃ sitaṃ,
analyzed: hasse bhedam āha sitam iccādinā iha hasse vikāsīni nayanāni yassa tam sitam

original: kiñci ālakkhiyā dijā dantā yassa taṃ hasitaṃ. Evaṃ madhuro saro saddo yassa taṃ vihasitaṃ.
analyzed: kiñci ālakkhiyāḥ dijāḥ dantāḥ yassa tam hasitam evam madhuraḥ saraḥ saddo yassa tam vihasitam

original: Aṃsasirokampena saha vattamānaṃ upahasitaṃ, saha jalena assunā vattamānāni akkhīni
analyzed: aṃsa siraḥ kampena saha vattamānam upahasitam saha jalena assunā vattamānāni akkhīni

original: yassa taṃ apahasitaṃ. Vikkhittāni ito tato pasāritāni aṅgāni yassa taṃ atihasitaṃ
analyzed: yassa tam apahasitam vikkhittāni itas tatas pasāritāni aṅgāni yassa tam atihasitam

original: nāma. Esañca sitādīnaṃ majjhe dve dve hassā ādito paṭṭhāya kamaso yathākkamena jeṭṭhe
analyzed: nāma esan ca sita ādīnam majjhe dve dve hassāḥ āditaḥ paṭṭhāya kamasaḥ yathākkamena jeṭṭhe

original: majjhe adhamepi ca kathitāti sambandho. Purātanehīti viññāyati.
analyzed: majjhe adhame api ca kathitā ati sambandho purātanehi iti viññāyati

original: 359-360. Idāni hassabhedaṃ dasseti “sita”miccādinā. Iha imasmiṃ hassavisaye vikāsinayanaṃ
analyzed: idāni hassa bhedam dasseti sitam iccādinā iha imasmin hassa visaye vikāsi nayanam

original: vivaṭanayanaṃ sitaṃ nāma. Kiñci ālakkhiyadijaṃ tu kiñci dissamānadantaṃ, taṃ hasitaṃ
analyzed: vivaṭa nayanam sitam nāma kiñci ālakkhiya dijam tu kiñci dissamāna dantam tam hasitam

original: nāma. Madhurassaraṃ madhuranādaṃ vihasitaṃ nāma. Saṃsasirokampaṃ aṃsasirokampasahitaṃ
analyzed: nāma madhurassaram madhura nādam vihasitam nāma saṃsa sirokampam aṃsa siraḥ kampa sahitam

original: upahasitaṃ nāma. Sajalakkhi assuvilocanasahitaṃ apahasitaṃ nāma. Vikkhittaṅgaṃ aṭṭhāne

original: pasāraṇavasena vikkhittahatthapādādiavayavavantaṃ atihasitaṃ nāma bhavati. Esaṃ channaṃ

original: kamaso kamena dve dve jeṭṭhe majjhe adhamepi visaye kathitā purātanehi bhāsitāti.
analyzed: kamaso kamena dve dve jeṭṭhe majjhe adhame pi visaye kathitā purātanehi bhāsitā ati

original: Vikāsīni nayanāni asseti ca, kiñci īsakaṃ ālakkhiyā dijā yasseti ca, madhuro saro
analyzed: vikāsīni nayanāni assa iti ca kiñci īsakam ālakkhiyāḥ dijāḥ yassa iti ca madhuraḥ saro

original: asseti ca, aṃso ca siro ceti ca, aṃsasiraso kampoti ca, tena saha vattatīti ca, saha
analyzed: assa iti ca aṃso ca siraḥ ca iti ca aṃsa siraso kampo ti ca tena saha vattati iti ca saha

original: jalena vattamānāni akkhīni yasseti ca, anusvarāgamo. Vikkhittāni aṅgāni yasseti ca
analyzed: jalena vattamānāni akkhīni yassa iti ca anusvara āgamaḥ vikkhittāni aṅgāni yassa iti ca

original: vākyaṃ. Sitahasitadvayaṃ uttame, vihasitaupahasitadvayaṃ majjhime, apahasitaatihasitadvayaṃ
analyzed: vākyam sita hasita dvayam uttame vihasita aupahasita dvayam majjhime apahasita atihasita dvayam

original: adhame vattate. Evaṃ sitādayo anurūpavibhāvādinā payuttā ime rasā’vatthaṃ pāpuṇantīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: adhame vattate evam sita ādayaḥ anurūpa vibhāva ādinā payuttāḥ ime rasa avattham pāpuṇanti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Hassarasassa evamudāharaṇaṃ ñātabbaṃ –
analyzed: hassa rasassa evam udāharaṇam ñātabbam

original: Pūjesi kaṇṭhamaṇinā api yo pasanno,
analyzed: pūjesi kaṇṭhamaṇinā api yaḥ pasannaḥ

original: Dhamme purā’samadhuraṃ vidhuraṃ sa hantuṃ;
analyzed: dhamme vidhuram sa hantum

original: Gopentiyāpi vacanena thiyā sabhāvaṃ;
analyzed: vacanena thiyā sabhāvam

original: Bhattiṃ akāsi pharuse mayi nāgarājāti.
analyzed: bhattim akāsi pharuse mayi nāga rājā ati

original: Yo purā pubbe dhamme tassa dhammakathane pasanno kaṇṭhamaṇinā api attano anagghakaṇṭhamaṇināpi
analyzed: yaḥ purā pubbe dhamme tassa dhamma kathane pasannaḥ kaṇṭha maṇinā api attanaḥ anaggha kaṇṭha maṇinā api

original: taṃ pūjesi, so nāgarājā sabhāvaṃ attano adhippāyaṃ gopentiyā api thiyā vacanena itthiyā
analyzed: tam pūjesi saḥ nāga rājā sabhāvam attanaḥ adhippāyam gopentiyā api thiyā vacanena itthiyā

original: vacanena asamadhuraṃ tulyarahitaṃ vidhuraṃ vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ hantuṃ vināsanatthaṃ pharuse
analyzed: vacanena asama dhuram tulya rahitam vidhuram vidhura paṇḍitam hantum pharuse

original: caṇḍe mayi bhattiṃ akāsīti. Iha ekasmiṃyeva vatthuni nāgarājassa pasādavadhavidhānādiviparītappavatti
analyzed: caṇḍe mayi bhattim akāsi iti iha ekasmiṃ yeva vatthuni nāga rājassa pasāda vadha vidhāna ādi viparīta ppavatti

original: ālambaṇavibhāvo, paṭhamaṃ anagghapiyavatthūhi pūjitabhāvo ca bodhisattassa atulyabhāvo
analyzed: ālambaṇa vibhāvaḥ paṭhamam anaggha piya vatthūhi pūjita bhāvaḥ ca bodhisattassa atulya bhāvaḥ

analyzed: ca itthi vacanassa sampaṭicchana bhāvo ca tassa adhippāyassa aññāta bhāvo ca puṇṇakassa

analyzed: caṇḍa bhāvaḥ ca iti imehi sabba vacanehi uddīpana vibhāvaḥ dassitaḥ imehi uddīpita ṭhāyībhāva saṅkhato

original: hāso vākyasāmatthiyā pakāsito hāsavirodhinibbedādivajjitā samālasiyasantosaassuvepathādikā
analyzed: hāsaḥ vākya sāmatthiyā pakāsitaḥ hāsa virodhi nibbeda ādi vajjitā sama ālasiya santosa assu vepathā ādikā

analyzed: byabhicārībhāvā sāttika abhāvā ca evam sāmatthiyena dīpitā tad anurūpa vibhāva ādi pakāsakā

analyzed: yathā vuttaka vippayogāḥ anubhāvāḥ nāma honti hassa bhedena majjhime purise vattabbā api

original: hasitaupahasitā dve imā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: hasita aupahasitā dve imā daṭṭhabbā

original: Karuṇāṭhāyībhāva
analyzed: karuṇā ṭhāyībhāva

original: Sokarūpo tu karuṇo-
analyzed: soka rūpaḥ tu karuṇaḥ

original: Niṭṭhapattiṭṭhanāsato;
analyzed: niṭṭhapat tiṭṭha nāsataḥ

original: Tatthā’nubhāvā rudita-
analyzed: tattha anubhāvāḥ

original: Palayatthambhakādayo;
analyzed: palayat thambhaka ādayaḥ

original: Visādālasyamaraṇa-
analyzed: visāda ālasya maraṇa

original: Cintādī byabhicārino.
analyzed: cintā ādī byabhicārino

original: 361. “Soke”ccādi. Aniṭṭhassa puttaviyogādino desanikkaḍḍhanādino patti ca iṭṭhassa
analyzed: soka iccādi aniṭṭhassa putta viyoga ādino desa nikkaḍḍhana ādino ca iṭṭhassa

original: dhammassa, dhanādino vā nāso ca tato vibhāvabhūtehi sampanno sokarūpo sokasabhāvo
analyzed: dhammassa dhana ādinaḥ vā nāsaḥ ca tatas vibhāva bhūtehi sampanno soka rūpaḥ soka sabhāvaḥ

original: tu karuṇo raso nāma. Tattha uttamānaṃ soko puttaviyogādianiṭṭhuppattito, dhammādiiṭṭhanāsato
analyzed: tu karuṇaḥ rasaḥ nāma tattha uttamānam soko putta viyoga ādi aniṭṭha uppattitaḥ dhamma ādi iṭṭha nāsato

analyzed: ca jāyate nīcānam tu desa nikkaḍḍhana ādi a niṭṭha uppattitaḥ dhana ādi iṭṭha nāsato ca paresam

analyzed: dhana ādinā asataḥ tu uttamassa iva mahā kāruṇika ttā sesam su bodham anubhāvaḥ pana ittha yathocityam nirūpayitabbo

original: 361. Idāni karuṇārasaposanakkamaṃ dasseti “soka”iccādinā. Aniṭṭhappattiṭṭhanāsato
analyzed: idāni karuṇā rasa posana kkamam dasseti soka ecca ādinā

original: puttaviyogādino, desacāgādino vā aniṭṭhassa uppatti ca sīlādino, dhanādino vā iṭṭhassa

original: kantivatthuno vināso cāti imehi ālambaṇavibhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi uppanno sokarūpo
analyzed: kanti vatthuno vināsaḥ ca ati imehi ālambaṇa vibhāvehi karaṇa bhūtehi uppannaḥ soka rūpaḥ

original: tu sokasabhāvo pana karuṇo karuṇāraso nāma hoti. Tattha karuṇārase ruditapalayatthambhakādayo

original: rudito palayo thambhotiādayo anubhāvā nāma bhavantīti. Thambhādīnaṃ sarūpo heṭṭhā
analyzed: anubhāvāḥ nāma bhavanti iti thambha ādīnam sarūpaḥ heṭṭhā

original: vuttova. Visādaālasyamaraṇacintādayo byabhicārino tasmiṃyeva byabhicārino bhavanti.
analyzed: visāda ālasya maraṇa cintā ādayaḥ byabhicārinaḥ tasmin yā iva byabhicārinaḥ bhavanti

original: Iha puttaviyogādianiṭṭhappattiyā ca sīladhammādiiṭṭhanāsanena ca uttamānaṃ soko uppajjati,
analyzed: iha putta viyoga ādi aniṭṭha ppattiyā ca sīla dhamma ādi iṭṭha nāsanena ca uttamānam sokaḥ uppajjati

original: desacāgādianiṭṭhappattiyā ca dhanādiiṭṭhanāsanena ca nīcānaṃ. Aññesaṃ dhanādivināsanena
analyzed: desa cāga ādi aniṭṭha ppattiyā ca dhana ādi iṭṭhanāsanena ca nīcānam aññesam dhana ādi vināsanena

analyzed: pana mahā karuṇika ttā uttamassa iva uppajjati tasmin visaye saḥ sokaḥ sesānam na uppajjati

original: Tasmā yathārahaṃ payogo kātabbo. Sokassa rūpo sabhāvoti ca, aniṭṭhassa pattīti ca,
analyzed: tasmai yathāraham payogaḥ kātabbo sokassa rūpo sabhāvo ti ca aniṭṭhassa patti iti ca

original: iṭṭhassa nāsoti ca, aniṭṭhappatti ca iṭṭhanāso ceti ca, ruditañca palayo ca thambhako

original: ceti ca, te ādi yesamiti ca, visādo ca ālasyañca maraṇañca cintā ceti ca, tā ādi
analyzed: ca iti ca te ādi ca ca ālasyam ca maraṇam ca cintā ca iti ca te ādi

original: yesamiti ca vākyaṃ. Imassa karuṇārasassa lakkhiyamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ –
analyzed: yesam iti ca vākyam imassa karuṇā rasassa lakkhiyam evam daṭṭhabbam

original: Ākaḍḍhite’kasatarājapurakkhato yo,
analyzed: ākaḍḍhita ika sata rāja pura kkhataḥ yaḥ

original: Dhammena āsanamalaṃkurute jinova;
analyzed: dhammena āsanam alaṃkurute jina uva

original: So assavālamavalambiya dāni nīto,
analyzed: saḥ assavālam avalambiya dāni nītaḥ

original: Yakkhena lokatilako kurute kimekoti.
analyzed: yakkhena loka tilako kurute

original: Yo ekasatarājapurakkhato rājūnaṃ ekasatena parivārito jino iva buddho iva dhammena
analyzed: yaḥ eka sata rāja purakkhataḥ rājūnam eka satena parivāritaḥ jinaḥ iva buddhaḥ iva dhammena

original: madhuradhammakathanena āsanaṃ dhammāsanaṃ alaṃkurute sajjeti, lokatilako lokassa
analyzed: madhura dhamma kathanena āsanam dhammāsanam alaṃkurute sajja iti loka tilakaḥ lokassa

analyzed: nītaḥ assavālam avalambiya idāni ekaḥ kim kuruta iti iha ānītaḥ iti dassita piya vatthu viyogo

original: sokassa ālambaṇavibhāvo hoti. “Ākaḍḍhitekasatarāje”ccādinā sakalena vākyena uddīpanavibhāvo
analyzed: sokassa ālambaṇa vibhāvaḥ hoti ākaḍḍhita ika sata rāja icca ādinā sakalena vākyena uddīpana vibhāvaḥ

analyzed: dassitaḥ uddīpita soka saṅkhāta ṭhāyībhāvo ca visāda ālasya cintā ādikaḥ byabhicārībhāvo ca

original: ruditapalayathambhakādikā vibhāvādibodhakaanubhāvā ca vākyasāmatthiyena dīpitā honti.
analyzed: rudita palaya thambhaka ādikāḥ vibhāva ādi bodhaka anubhāvā ca vākya sāmatthiyena dīpitāḥ honti

original: Ruddaṭhāyībhāva
analyzed: rudda ṭhāyībhāva

original: Kodho macchariyādīhi, pose tāsamadādibhi;

original: Nayanāruṇatādīhi, ruddo nāma raso bhave.
analyzed: nayana aruṇa tā ādīhi ruddaḥ nāma rasaḥ bhave

original: 362. “Kodho”iccādi, subodhaṃ. Ettha paṭhamena ādisaddena avikkhepaupahāsādayo vibhāvā
analyzed: su bodham ettha paṭhamena ādi saddena avikkhepa upahāsa ādayaḥ

original: gahitā, dutiyena uggasambhamādayo byabhicārino, tatiyena bhūkuṭipuraṇaoṭṭhanippīḷanādayo anubhāvā.
analyzed: gahitāḥ dutiyena ugga sambhama ādayaḥ byabhicārinaḥ tatiyena anubhāvā

original: 362. Idāni ruddarasassa posanakkamaṃ dasseti “kodho”iccādinā. Kodho macchariyādīhi
analyzed: idāni rudda rasassa posana kkamam dasseti kodho icca ādinā kodho macchariya ādīhi

original: macchariyaavikkhepaupahāsādīhi ālambaṇādīhi vibhāvehi ca hetubhūtehi tāsamadādīhi
analyzed: macchariya avikkhepa upahāsa ādīhi ālambaṇa ādīhi vibhāvehi ca hetu bhūtehi tāsa mada ādīhi

analyzed: tāsama dauggata sambhama ādīhi byabhicārībhāvehi ca nayana aruṇa tā ādīhi netta ratta subhaṅga oṭṭha pīḷana ādīhi

analyzed: anubhāvehi ca karaṇa bhūtehi pose sati ruddaḥ nāma rasaḥ bhaveti macchariyam ādi yesanti

original: bhāvoti ca, sā ādi yesamiti ca vākyaṃ.

original: Ruddarasassa udāharaṇamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ –

original: Yakkhena bho adhigatosi manussabhakkhe,
analyzed: yakkhena bho adhigataḥ asi manussa bhakkhe

original: Nā’ssassa vāla’mavalamba puraṃ avekkha;

original: Verambhavātamukhacuṇṇitasabbagatto,

analyzed: macco katham punapi passati jīva lokanti

analyzed: gahetvā idānā iva puram avekkha tuyham nagaram olokehi tathā iva hi verambha vāta mukha cuṇṇita sabba gatto

original: verambhavātassa abhimukhicuṇṇitasakalasarīro macco manusso jīvalokaṃ sattalokaṃ punapi
analyzed: verambha vātassa abhimukhi cuṇṇita sakala sarīraḥ maccaḥ manussaḥ jīva lokam satta lokam puna api
